targetString: میزبانهایی که به عنوان مخزن میانی برخی از HCoVها عمل می‌کنند نیز شناخته شده‌اند.
en-mt: Hosts that act as intermediate repositories of some HCoVs are also known.

sourceString: Identifying the animal hosts has direct implications in the prevention of human diseases.
targetString: شناسایی میزبان‌های حیوانی، تاثیر مستقیمی در پیشگیری از بیماری‌ در انسان دارد.
en-mt: Identification of animal hosts has a direct impact on the prevention of disease in humans.

sourceString: Investigating CoV-host interactions in animals might also derive important insight on CoV pathogenesis in humans.
targetString: بررسی تعاملات میزبان CoV در حیوانات همچنین می‌تواند بینش مهمی در مورد بیماری‌زایی CoV در انسان‌ها به دست دهد.
en-mt: The study of CoV host interactions in animals could also provide important insights into the pathogenesis of CoV in humans.

sourceString: In this review, we present an overview of the existing knowledge about the seven HCoVs, with a focus on the history of their discovery as well as their zoonotic origins and interspecies transmission.
targetString: در این بررسی، مروری بر دانش موجود در مورد هفت HCoV، با تمرکز بر تاریخچه کشف آنها و نیز منشا حیوانی و انتقال بین گونه‌ای ارائه می‌دهیم.
en-mt: In this review, we provide an overview of existing knowledge about the seven HCoVs, focusing on their discovery histories as well as animal origin and interspecies transmission.

sourceString: Importantly, we compare and contrast the different HCoVs from a perspective of virus evolution and genome recombination.
targetString: موضوع مهمی که به آن می‌پردازیم مقایسه HCoVهای مختلف از دیدگاه تکامل ویروس و نوترکیبی ژنتیکی است.
en-mt: The important issue we are addressing is the comparison of different HCoVs from the perspective of virus evolution and genetic recombination.

sourceString: The current CoV disease 2019 (COVID-19) epidemic is discussed in this context.
targetString: همه‌گیری کنونی بیماری کرونا ویروس ۲۰۱۹  (کووید-19) در این زمینه مورد بحث قرار می‌گیرد.
en-mt: The current coronavirus pandemic 2019 (COVID-19) is discussed.

sourceString: In addition, the requirements for successful host switches and the implications of virus evolution on disease severity are also highlighted.
targetString: علاوه بر این، لزوم تغییر موفق میزبان و تکامل ویروس برای شدت بیماری در این مقاله بررسی می‌شود.
en-mt: In addition, the necessity of successful change of host and virus evolution for disease severity is discussed in this paper.

sourceString: Coronaviruses (CoVs) belong to the family Coronaviridae, which comprises a group of enveloped, positive-sensed, single-stranded RNA viruses.
targetString: ویروسهای کرونا (CoVها) متعلق به خانواده Coronaviridae هستند که متشکل از گروهی از ویروس‌های لفاف‌دار، با پلاریته مثبت و RNA تک رشته‌ای است.
en-mt: Coronaviruses (CoVs) belong to the Coronaviridae family, consisting of a group of enveloped, positive-polarized viruses and single-stranded RNA.

sourceString: These viruses harbouring the largest genome of 26 to 32 kilobases amongst RNA viruses were termed “CoVs” because of their crown-like morphology under electron microscope.
targetString: این ویروس‌ها که بزرگ‌ترین ژنوم را از ۲۶ تا ۳۲ کیلوبیس در بین ویروس‌های RNA دارند "CoV" نامیده شدند، که به دلیل مورفولوژی تاج مانند آنها زیر میکروسکوپ الکترونی است.
en-mt: These viruses, which have the largest genome of 26 to 32 kilobases of all RNA viruses, were called "CoVs" because of their coronal morphology under electron microscopy.

sourceString: Structurally, CoVs have non-segmented genomes that share a similar organization.
targetString: از لحاظ ساختاری، CoVها دارای ژنوم یکپارچه هستند که یک ساختار مشابه مشترک دارند.
en-mt: Structurally, CoVs have an integrated genome that shares a similar structure.

sourceString: Approximately two thirds of the genome contain two large overlapping open reading frames (ORF1a and ORF1b), which are translated into the pp1a and pp1ab replicase polyproteins.
targetString: تقریبا دو سوم ژنوم شامل دو چارچوب خوانش بازهم‌پوشان بزرگ (ORF۱a و ORF۱b) هستند که به پلی‌پروتئین رپلیکاز pp1a و pp1ab تبدیل می‌شوند.
en-mt: Approximately two-thirds of the genome consists of two large overlapping reading frameworks (ORF1a and ORF1b), which are converted into the polyprotein polymerase pp1a and pp1ab.

sourceString: The polyproteins are further processed to generate 16 non-structural proteins, designated nsp1~16.
targetString: پلی‌پروتئین تحت فرآوری بیشتر قرار گرفته و موجب تولید ۱۶ پروتئین غیر ساختاری می‌شود که nsp۱ تا ۱۶ نامگذاری می‌شوند.
en-mt: The polyprotein is further processed and produces 16 unstructured proteins, called NSP1 to 16.

sourceString: The remaining portion of the genome contains ORFs for the structural proteins, including spike (S), envelope (E), membrane (M) and nucleoprotein (N).
targetString: بخش باقیمانده ژنوم شامل ORFهاست که برای پروتئین‌های ساختاری مانند اسپایک (S)، لفاف (E)، غشا (M)و نوکلئوپرونئین (N) استفاده می‌شود.
en-mt: The remainder of the genome includes ORFs, which are used for structural proteins such as spikes (S), envelopes (E), membranes (M), and nucleopronine (N).

sourceString: A number of lineage-specific accessory proteins are also encoded by different lineages of CoVs.
targetString: تعدادی از پروتئین‌های جانبی که خاص اجداد هستند توسط اجداد مختلف CoVها کدگذاری شده‌اند.
en-mt: A number of ancillary proteins that are specific to ancestors are encoded by different ancestors of CoVs.

sourceString: Based on the difference in protein sequences, CoVs are classified into four genera (alpha-CoV, beta-CoV, gamma-CoV and delta-CoV), among which the beta-CoV genera contains most HCoVs and is subdivided into four lineages (A, B, C and D).
targetString: براساس تفاوت در توالی‌های پروتئینی، CoVs به چهار جنس طبقه‌بندی می‌شوند (alpha-CoV، beta-CoV، gamma-CoV و delta-CoV)، که در بین آنها جنس beta-CoV بیشتر HCoVها را شامل می‌شود و به چهار نژاد تقسیم می‌شود (A، B، C و D).
en-mt: Based on differences in protein sequences, CoVs are classified into four genera (alpha-CoV, beta-CoV, gamma-CoV, and delta-CoV), among which the genus beta-CoV contains most HCoVs and is divided into four strains (A, B, C and D).

sourceString: Phylogenetic evidence has shown that bats and rodents serve as the gene source of most alpha-CoVs and beta-CoVs, while birds are the main reservoir of gamma-CoVs and delta-CoVs.
targetString: شواهد فیلوژنتیک نشان داده که خفاش‌ها و جوندگان به عنوان منبع ژن alpha-CoVها و beta-CoVها عمل می‌کنند در حالی که پرندگان مخزن اصلی gamma-CoVها و delta-CoVها هستند.
en-mt: Phylogenetic evidence has shown that bats and rodents act as the gene source of alpha-CoVs and beta-CoVs, while birds are the main reservoirs of gamma-CoVs and delta-CoVs.

sourceString: For thousands of years, CoVs have constantly crossed species barriers and some have emerged as important human pathogens.
targetString: طی هزاران سال، CoVها به طور مداوم از موانع گونه‌ای عبور کرده‌اند و برخی از آنها به عنوان عوامل بیماری‌زای مهم برای انسان ظهور کرده‌اند.
en-mt: Over thousands of years, CoVs have consistently crossed species barriers, and some have emerged as important pathogens for humans.

sourceString: To date, seven human CoVs (HCoVs) are known.
targetString: تا به امروز، هفت CoV انسانی (HCoV) شناخته شده است.
en-mt: To date, seven human CoVs (HCoV) have been identified.

sourceString: Among them HCoV-229E and HCoV-NL63 are alpha-CoVs.
targetString: در بین آنها HCoV-229E و HCoV-NL63 ار نوع alpha-CoV هستند.
en-mt: Among them, HCoV-229E and HCoV-NL63 are alpha-CoV.

sourceString: The other five beta-CoVs include HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1, severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus (SARS-CoV), Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV) and SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: پنج beta-CoV دیگر عبارتند از HCoV-HKU1، HCoV-OC43، کروناویروس سندرم حاد تنفسی (SARS-CoV)، کروناویروس سندروم تنفسی خاورمیانه (MERS-CoV) و SARS-CoV-2.
en-mt: The other five beta-CoVs are HCoV-HKU1, HCoV-OC43, Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus (SARS-CoV), Middle East Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus (MERS-CoV), and SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-NL63 usually cause mild symptoms, like common cold and/or diarrhea.
targetString: HCoV-229E، HCoV-OC43، HCoV-HKU1 و HCoV-NL6 معمولا علائم خفیف مثل سرماخوردگی و یا اسهال ایجاد می‌کنند.
en-mt: HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-NL6 usually cause mild symptoms, such as colds or diarrhea.

sourceString: In contrast, SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV and the newly-identified SARS-CoV-2 are highly pathogenic, causing severe lower respiratory tract infection in relatively more patients with a higher chance to develop acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) and extrapulmonary manifestations.
targetString: در مقابل، MERS-CoV ،SARS - CoV و ویروس جدید SARS-CoV-2 به شدت بیماری‌زا هستند که باعث عفونت دستگاه تنفسی تحتانی در بیشتر بیماران شده و به احتمال زیاد باعث بروز سندروم دیسترس تنفسی حاد (ARDS) و ظهور علائم خارج از ریه می‌شوند.
en-mt: In contrast, MERS-CoV, SARS-CoV, and the new SARS-CoV-2 virus are highly pathogenic, causing lower respiratory tract infections in most patients and most likely to cause acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) and the appearance of extra-pulmonary symptoms.

sourceString: The first HCoV-229E strain, B814, was isolated from the nasal discharge of patients with common cold in mid-1960s.
targetString: اولین نژاد HCoV-229E با نام B814، از ترشحات بینی بیماران مبتلا به سرماخوردگی شایع در اواسط دهه ۱۹۶۰ جدا شد.
en-mt: The first HCoV-229E, B814, was isolated from nasal discharge in patients with common colds in the mid-1960s.

sourceString: Since then, more knowledge was accumulated through extensive studies on HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43, both of which cause self-limiting symptoms.
targetString: از آن زمان به بعد، از طریق مطالعات گسترده بر روی HCoV-229E و HCoV-OC43 که هر دوی آنها علائم خود محدود شونده ایجاد می‌کنند دانش ما بیشتر شد.
en-mt: Since then, our knowledge has grown through extensive studies on HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43, both of which cause self-limiting symptoms.

sourceString: Indeed, the concept had been widely accepted that infection with HCoVs is generally harmless until the outbreak of SARS.
targetString: در واقع، این مفهوم به طور گسترده‌ای مورد پذیرش بود که ابتلا به HCoVها بطور کلی بی‌ضرر است تا اینکه SARS شیوع پیدا کرد.
en-mt: In fact, it was widely accepted that HCoVs were generally harmless until SARS spread.

sourceString: The SARS outbreak occurred in 2003 is one of the most devastating in current history, infecting over 8,000 people with a crude case fatality of approximately 10%.
targetString: شیوع SARS در سال ۲۰۰۳ رخ داد، که یکی از مخرب‌ترین شیوع‌ها در زمان کنونی است، بیش از ۸۰۰۰ نفر را مبتلا کرد و تلفات خام آن تقریباً ۱۰ درصد بود.
en-mt: The SARS outbreak occurred in 2003, one of the most destructive outbreaks of the present time, affecting more than 8,000 people, with crude fatalities of almost 10 percent.

sourceString: Ten years later, the Middle East respiratory syndrome (MERS) outbreak resulted in a persistent epidemic in the Arabian Peninsula with sporadic spreading to the rest of the world.
targetString: ده سال بعد، شیوع سندروم تنفسی خاورمیانه (MERS) باعث شیوع یک بیماری همه‌گیر در شبه‌جزیره عربستان شد که گسترش پراکنده‌ای در سایر نقاط جهان داشت.
en-mt: Ten years later, an outbreak of Middle East respiratory syndrome (MERS) triggered an epidemic in the Arabian Peninsula that spread sporadically in other parts of the world.

sourceString: The 2019 novel HCoV (2019-nCoV), which has subsequently been renamed SARS-CoV-2, is the causative agent of the ongoing epidemic of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), which has claimed more than 3,120 lives and infected more than 91,000 people as of March 3, 2020.
targetString: در سال ۲۰۱۹، HCoV جدید (2019-nCoV) که پس از آن به SARS-CoV-2 تغییر نام یافت، عامل همه‌گیری بیماری کرونا در سال ۲۰۱۹ شد که تا ۳ مارس ۲۰۲۰ بیش از ۳،۱۲۰ نفر را کشته و بیش از ۹۱،۰۰۰ نفر را آلوده کرده ‌است.
en-mt: In 2019, the new HCoV (2019-nCoV), then renamed SARS-CoV-2, was the cause of the 2019 coronavirus pandemic that killed more than 3,120 people and infected more than 91,000 by March 3, 2020.

sourceString: The alarm has been ringing and the world has to prepare for the coming pandemic of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: زنگ خطر در حال نواخته شدن است و دنیا باید خود را برای بیماری همه‌گیر SARS-CoV-2 آماده کند.
en-mt: The alarm is ringing, and the world must prepare for the SARS-CoV-2 pandemic.

sourceString: All seven HCoVs have a zoonotic origin from bats, mice or domestic animals.
targetString: هر هفت HCoV دارای منشاء حیوانی هستند که شامل خفاش‌ها، موش یا حیوانات خانگی می‌شود.
en-mt: All seven HCoVs have animal origin, which includes bats, mice or pets.

sourceString: Multiple lines of evidence support an evolutionary origin of all HCoVs from bats, where viruses are well adapted and non-pathogenic but show great genetic diversity.
targetString: شواهد متعددی وجود دارد که منشا تکاملی همه HCoVها را از خفاش‌ها می‌دانند، در این موجودات ویروس‌ها به خوبی تطبیق یافته‌اند و بدون علامت بیماری حضور دارند و تنوع ژنتیکی زیادی نشان می‌دهند.
en-mt: There is ample evidence that all HCoVs originate from bats, that these organisms are well-adapted and asymptomatic, and show great genetic variation.

sourceString: The COVID-19 epidemic has presented enormous medical, scientific, social and moral challenges to China and the world.
targetString: همه‌گیری کووید-19 چالش‌های پزشکی، علمی، اجتماعی و اخلاقی عظیمی را برای چین و جهان ایجاد کرده‌ است.
en-mt: The COVID-19 pandemic has created enormous medical, scientific, social and ethical challenges for China and the world.

sourceString: Tracing the zoonotic origins of HCoVs provides a framework to understand the natural history, driving force and restriction factors of species jumping.
targetString: ردیابی منشا حیوانی بیماری، چارچوبی برای درک تاریخچه طبیعی، عوامل محرک و محدود کننده جهش گونه‌ها فراهم می‌کند.
en-mt: Tracking the animal origin of the disease provides a framework for understanding the natural history, triggering and limiting factors of species mutation.

sourceString: This might also guide or facilitate the search for the reservoir, intermediate and amplifying animal host(s) of SARS-CoV-2, with important implications in the prevention of future spillovers.
targetString: همچنین ممکن است این کار، جستجوی مخزن، میزبان میانی و میزبانان حیوانی تقویت کننده SARS-CoV-2 را تسهیل کند و پیامدهای مهمی در جلوگیری از همه‌گیری‌ آینده داشته باشد.
en-mt: It may also facilitate the search for reservoir, intermediate host, and animal hosts-boosters of SARS-CoV-2 and have important implications in preventing future pandemics.

sourceString: In this review we present an overview of the zoonotic origins, interspecies transmission and pathogenesis of HCoVs.
targetString: در این بررسی، مروری خواهیم داشت بر منشا حیوانی، انتقال بین‌گونه‌ای و بیماری‌زایی HCoVها.
en-mt: In this study, we will review animal origin, interspecies transmission and pathogenicity of HCoVs.

sourceString: Particularly, we highlight and discuss the common theme that parental viruses of HCoVs are typically non-pathogenic in their natural reservoir hosts but become pathogenic after interspecies transmission to a new host.
targetString: به خصوص، این موضوع مشترک را برجسته و مورد بحث قرار می‌دهیم که در آن ویروس‌های والد HCoV در محل زیست طبیعی خود به طور معمول بیماری‌زا نیستند، اما بعد از انتقال بین گونه‌ای به میزبان جدید، بیماری‌زا می‌شوند.
en-mt: In particular, we highlight and discuss the common issue in which HCoV-parent viruses in their natural habitat are not typically pathogenic, but become pathogenic after interspecies transmission to a new host.

sourceString: We also review the trend of HCoV evolution in which the increase in transmissibility often comes with the decrease in pathogenicity.
targetString: همچنین روند تکامل HCoV را مورد بررسی قرار می‌دهیم که در آن افزایش سرایت ویروس اغلب با کاهش بیماری‌زایی همراه است.
en-mt: We also examine the evolution of HCoV, in which increased virus contagion is often associated with a decrease in pathogenicity.

sourceString: The outcome of the ongoing SARS-CoV-2 outbreak is also discussed in this context.
targetString: پیامدهای شیوع حال حاضر SARS-CoV-2 در این زمینه نیز مورد بحث قرار گرفته است.
en-mt: The consequences of the current outbreak of SARS-CoV-2 are also discussed.

sourceString: Animal CoVs have been known since late 1930s.
targetString: CoVهای حیوانی از اواخر دهه ۱۹۳۰ برای ما شناخته شده بودند.
en-mt: Animal CoVs have been known to us since the late 1930s.

sourceString: Before the first isolation of HCoV-229E strain B814 from the nasal discharge of patients who had contracted common cold, different CoVs had been isolated in various infected animals, including turkey, mouse, cow, pig, cat and dog.
targetString: قبل از جداسازی اولیه HCoV-229E سویه B814، از ترشحات بینی بیماران مبتلا به سرماخوردگی معمولی، CoVهای مختلف در انواع مختلف حیوانات از جمله بوقلمون، موش، گاو، خوک، گربه و سگ جدا شده بودند.
en-mt: Prior to the initial isolation of the B814 strain HCoV-229E, different CoVs were isolated from nasal secretions of patients with common colds, different CoVs in different animal types including turkey, rat, cow, pig, cat and dog.

sourceString: In the past decades, seven HCoVs have been identified.
targetString: در دهه‌های گذشته، هفت HCoV شناسایی شده‌اند.
en-mt: In the past decade, seven HCoV have been identified.

sourceString: A brief summary of the history of HCoV discovery in chronological order (Table ​1) would be informative and instructive.
targetString: خلاصه مختصری از تاریخ کشف HCoV به ترتیب زمانی (جدول ۱) می‌تواند آموزنده و حاوی اطلاعات خوبی باشد.
en-mt: A brief summary of the history of HCoV discovery in chronological order (Table 1) can be informative and contain good information.

sourceString: The first HCoV-229E strain was isolated from the respiratory tract of patients with upper respiratory tract infection in the year of 1966, and was subsequently adapted to grow in WI-38 lung cell lines.
targetString: در سال ۱۹۶۶اولین توالی ویروس HCoV-229E از دستگاه تنفسی بیماران مبتلا به عفونت دستگاه تنفسی فوقانی نمونه‌گیری شد و پس از آن برای رشد در کشت سلولی WI - ۳۸ ریه سازگار شد.
en-mt: In 1966, the first sequence of HCoV-229E was sampled from the respiratory tract of patients with upper respiratory tract infection and then adapted for growth in WI-38 lung cell cultures.

sourceString: Patients infected with HCoV-229E presented with common cold symptoms, including headache, sneezing, malaise and sore-throat, with fever and cough seen in 10~20% cases.
targetString: بیماران مبتلا به HCoV-229E علائم سرماخوردگی عادی، از جمله سردرد، عطسه، ضعف و گلو درد داشتند و تب و سرفه در ۱۰ تا ۲۰ درصد آنها دیده می‌شد.
en-mt: Patients with HCoV-229E had symptoms of the common cold, including headaches, sneezing, weakness and sore throat, and fever and cough occurred in 10 to 20 percent of them.

sourceString: Later in 1967, HCoV-OC43 was isolated from organ culture and subsequent serial passage in brains of suckling mice.
targetString: بعدتر در سال ۱۹۶۷، HCoV - OC۴۳ از کشت عضو در آزمایشگاه جدا شد و به تدریج وارد مغز موش‌های کوچک شد.
en-mt: Later in 1967, HCoV-OC43 was isolated from laboratory culture and gradually entered the brains of small mice.

sourceString: The clinical features of HCoV-OC43 infection appear to be similar to those caused by HCoV-229E, which are symptomatically indistinguishable from infection with other respiratory tract pathogens such as influenza A viruses and rhinoviruses.
targetString: به نظر می‌رسد که ویژگی‌های بالینی عفونت HCoV - OC۴۳ مشابه ویژگیهایی باشد که توسط HCoV - ۲۲۹ E ایجاد شده‌اند که از نظر علائم از عفونتهای دیگر تنفسی مانند آنفولانزای A و رینوویروس‌ها قابل‌تشخیص نیستند.
en-mt: The clinical features of HCoV-OC43 infection appear to be similar to those caused by HCoV-229E, which are indistinguishable from other respiratory infections such as influenza A and rhinoviruses.

sourceString: Both HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43 are distributed globally, and they tend to be predominantly transmitted during the season of winter in temperate climate.
targetString: HCoV - ۲۲۹ و HCoV - OC۴۳ هر دو در سطح جهانی پخش شده‌اند و عمدتاً در طی فصل زمستان در آب و هوای معتدل منتقل می‌شوند.
en-mt: HCoV-229 and HCoV – OC43 are both spread globally and are transmitted mainly during winter in temperate climates.

sourceString: Generally, the incubation time of these two viruses is less than one week, followed by an approximately 2-week illness.
targetString: به طور کلی، زمان نهفتگی این دو ویروس کمتر از یک هفته است و پس از آن، بیماری تقریباً ۲ هفته‌ طول می‌کشد.
en-mt: In general, the incubation time of these two viruses is less than a week, and after that, the disease lasts approximately 2 weeks.

sourceString: According to a human volunteer study, healthy individuals infected with HCoV-229E developed mild common cold.
targetString: طبق مطالعات انجام شده بر روی داوطلبان انسانی، افراد سالمی که به HCoV-229E آلوده شدند، دچار سرماخوردگی خفیف شدند.
en-mt: According to studies conducted on human volunteers, healthy people who were infected with HCoV-229E developed a mild cold.

sourceString: Only a few immunocompromised patients exhibited severe lower respiratory tract infection.
targetString: فقط در چند بیمار دارای نقص ایمنی، عفونت شدید دستگاه تنفسی تحتانی مشاهده شد.
en-mt: Only a few immunocompromised patients had severe lower respiratory tract infection.

sourceString: SARS, also known as “atypical pneumonia”, was the first well documented HCoV-caused pandemic in human history and the etiological agent is SARS-CoV, the third HCoV discovered.
targetString: بیماری SARS، که به عنوان "ذات‌الریه آتی‌پیک" نیز شناخته می‌شود، اولین بیماری همه‌گیر در تاریخ بشر است که عامل آن SARS-CoV است و سومین HCoV کشف شده می‌باشد.
en-mt: SARS, also known as "At-Peak Pneumonia", is the first pandemic in human history to cause SARS-CoV and the third HCoV to be discovered.

sourceString: The first case of SARS can be traced back to late 2002 in Guangdong Province of China.
targetString: اولین مورد SARS را می‌توان در اواخر سال ۲۰۰۲ در استان گوانگدونگ چین ردیابی کرد.
en-mt: The first case of SARS can be traced back to late 2002 in Guangdong Province, China.

sourceString: The SARS epidemic resulted in 8,096 reported cases with 774 deaths, spreading across many countries and continents.
targetString: شیوع SARS موجب بیماری ۸،۰۹۶ تن شد و ۷۷۴ کشته بر جای گذاشت و در بسیاری از کشورها و قاره‌ها شیوع پیدا کرد.
en-mt: The SARS outbreak caused 8,096 people and killed 774 people, and spread across many countries and continents.

sourceString: Apart from the super-spreaders, it was estimated that each case could give rise to approximately two secondary cases, with an incubation period of 4 to 7 days and the peak of viral load appearing on the 10th day of illness.
targetString: بجز حالت‌های فوق‌العاده انتشار، تخمین زده شده که هر مورد ابتلا می‌تواند تقریباً دو مورد دیگر را مبتلا کند، دوره نهفتگی ۴ تا ۷ روز و اوج بار ویروسی در روز دهم بیماری ظاهر می‌شود.
en-mt: Apart from the extreme emission modes, it has been estimated that each case can infect approximately two others, with a latency period of 4 to 7 days and a peak viral load appearing on day 10 of the disease.

sourceString: Patients infected with SARS-CoV initially present with myalgia, headache, fever, malaise and chills, followed by dyspnea, cough and respiratory distress as late symptoms.
targetString: بیماران مبتلا به SARS - CoV در ابتدا دچار درد عضلانی، سردرد، تب، ضعف و لرز می‌شدند و پس از آن تنگی نفس، سرفه و دیسترس تنفسی به عنوان نشانه‌های بعدی ظاهر می‌شد.
en-mt: Patients with SARS-CoV initially developed muscle pain, headache, fever, weakness and chills, followed by shortness of breath, cough and respiratory distress as subsequent symptoms.

sourceString: Lymphopenia, deranged liver function tests, and elevated creatine kinase are common laboratory abnormalities of SARS.
targetString: لنفوپنی، آزمایش کارکرد کبد معیوب و کیناز سراتین افزایش یافته، ناهنجاری‌های آزمایشگاهی معمول SARS هستند.
en-mt: Lymphopenia, impaired liver function tests, and enhanced ceratin kinase are common laboratory abnormalities of SARS.

sourceString: Diffuse alveolar damage, epithelial cell proliferation and an increase of macrophages are also observed in SARS patients.
targetString: تخریب گسترده آلوئولی، تکثیر سلول‌های اپیتلیال و افزایش ماکروفاژها نیز در بیماران سارس مشاهده شده ‌است.
en-mt: Extensive alveolar degradation, proliferation of epithelial cells and increased macrophages have also been observed in SARS patients.

sourceString: Approximately 20-30% of patients subsequently require intensive care and mechanical ventilation.
targetString: متعاقباً حدود ۲۰ تا ۳۰ درصد از بیماران نیاز به مراقبت ویژه و ونتیلاتور مکانیکی داشتند.
en-mt: Subsequently, about 20 to 30 percent of patients required intensive care and mechanical ventilators.

sourceString: In addition to lower respiratory tract, multiple organs including gastrointestinal tract, liver and kidney can also be infected in these severe cases, usually accompanied with a cytokine storm, which might be lethal particularly in immunocompromised patients.
targetString: علاوه بر دستگاه تنفسی تحتانی، اندام‌های متعددی از جمله دستگاه گوارش، کبد و کلیه در موارد حاد مبتلا می‌شد که معمولا همراه با یک طوفان سیتوکین بود که می توانست به ویژه در بیماران دارای نقص ایمنی کشنده باشد.
en-mt: In addition to the lower respiratory tract, numerous organs including the gastrointestinal, liver and kidney were affected in acute cases, usually accompanied by a cytokine storm that could be fatal, especially in immunocompromised patients.

sourceString: The virus was first isolated from the open lung biopsy of a relative of the index patient who travelled to Hong Kong from Guangzhou.
targetString: این ویروس اولین بار طی عملیات بافت‌برداری ریه باز یکی از بستگان بیمار شاخص که از گوانگ‌ژو به هنگ‌کنگ سفر کرده بود، نمونه‌برداری شد.
en-mt: The virus was first sampled during an open lung biopsy operation of a relative of the flagship patient who traveled from Guangzhou to Hong Kong.

sourceString: Since then, tremendous efforts have been dedicated to HCoV research.
targetString: از آن زمان به بعد تلاش‌های زیادی برای تحقیقات بر روی HCoV صورت گرفته است.
en-mt: Since then, there has been a lot of research into HCoV.

sourceString: HCoV-NL63 was isolated from a 7-month-old child from the Netherlands during late 2004.
targetString: HCoV - NL۶۳ در اواخر سال ۲۰۰۴ از یک کودک ۷ ماهه از هلند جدا شد.
en-mt: HCoV NL63 was separated from a 7-month-old baby from the Netherlands in late 2004.

sourceString: It was initially found to be prevalent in young children, the elderly and immunocompromised patients with respiratory illnesses.
targetString: در ابتدا مشخص شد که این بیماری در کودکان خردسال، بیماران مسن و افراد دارای نقص ایمنی مبتلا به بیماری‌های تنفسی شایع است.
en-mt: It was initially found to be common in young children, elderly patients and immunocompromised people with respiratory diseases.

sourceString: Presentation of coryza, conjunctivitis, fever, and bronchiolitis is common in the disease caused by HCoV-NL63.
targetString: زکام، ورم ملتحمه، تب و برونشیت در بیماری ایجاد شده توسط HCoV - NL۶۳ شایع است.
en-mt: Cold, conjunctivitis, fever and bronchitis are common in the disease caused by HCoV-NL63.

sourceString: Another independent study described the isolation of the same virus from a nasal specimen from an 8-month-old boy suffering from pneumonia in the Netherlands.
targetString: در یک مطالعه مستقل دیگر، جداسازی همان ویروس از نمونه بینی یک پسر ۸ ماهه که از ذات‌الریه در هلند رنج می‌برد شرح داده شده است.
en-mt: In another independent study, the same virus was isolated from the nasal sample of an 8-month-old boy suffering from pneumonia in the Netherlands.

sourceString: Although it was identified in Netherlands, it is actually distributed globally.
targetString: اگرچه این ویروس در هلند شناسایی شد، اما در واقع در سطح جهانی پخش شد.
en-mt: Although the virus was detected in the Netherlands, it actually spread globally.

sourceString: It has been estimated that HCoV-NL63 accounts for approximately 4.7% of common respiratory diseases, and its peak incidence occurs during early summer, spring and winter.
targetString: تخمین زده شده‌است که HCoV - NL۶۳ عامل حدود ۴.۷ درصد از بیماری‌های مزمن تنفسی است و اوج شیوع آن در اوایل تابستان، بهار و زمستان رخ می‌دهد.
en-mt: HCoV-NL63 is estimated to cause about 4.7% of chronic respiratory diseases, with peak outbreaks occurring in early summer, spring and winter.

sourceString: HCoV-NL63 is associated with obstructive laryngitis, also known as croup.
targetString: HCoV-NL۶۳ با التهاب حنجره انسدادی همراه است که به نام کروپ نیز شناخته می‌شود.
en-mt: HCoV-NL63 is associated with obstructive laryngeal inflammation, also known as croup.

sourceString: In the same year, HCoV-HKU1 was isolated from a 71-year-old man who had been hospitalized with pneumonia and bronchiolitis in Hong Kong.
targetString: در همان سال، HCoV-HKU1 از یک مرد ۷۱ ساله جدا شد که در هنگ‌کنگ در اثر ذات‌الریه و برونشیت بستری شده‌ بود.
en-mt: That same year, HCoV-HKU1 was separated from a 71-year-old man who had been hospitalized in Hong Kong for pneumonia and bronchitis.

sourceString: Besides community-acquired pneumonia and bronchiolitis, HCoV-HKU1 was reported to be associated with acute asthmatic exacerbation.
targetString: علاوه بر ابتلا به ذات‌الریه و برونشیت، گزارش شده ‌است که HCoV - HKU۱ با تشدید بیماری آسم از نوع حاد در ارتباط است.
en-mt: In addition to pneumonia and bronchitis, HCoV-HKU1 has been reported to be associated with exacerbation of acute asthma.

sourceString: Similar to HCoV-NL63, HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 was found worldwide, causing mild respiratory diseases.
targetString: همانند HCoV-NL63، HCoV-229E و HCoV-229E ویروس HCoV-HKU1 در سراسر جهان یافت شده و موجب بیماریهای تنفسی خفیف می‌شود.
en-mt: Like HCoV-NL63, HCoV-229E and HCoV-229E are found worldwide and cause mild respiratory diseases.

sourceString: All these four community-acquired HCoVs have been well adapted to humans and are generally less likely to mutate to cause highly pathogenic diseases, though accidents did occur for unknown reasons as in the rare case of a more virulent subtype of HCoV-NL63, which has recently been reported to cause severe lower respiratory tract infection in China.
targetString: این چهار خانواده منتقل شده از طریق جامعه، به خوبی با انسان‌ها سازگار شده‌اند و به طور کلی کمتر مستعد بیماری‌هایی شدید هستند، هر چند مواردی به دلایل نامعلومی به وقوع می‌پیوست، مثلاً در موردی نادر به تازگی گزارش شده‌است، نوع بدخیم HCoV-NL63 موجب عفونت دستگاه تنفسی پایینی در چین شده ‌است.
en-mt: These four community-borne families have adapted well to humans and are generally less susceptible to severe diseases, though cases occurred for unknown reasons, for example, in a rare case recently reported, the malignant HCoV-NL63 variant has caused lower respiratory tract infections in China.

sourceString: Generally, when these HCoVs acquire the abilities to transmit efficiently and to maintain themselves continuously within humans, they also become less virulent or pathogenic.
targetString: به طور کلی، زمانی که این HCoVها توانایی انتقال موثر و حفظ مداوم خود را در انسان‌ها بدست می‌آورند، شدت ویرولانس یا بیماری‌زایش کاهش می‌یابد.
en-mt: In general, when these HCoVs gain the ability to effectively transport and maintain themselves in humans, virulence or pathogenesis is reduced.

sourceString: MERS-CoV was first isolated in 2012 from the lung of a 60-year-old patient who developed acute pneumonia and renal failure in Saudi Arabia.
targetString: MERS - CoV در سال ۲۰۱۲ از ریه یک بیمار ۶۰ ساله که مبتلا به ذات‌الریه حاد و نارسایی کلیوی در عربستان‌سعودی بود جدا شد.
en-mt: MERS-CoV was isolated in 2012 from the lung of a 60-year-old patient with acute pneumonia and kidney failure in Saudi Arabia.

sourceString: Whereas most of the laboratory-confirmed cases originate from the Middle East, imported cases with occasional secondary spreads to close contacts have been reported in various European countries and Tunisia.
targetString: در حالی که اکثر موارد تایید شده آزمایشگاهی این ویروس از خاورمیانه نشأت می‌گیرند، اما موارد وارداتی با انتشار ثانویه بدلیل تماس‌های نزدیک در کشورهای مختلف اروپایی و تونس گزارش شده‌ است.
en-mt: While most laboratory-confirmed cases of the virus originate from the Middle East, imported secondary infections have been reported due to close contacts in various European countries and Tunisia.

sourceString: Another secondary outbreak occurred in South Korea in 2015 with 186 confirmed cases.
targetString: شیوع دوم دیگر در کره‌جنوبی در سال ۲۰۱۵ با ۱۸۶ مورد تایید شد.
en-mt: Another second outbreak was confirmed in South Korea in 2015 with 186 cases.

sourceString: Clinical manifestations of MERS resemble those of SARS, characterized by progressive acute pneumonia.
targetString: ظهور بالینی MERS مشابه بیماری SARS است، که با ذات‌الریه حاد پیش رونده شناخته می‌شود.
en-mt: The clinical appearance of MERS is similar to SARS, which is characterized by progressive acute pneumonia.

sourceString: Unlike SARS, many patients with MERS also developed acute renal failure, which is thus far unique for MERS among HCoV-caused diseases.
targetString: بر خلاف SARS، بسیاری از بیماران مبتلا به MERS دچار نارسایی حاد کلیوی نیز می‌شدند که در میان بیماری‌های ناشی از HCoV مختص MERS می‌باشد.
en-mt: Unlike SARS, many patients with MERS also developed acute renal failure, which is specific to MERS among diseases caused by HCoV.

sourceString: More than 30% of patients present with gastrointestinal symptoms, such as diarrhea and vomiting.
targetString: بیش از ۳۰ درصد از بیماران دارای علائم گوارشی مانند اسهال و استفراغ بودند.
en-mt: More than 30 percent of patients had gastrointestinal symptoms such as diarrhea and vomiting.

sourceString: As of February 14, 2020, over 2500 laboratory confirmed cases were reported with a high case fatality of 34.4%, making MERS-CoV one of the most devastating viruses known to humans.
targetString: تا ۱۴ فوریه ۲۰۲۰ بیش از ۲۵۰۰ مورد تایید شده آزمایشگاهی با تلفات زیاد در حد ۳۴.۴ درصد گزارش شد که باعث شد MERS - CoV یکی از خطرناک ترین ویروس‌های شناخته‌شده برای انسان‌ها باشد.
en-mt: As of February 14, 2020, more than 2,500 confirmed laboratory cases with a high mortality rate of 34.4 percent had been reported, making MERS-CoV one of the most dangerous viruses known to humans.

sourceString: During middle to late December 2019, clusters of pneumonia patients retrospectively known to be associated with SARS-CoV-2 infection were detected in Wuhan, Hubei Province, China.
targetString: از اواسط تا اواخر دسامبر ۲۰۱۹، خوشه‌های بیمارانی که به بیماری‌های عفونی مرتبط با SARS-CoV-2 مبتلا بودند، در ووهان استان هوبی چین شناسایی شدند.
en-mt: From mid to late December 2019, clusters of patients with SARS-CoV-2-related infectious diseases were identified in Wuhan, Hubei Province, China.

sourceString: World Health Organization declared the ongoing outbreak of lower respiratory tract infection caused by SARS-CoV-2 a Public Health Emergency of International Concern and also named the disease COVID-19.
targetString: سازمان بهداشت جهانی آغاز شیوع عفونت دستگاه تنفسی تحتانی را که بدلیل SARS-CoV-2 بود وضعیت اضطراری سلامت عمومی در سطح جهان اعلام کرد و این بیماری را کووید-19 نامید.
en-mt: The World Health Organization declared the outbreak of lower respiratory tract infection caused by SARS-CoV-2 a global public health emergency and called the disease COVID-19.

sourceString: As of March 3, 2020, 90,053 cases have been confirmed worldwide, with a crude case fatality of 3.4%.
targetString: تا سوم مارس ۲۰۲۰، تعداد موارد تایید شده در سراسر جهان به ۹۰،۰۵۳ رسید و درصد تلفات خام آن ۳.۴ درصد شد.
en-mt: By March 3, 2020, the number of confirmed cases worldwide had reached 90,053, with a crude death rate of 3.4%.

sourceString: Notably, the case fatality in Hubei, China is 4.2%, whereas the one outside of it is 1.2%.
targetString: قابل ‌ذکر است که موارد مرگ در هوبی چین ۴.۲% بود در حالی که در خارج از آن ۱.۲% بود.
en-mt: Cases of death in Hubei, China, were 4.2%, while outside it was 1.2%.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 causes severe respiratory infection like SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, presented as fever, cough and dyspnea.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 مانند SARS - CoV و MERS - CoV باعث عفونت تنفسی شدید می‌شود که به صورت تب، سرفه و تنگی نفس دیده می‌شود.
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2, like SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, causes severe respiratory infections, which can be seen as fever, cough and shortness of breath.

sourceString: Diarrhea is also seen in some patients.
targetString: اسهال نیز در برخی از بیماران دیده می‌شود.
en-mt: Diarrhea is also seen in some patients.

sourceString: Pneumonia is one of the most severe symptoms and can progress rapidly to acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: ذات‌الریه یکی از شدیدترین علائم است و به سرعت می‌تواند به سندروم دیسترس تنفسی حاد تبدیل شود.
en-mt: Pneumonia is one of the most severe symptoms and can quickly develop into acute respiratory distress syndrome.

sourceString: Although SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 are very similar due to high nucleotide sequence homology of 82%, they cluster into different branches in the phylogenetic tree.
targetString: اگرچه SARS-CoV و SARS-CoV-2 خیلی شبیه هستند که به دلیل ۸۲٪ همولوگی بالای توالی نوکلئوتید است، اما به شاخه‌های مختلفی در درخت فیلوژنتیک خوشه‌بندی می‌شوند.
en-mt: Although SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 are very similar, due to their 82% high homologous nucleotide sequence, they are clustered into different branches in the phylogenetic tree.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 is apparently less pathogenic but more transmissible compared to SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV.
targetString: ظاهرا SARS-CoV-2 در مقایسه با SARS - CoV و MERS- CoV، بیماری‌زایی کمتری دارد اما قابلیت انتقال آن بیشتر است.
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 appears to be less virulent than SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, but is more transmissible.

sourceString: Asymptomatic subjects infected with SARS-CoV-2 have been reported and might contribute to its rapid spreading around the world.
targetString: گزارش شده برخی افراد مبتلا شده به SARS-CoV-2 دارای هیچ علائمی نبودند که این موضوع می‌تواند به گسترش سریع آن در سراسر جهان کمک کند.
en-mt: Some people with SARS-CoV-2 reported no symptoms, which could help it spread rapidly around the world.

sourceString: Comparing and contrasting SARS-CoV-2 with the other six HCoVs reveal similarities and differences of great interest.
targetString: مقایسه و تقابل SARS-CoV-2 با شش HCoV دیگر شباهت‌ها و تفاوت‌های قابل‌توجهی را نشان می‌دهد.
en-mt: Comparison of SARS-CoV-2 with six HCoVs shows significant similarities and differences.

sourceString: First, the incubation period and the duration of the course of HCoV disease are very similar.
targetString: اولین مورد اینکه دوره نهفتگی و مدت زمان دوره بیماریهای HCoV بسیار مشابه هم هستند.
en-mt: The first is that the incubation period and the duration of HCoV are very similar.

sourceString: In this regard, SARS-CoV-2 follows the general trend of the other six HCoVs.
targetString: در این رابطه SARS-CoV-2 از روند کلی شش HCoV دیگر تبعیت می‌کند.
en-mt: In this regard, SARS-CoV-2 follows the general trend of six HCoVs.

sourceString: Second, the severity of symptoms of COVID-19 lies between SARS-CoV and the four community-acquired HCoVs (i.e. HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-NL63).
targetString: ثانیاً، شدت علائم کووید-19 حد وسط SARS-CoV و چهار HCoV منتقل شده از جامعه است (یعنی HCoV-229E، HCoV-OC43، HCoV-HKU1 و HCoV-NL63).
en-mt: Secondly, the severity of COVID-19 symptoms is the median of SARS-CoV and four community-acquired HCoVs (i.e., HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-NL63).

sourceString: On one hand, SARS-CoV-2 infection exhibits features that are more commonly seen during infection with community-acquired HCoVs, including the presentation of non-specific, mild or even no symptoms.
targetString: از یک سو عفونت SARS-CoV-2 ویژگیهایی را نشان می‌دهد که معمولا در عفونتهای HCoVهای منتقل شده از جامعه دیده می‌شود، از جمله علائم غیر ویژه، ملایم یا حتی در برخی موارد بدون علائم.
en-mt: On the one hand، SARS-CoV-2 infection exhibits characteristics commonly seen in community-transmitted HCoV infections، including non-specific، mild، or even symptom-free symptoms.

sourceString: On the other hand, a small subset of severe cases of COVID-19 can also be seen as in the case of SARS-CoV infection, although the ratio is a bit lower.
targetString: از طرف دیگر، زیر مجموعه کوچکی از موارد حاد کووید-19 نیز می‌تواند در مورد عفونت SARS - CoV دیده شود، اگر چه نسبت آن کمی پایین‌تر است.
en-mt: On the other hand, a small subset of acute cases of COVID-19 can also be seen in the case of SARS-CoV infection, although the proportion is slightly lower.

sourceString: Third, the transmission of SARS-CoV-2 also shows interesting patterns characteristic of both community-acquired HCoVs and SARS-CoV.
targetString: ثالثاً، انتقال SARS-CoV-2 الگوهای جالبی از HCoVها و SARS - CoV منتقل شده از جامعه را نشان می‌دهد.
en-mt: Thirdly, the transmission of SARS-CoV-2 shows interesting patterns of community-transmitted HCoVs and SARS-CoVs.

sourceString: On one hand, the transmissibility of SARS-CoV-2 is at least as high as that of community-acquired HCoVs.
targetString: از یک طرف، قابلیت انتقال SARS-CoV-2 حداقل به اندازه HCoVهای منتقل شده از جامعه است.
en-mt: On the one hand, the transmissibility of SARS-CoV-2 is at least as much as community-transmitted HCoVs.

sourceString: On the other hand, it remains to be verified whether the transmissibility of SARS-CoV-2 decreases after passages in humans as in the cases of SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV.
targetString: از طرف دیگر، باید تایید شود که آیا قابلیت انتقال SARS-CoV-2 همانند SARS-CoV و MERS-CoV پس از چند بار انتقال بین انسانها کاهش می‌یابد یا خیر.
en-mt: On the other hand, it needs to be confirmed whether the transmissibility of SARS-CoV-2, such as SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, decreases after several transmissions between humans.

sourceString: Finally, same as the other HCoVs, SARS-CoV-2 can be detected in fecal samples.
targetString: در نهایت، همانند دیگر HCoVها، SARS-CoV-2 را می‌توان در نمونه‌های مدفوع تشخیص داد.
en-mt: Finally, like other HCoVs, SARS-CoV-2 can be detected in stool samples.

sourceString: Whether fecal-oral transmission of SARS-CoV-2 plays an important role as in the case of SARS-CoV at least under some circumstance remains to be clarified by future studies.
targetString: این که انتقال SARS-CoV-2 از طریق مدفوع یا ادرار همانند SARS - CoV نقش مهمی در مورد انتقال ایفا می‌کند حداقل در برخی شرایط، باید توسط مطالعات آینده روشن شود.
en-mt: Whether the transmission of SARS-CoV-2 through feces or urine as well as SARS-CoV plays an important role in the case of transmission, at least in some circumstances, should be clarified by future studies.

sourceString: It is also of particularly great interest to see whether SARS-CoV-2 might exhibit seasonality as in the cases of community-acquired HCoVs.
targetString: همچنین جالب توجه است که ببینیم آیا SARS-CoV-2 همانند HCoVهای منتقل شده از جامعه، ممکن است فصلی باشد یا خیر.
en-mt: It is also interesting to see whether SARS-CoV-2 may be seasonal, as well as community-transmitted HCoVs.

sourceString: Nevertheless, the features of SARS-CoV-2 including its transmissibility, pathogenicity and sustainable spreading after passages in humans will be influential on the ultimate fate of the ongoing outbreak of COVID-19.
targetString: با این حال، ویژگی‌های SARS-CoV-2 شامل قابلیت انتقال، بیماری‌زایی و گسترش پایدار بعد از انتقال از فردی به فرد دیگر بر سرنوشت نهایی شیوع حال حاضر کووید-19 تاثیر خواهند گذاشت.
en-mt: However, the characteristics of SARS-CoV-2, including transmissibility, pathogenicity, and sustained post-transmission from person to person, will affect the final fate of the current outbreak of COVID-19.

sourceString: All four community-acquired HCoVs causing mild symptoms have been well adapted to humans.
targetString: هر چهار HCoV منتقل شده از جامعه که علائم خفیف بیماری را بوجود می‌آورند، به خوبی با انسان‌ها سازگار شده‌اند.
en-mt: All four community-acquired HCoVs that cause mild symptoms of the disease have adapted well to humans.

sourceString: From another perspective, it might also be true that humans have been well adapted to these four HCoVs.
targetString: از دیدگاه دیگر ممکن است این موضوع درست باشد که انسان‌ها به خوبی با این چهار HCoV سازگار شده‌اند.
en-mt: From another perspective, it may be true that humans are well adapted to these four HCoVs.

sourceString: In other words, both could be the survivors of ancient HCoV pandemics.
targetString: به عبارت دیگر، هر دو می‌توانند بازماندگان همه‌گیری HCoV باستانی باشند.
en-mt: In other words, both could be survivors of the ancient HCoV pandemic.

sourceString: HCoVs that cause severe diseases in humans and humans who developed severe HCoV diseases have been eliminated.
targetString: HCoVهایی که بیماری‌های شدیدی را در انسان‌ها ایجاد می‌کردند و انسان‌هایی که به بیماری‌های HCoV شدید مبتلا شدند اکنون از بین رفته‌اند.
en-mt: The HCoVs that caused severe diseases in humans and humans who developed severe HCoV diseases are now gone.

sourceString: For this to happen, HCoVs have to replicate in humans to sufficient extent to allow the accumulation of adaptive mutations that counteract host restriction factors.
targetString: برای این منظور، HCoVها باید در انسان‌ها به حد کافی تکثیر شوند تا اجازه تجمع جهش‌های انطباقی را بدهند که عوامل محدودکننده میزبان را خنثی ‌کند.
en-mt: To this end, HCoVs must be amplified enough in humans to allow the accumulation of adaptive mutations that neutralize host limiting factors.

sourceString: In this sense, the longer the SARS-CoV-2 outbreak persists and the more people that it infects, the greater chance that it will fully adapt to humans.
targetString: در این حالت، هرچه شیوع SARS-CoV-2 بیشتر ادامه یابد و افراد بیشتری به این بیماری مبتلا شوند، شانس بیشتری برای سازگاری کامل این ویروس با انسان‌ وجود خواهد داشت.
en-mt: In this case, the longer the outbreak of SARS-CoV-2 continues and the more people become infected, the greater the chance that the virus will fully adapt to humans.

sourceString: If it adapts well, its transmission in humans would be difficult to stop by quarantine or other infection control measures.
targetString: ویروس اگر به خوبی سازگار شود، جلوگیری از انتقال آن در انسان‌ توسط قرنطینه یا دیگر اقدامات کنترل عفونت، دشوار خواهد شد.
en-mt: If the virus adapts well, it will be difficult to prevent transmission in humans by quarantine or other infection control measures.

sourceString: For many years, the four community-acquired CoVs circulate in human populations, triggering common cold in immunocompetent subjects.
targetString: چندین سال است که چهار CoV اکتسابی از جامعه در جوامع انسانی گردش می‌کنند و باعث بروز سرماخوردگی معمولی در افرادی با سیستم ایمنی سالم می‌شوند.
en-mt: Four community-acquired CoVs have been circulating in human societies for several years, causing common colds in people with healthy immune systems.

sourceString: These viruses do not need an animal reservoir.
targetString: این ویروس‌ها به منبع حیوانی نیاز ندارند.
en-mt: These viruses do not require an animal source.

sourceString: In contrast, highly pathogenic SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV have not adapted to humans well and their transmission within humans cannot be sustained.
targetString: در مقابل، SARS-CoV و MERS-CoV با انسان‌ها سازگار نشده‌اند و انتقال آنها بین انسان‌ها نمی‌تواند پایدار باشد.
en-mt: In contrast, SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV have not adapted to humans, and their transmission between humans cannot be sustained.

sourceString: They need to maintain and propagate in their zoonotic reservoirs and seek the chance to spillover to susceptible human targets, possibly via one or more intermediate and amplifying hosts.
targetString: این ویروسها نیاز به حفظ و انتشار در مخازن حیوانی خود دارند و به دنبال فرصت برای مبتلا کردن اهداف انسانی مستعد هستند، که احتمالا از طریق یک یا چند میزبان میانی و تقویت کننده انجام می‌شود.
en-mt: These viruses need to be kept and propagated in their animal reservoirs and seek opportunities to infect susceptible human targets, possibly through one or more intermediate and booster hosts.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 has features that are similar to both SARS-CoV/MERS-CoV and the four community-acquired HCoVs.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ویژگی‌هایی دارد که با SARS - CoV یا MERS- CoV و چهار HCoV بدست آمده از جامعه مشابه است.
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 has features that are similar to SARS-CoV or MERS-CoV and four HCoV derived from the community.

sourceString: It is highly transmissible like community-acquired HCoVs, at least for the time being.
targetString: این ویروس همانند HCoVهای منتقل شده از جامعه، قابلیت انتقال بالایی دارد حداقل برای زمان حاضر.
en-mt: Like community-transmitted HCoVs، the virus has a high transmissibility at least for the time being.

sourceString: However, it is more pathogenic than community-acquired HCoVs and less pathogenic than SARS-CoV or MERS-CoV.
targetString: با این حال، بیماری‌زایی آن از HCoVهای منتقل شده از جامعه کمتر و از SARS - CoV یا MERS - CoV بیشتر است.
en-mt: However, its pathogenicity is lower than community-transmitted HCoVs and higher than SARS-CoV or MERS-CoV.

sourceString: It remains to be seen whether it will adapt fully to humans and circulate within humans without a reservoir or intermediate animal host.
targetString: باید منتظر ماند و دید که آیا این ویروس به طور کامل با انسان‌ سازگار می‌شود و بین انسان‌ها‌ بدون رزروار (مخزن) واسط یا میزبان حیوانی منتقل می‌شود یا خیر.
en-mt: It remains to wait and see if the virus adapts fully to humans and is transmitted between humans without intermediate reservations or animal hosts.

sourceString: Before discussing the animal origins of HCoVs, it will serve us well to discuss the definitions and characteristics of evolutionary, natural, reservoir, intermediate and amplifying hosts of HCoVs.
targetString: قبل از بحث در مورد منشا حیوانی HCoVها، بررسی تعاریف و ویژگی‌های میزبانان تکاملی، طبیعی، مخازن، میزبانان واسطه‌ و تکثیردهنده HCoVها مفید خواهد بود.
en-mt: Before discussing the animal origin of HCoVs, it will be helpful to investigate the definitions and characteristics of evolutionary, natural, reservoirs, intermediate hosts and propagators of HCoVs.

sourceString: An animal serves as the evolutionary host of an HCoV if it harbours a closely related ancestor sharing high homology at the level of nucleotide sequence.
targetString: اگر حیوانی پناهگاه یک جد نزدیک ویروسی باشد که همسانی بالایی در سطح توالی نوکلیوتیدی داشته باشد، آن حیوان به عنوان میزبان تکاملی HCoV عمل می‌کند.
en-mt: If a sanctuary animal is a close ancestor of a virus that has high homogeneity at the level of nucleotide sequence, that animal acts as an evolutionary host of HCoV.

sourceString: The ancestral virus is usually well adapted and non-pathogenic in this host.
targetString: ویروس اجدادی معمولا در میزبان به خوبی سازگار شده و برای آن بیماری‌زا نیست.
en-mt: The ancestral virus is usually well adapted in the host and is not pathogenic.

sourceString: Likewise, a reservoir host harbours HCoV continuously and for long term.
targetString: به همین ترتیب، یک میزبان مخزن، بی وقفه و برای مدت طولانی به HCoV پناه می‌دهد.
en-mt: Likewise, a reservoir host shelters HCoV endlessly and for a long time.

sourceString: In both cases, the hosts are naturally infected and are the natural hosts of HCoV or its parental virus.
targetString: در هر دو حالت، میزبان به طور طبیعی آلوده شده و میزبان طبیعی HCoV یا ویروس‌های والدش است.
en-mt: In both cases, the host is naturally infected and the natural host is HCoV, or its parent viruses.

sourceString: In contrast, if the HCoV is newly introduced to an intermediate host right before or around its introduction to humans, it is not well adapted to the new host and is often pathogenic.
targetString: در مقابل، اگر HCoV قبل از آلوده کردن انسان‌، یا حدودا همان زمان میزبان واسط داشته باشد، به خوبی با میزبان جدید سازگار نشده و اغلب بیماری‌زا است.
en-mt: Conversely, if HCoV has an intermediate host before infecting humans, or about the same time, it is not well adapted to the new host and is often pathogenic.

sourceString: This intermediate host can serve as the zoonotic source of human infection and play the role of an amplifying host by allowing the virus to replicate transiently and then transmitting it to humans to amplify the scale of human infection.
targetString: این میزبان واسط می‌تواند به عنوان مخزن حیوانی عفونت انسان عمل کرده، و در نقش میزبان تکثیردهنده با فراهم کردن امکان تکثیر موقت ویروس و سپس انتقال آن به انسان، سطح عفونت را در انسان افزایش دهد.
en-mt: This intermediate host can act as an animal reservoir of human infection, increasing the level of infection in humans by allowing the virus to temporarily replicate and then transmit it to humans.

sourceString: An HCoV can undergo a dead-end infection if it cannot sustain its transmission within the intermediate host.
targetString: HCoV اگر نتواند انتقال خود را در میزبان میانی پایدار نگه دارد، می‌تواند عفونتهای مرگبار ایجاد کند.
en-mt: HCoV can cause deadly infections if it fails to keep its transmission stable in the intermediate host.

sourceString: On the contrary, HCoVs can also adapt to the intermediate host and even establish long-term endemicity.
targetString: برعکس، HCoVها می‌توانند با میزبان میانی سازگار شوند و حتی بصورت بلند مدت در گروه میزبان حضور داشته باشد.
en-mt: Conversely, HCoVs can adapt to the intermediate host and even be present in the host group on a long-term basis.

sourceString: In this case, the intermediate host becomes a natural reservoir host.
targetString: در این حالت، میزبان میانی به عنوان یک میزبان مخزن طبیعی عمل می‌کند.
en-mt: In this case, the intermediate host acts as a natural reservoir host.

sourceString: Epidemiological data revealed retrospectively that the index case of SARS had a contact history with game animals.
targetString: داده‌های اپیدمیولوژی نشان می‌دهند که نخستین فرد مبتلا شده به SARS با حیوانات شکاری سروکار داشته است.
en-mt: Epidemiological data show that the first person infected with SARS dealt with prey animals.

sourceString: Subsequent seroprevalence investigations indicated that animal traders had a higher prevalence of anti-SARS-CoV IgG compared with that of the general population.
targetString: بررسی‌های بعدی شیوع سرمی نشان می‌دهد که سطح ایمنوگلوبین G ضد ویروس سارس در فروشندگان محصولات حیوانی نسبت به مردم عادی بیشتر است.
en-mt: Subsequent studies of seroprevalence show that SARS antiviral immunoglobulin G levels are higher in animal product vendors than in the general population.

sourceString: Masked palm civets (Paguma larvata) and a racoon dog in live animal markets were first identified to carry SARS-CoV-like viruses that are almost identical to SARS-CoV.
targetString: برای اولین بار تعدادی زباد نخلی نقاب‌دار (Paguma larvata) و یک سگ راکون در بازار حیوانات زنده حامل ویروس‌های شبه SARS - CoV تشخیص داده شدند که تقریبا با SARS-CoV یکی بودند.
en-mt: For the first time, a number of masked palm trees (Paguma larvata) and a raccoon dog were detected at a live animal market carrying SARS-CoV-like viruses, which were roughly identical to SARS-CoV.

sourceString: This was indirectly supported by the fact that no further SARS was reported after killing all civets in the markets.
targetString: یک مشخصه حذف ۲۹ - نوکلیوتیدی برای SARS-CoV در نژادهای گرفته شده در آغاز اپیدمی انسانی یافت شده ‌است.
en-mt: A 29-nucleotide deletion characteristic for SARS-CoV has been found in races taken at the beginning of the human epidemic.

sourceString: However, it has been reported that masked palm civets from the wild or farms without exposure to the live animal markets were largely negative for SARS-CoV, suggesting that masked palm civets might only serve as the intermediate amplifying host but not the natural reservoir of SARS-CoV.
targetString: در عین حال، گزارش شده‌ است که زبادهای نخلی نقاب‌دار ساکن جنگل یا مزارع که در بازار حیوانات زنده عرضه نشده بودند عمدتا از نظر وجود ویروس SARS - CoV منفی بودند. این موضوع نشان می‌دهد که زباد نخلی نقاب‌دار احتمالا فقط میزبان واسط و تکثیردهنده است، نه مخزن طبیعی SARS - CoV.
en-mt: At the same time, it has been reported that forest-dwelling or farm-based masked palm trees that were not supplied to live animal markets were largely negative for SARS-CoV virus. This suggests that the masked palm is probably just a host of intermediates and propagators, not a natural reservoir of SARS-CoV.

sourceString: Notably, since 80% of the different animals in the markets in Guangzhou have anti-SARS-CoV antibodies, the possibilities that multiple species of small mammals might also serve as intermediate amplifying hosts of SARS-CoV cannot be excluded.
targetString: نکته قابل‌ذکر اینکه ۸۰ % حیوانات مختلف در بازارهای گوانگژو دارای پادتن ضد SARS - CoV هستند، لذا احتمال این که گونه‌های متعدد از پستانداران کوچک نیز ممکن است به عنوان میزبان‌های تقویت‌کننده میانی برای SARS - CoV عمل کنند را نمی‌توان کنار گذاشت.
en-mt: 80% of different animals in Guangzhou markets have anti-SARS-CoV antibodies, so the possibility that multiple species of small mammals may also act as intermediate booster hosts for SARS-CoV cannot be ruled out.

sourceString: All of these appear to be dead-end hosts of SARS-CoV.
targetString: همه اینها ظاهرا میزبان‌های نهایی SARS - CoV هستند.
en-mt: All of these are apparently the ultimate SARS-CoV hosts.

sourceString: Subsequent search for the natural animal host of SARS-CoV unveiled a closely related bat CoV, termed SARS-related Rhinolophus bat CoV HKU3 (SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3), which exists in Chinese horseshoe bats.
targetString: در جستجوی بعدی بدنبال میزبان حیوانی طبیعی SARS - CoV ، یک نوع کرونا ویروس که قرابت زیادی با CoV خفاشی داشت و بنام کرونا ویروس HKU3 مرتبط با سارس، خفاش نعل اسبی (SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3) خوانده می‌شد پیدا شد که در خفاش نعل اسبی چینی زندگی می‌کرد.
en-mt: A subsequent search was found for a natural animal host of SARS-CoV, a variant of corona virus closely related to bat CoV, called the SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3 coronavirus associated with SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3, that lived in a Chinese horseshoe bat.

sourceString: These bats are positive for anti-SARS-CoV antibodies and genome sequence of SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3.
targetString: این خفاش‌ها از نظر پادتن ضد SARS-CoV و توالی ژنوم SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3 مثبت هستند.
en-mt: These bats are positive for anti-SARS-CoV antibodies and SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3 genome.

sourceString: This and other bat CoVs share 88-92% nucleotide sequence homology with SARS-CoV.
targetString: این ویروس و سایر CoVهای خفاشی، ۸۸ تا ۹۲ درصد شباهت توالی نوکلئوتیدی با SARS-CoV دارند.
en-mt: This virus and other bat CoVs are 88 to 92 percent similar to SARS-CoV.

sourceString: These studies have laid the foundation for the new concept that bats host emerging human pathogens.
targetString: این مطالعات، زمینه‌ای شد برای نظریه‌‌ای جدید که می‌گوید خفاش میزبان ویروس‌‌های جدید بیماری‌زای انسانی است.
en-mt: These studies laid the groundwork for a new theory that bats host new human pathogenic viruses.

sourceString: Several SARS-like CoVs (SL-CoVs) have also been identified from bats, but none except for one designated WIV1 can be isolated as live virus.
targetString: تعدادی کرونا ویروس شبه سارس (SL-CoVs) نیز در خفاش‌ شناسایی شد، اما بجز WIV1 هیچ‌ کدام را نتوانستند به صورت ویروس زنده جدا کنند.
en-mt: A number of SARS-like coronaviruses (SL-CoVs) were also detected in bats, but none except WIV1 could be isolated as live viruses.

sourceString: Human angiotensin converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is known to be the receptor of SARS-CoV.
targetString: آنزیم مبدل آنژیوتانسین انسانی 2 (ACE2) بعنوان گیرنده SARS - CoV شناسایی شد.
en-mt: Human angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) was identified as SARS-CoV receptor.

sourceString: WIV1 derived from fecal sample of bats was demonstrated to use bat, civet and human ACE2 as receptor for cell entry.
targetString: WIV1 که از مدفوع خفاش به دست آمده بود نشان‌داد که از ACE۲ خفاش، سیوت و انسان به عنوان گیرنده برای ورود به سلول ‌استفاده می‌شود.
en-mt: WIV1, obtained from bat feces, showed that ACE2 was used by bats, civets and humans as receptors to enter cells.

sourceString: Intriguingly, sera of convalescent SARS patients were capable of neutralizing WIV1.
targetString: نکته جالب اینکه سرم بیماران بهبودیافته سارس، توانایی خنثی‌سازی WIV1 را داشت.
en-mt: Interestingly، the serum of SARS patients had the ability to neutralize WIV1.

sourceString: Thus far, WIV1 represents the most closely related ancestor of SARS-CoV in bats, sharing 95% nucleotide sequence homology.
targetString: تا کنون، WIV1 با ۹۵ درصد شباهت توالی نوکلئونیدی، نزدیک‌ترین جد SARS - CoV در خفاش‌ بوده است.
en-mt: So far, WIV1 has been the closest ancestor of SARS-CoV in bats, with 95% nucleonidal sequence similarity.

sourceString: Albeit the high homology between these two viruses, it is generally believed that WIV1 is not the immediate parental virus of SARS-CoV and bats are not the immediate reservoir host of SARS-CoV.
targetString: اگرچه همسانی زیادی بین این دو نوع ویروس وجود دارد، اما به طور کلی اعتقاد بر این است که ویروس WIV۱ والدین بلافصل SARS - CoV و خفاش‌ها، میزبان مخزن بلافصل SARS - CoV نیستند.
en-mt: Although there is a great similarity between the two variants, it is generally believed that the WIV1 virus of the immediate parent of SARS-CoV and bats is not the immediate reservoir host of SARS-CoV.

sourceString: Phylogenetic analysis clusters MERS-CoV to the same group as bat CoV-HKU4 and bat CoV-HKU5.
targetString: آنالیز فیلوژنتیک، MERS-CoV را با گروه مشابهی مانند bat CoV-HKU4 و bat CoV-HKU5 خوشه‌بندی می کند.
en-mt: Phylogenetic analysis clusters MERS-CoV with similar groups such as bat CoV-HKU4 and bat CoV-HKU5.

sourceString: Bat CoV-HKU4 and MERS-CoV utilize the same host receptor, dipeptidyl peptidase 4 (DPP4), for virus entry.
targetString: Bat CoV-HKU4 و MERS - CoV از گیرنده میزبان مشابهی با نام dipeptidyl peptidase 4 (DPP4) برای ورود ویروس استفاده می‌کنند.
en-mt: Bat CoV-HKU4 and MERS-CoV use the same host receptor dipeptidyl peptidase 4 (DPP4) to enter the virus.

sourceString: RNA-dependent RNA polymerase sequences of MERS-CoV are phylogenetically closer to counterparts in bat beta-CoVs identified from Europe and Africa.
targetString: توالی‌های پلیمراز RNA وابسته به RNA مربوط به MERS - CoV از نظر فیلوژنی بیشتر به beta-CoVهای خفاشی که از اروپا و آفریقا شناسایی شده‌اند نزدیک‌ هستند.
en-mt: MERS-CoV RNA dependent RNA polymerase sequences are phylogenetically closer to bat beta-CoVs detected from Europe and Africa.

sourceString: Up to now, no live MERS-CoV can be found in wild bats.
targetString: تا به حال، هیچ MERS-CoV زنده‌ای در خفاش‌های وحشی یافت نشده است.
en-mt: Until now, no live MERS-CoV has been found in wild bats.

sourceString: MERS-CoV and its closest relative bat CoV-HKU25 share only 87% nucleotide sequence homology.
targetString: ویروس MERS - CoV و نزدیک‌ترین خویشاوند آن یعنی ویروس CoV-HKU25 خفاشی، از نظر توالی نوکلئوتید فقط ۸۷ درصد شباهت دارند.
en-mt: MERS-CoV and its closest relative, the dormant CoV-HKU25 virus, have only 87% nucleotide sequences.

sourceString: Thus, bats might not be the immediate reservoir host of MERS-CoV.
targetString: بنابراین خفاش‌ نمی‌تواند میزبان مخزن بلافصل MERS - CoV باشند.
en-mt: So bats cannot host the immediate MERS-CoV tank.

sourceString: On the other hand, studies in Middle East have shown that dromedary camels are seropositive for MERS-CoV-specific neutralizing antibodies, same as camels of Middle East origin in multiple African countries.
targetString: از سوی دیگر، مطالعات در خاورمیانه نشان داده‌ است که شترهای یک‌کوهانه از نظر پادتن خنثی کننده اختصاصی MERS-CoV مثبت هستند، این موضوع در مورد شترهای خاورمیانه‌ای که در کشور آفریقایی بسر می‌برند نیز صدق می‌کند
en-mt: Studies in the Middle East, on the other hand, have shown that unipods are positive for MERS-CoV-specific neutralizing antibodies, which is also true for Middle Eastern camels living in African countries.

sourceString: Live MERS-CoV identical to the virus found in humans was isolated from the nasal swabs of dromedary camels, further indicating that camels serve as the bona fide reservoir host of MERS-CoV.
targetString: MERS-CoV زنده مشابه ویروسی که در انسان‌ها یافت می‌شود، از بینی شتر یک‌کوهانه نمونه‌گیری شد و نشان داد که شترها میزبان مخزن واقعی MERS-CoV هستند.
en-mt: Similar to the virus found in humans, live MERS-CoV was sampled from the noses of one-humped camels and showed that camels host the actual reservoir of MERS-CoV.

sourceString: It is also noteworthy that generally mild symptoms but massive virus shedding were observed in camels experimentally infected with MERS-CoV.
targetString: لازم به ذکر است که علائم عموما خفیف و دفع بسیار زیاد ویروس در شترهایی که به صورت تجربی به MERS - CoV آلوده شده بودند مشاهده شده‌ است.
en-mt: It should be noted that the symptoms were generally mild and excreted in camels that were experimentally infected with MERS-CoV.

sourceString: Notably, infected camels shed viruses not only through respiratory route but also through fecal-oral route, which is also the main route for virus shedding from bats.
targetString: قابل‌ذکر است که شترهای آلوده نه فقط از طریق دستگاه تنفسی بلکه از طریق مدفوعی - دهانی که روش اصلی دفع ویروس در خفاش‌ نیز محسوب می‌شود، ویروس‌ را پخش می‌کنند.
en-mt: It should be noted that infected camels spread the virus not only through the respiratory tract but also through fecal - mouth, which is also the main method of repelling the virus in bats.

sourceString: However, questions still remain since many confirmed cases of MERS have no contact history with camels prior to symptom onset, plausibly ascribed to human-to-human transmission or unknown transmission routes involving unrecognized animal species that harbour MERS-CoV.
targetString: با این حال، یکی از سوالاتی که هنوز از آن زمان بی‌پاسخ باقی مانده‌است این است که در بسیاری از موارد تایید شده MERS هیچ سابقه تماسی با شتر قبل از بروز علائم وجود نداشته است، که احتمالا به انتقال انسان به انسان یا مسیرهای انتقال ناشناخته که شامل گونه‌های حیوانات ناشناخته است، نسبت داده می‌شود.
en-mt: However, one question that has remained unanswered since then is that in many confirmed cases of MERS there was no history of contact with camels before symptoms appeared, possibly attributed to human-to-human transmission or unknown transmission routes involving unknown animal species.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 shares 96.2% nucleotide homology with a bat CoV RaTG13 isolated from Rhinolophus affinis bats.
targetString: ویروس SARS-CoV-2 حدود ۹۶.۲ درصد شباهت توالی نوکلئوتید با ویروس CoV RaTG13 خفاشی جدا شده از خفاش نعل بینی دارد.
en-mt: The SARS-CoV-2 virus has about 96.2% nucleotide sequence similarity with the RaTG13 bat CoV isolated from a nasal bat.

sourceString: As in the cases of SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, the sequence divergence between SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 is too great to assign parental relationship.
targetString: مانند موارد SARS - CoV و MERS - CoV، واگرایی توالی بین SARS-CoV-2 و RaTG13 برای تعیین رابطه والدین بسیار عالی است.
en-mt: Like the cases of SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, the sequence divergence between SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 is excellent for determining parental relationship.

sourceString: That is to say, bats might not be the immediate reservoir host(s) of SARS-CoV-2 unless almost identical bat CoVs are found in future.
targetString: به عبارت دیگر، خفاش‌ نمی‌تواند میزبان مخزن بلافصل ویروس SARS-CoV-2 باشد مگر اینکه CoVهای خفاشی تقریباً یکسانی در آینده پیدا شوند.
en-mt: In other words, bats cannot host the immediate reservoir of SARS-CoV-2 unless bat CoVs are found in the future.

sourceString: Presumably, the intermediate animal hosts of SARS-CoV-2 should be among the wildlife species sold and killed at the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market, with which many of the initial cases of COVID-19 were associated, indicative of a probable animal-to-human transmission event.
targetString: احتمالا، میزبان‌های حیوانی واسط ویروس SARS-CoV-2، که بسیاری از موارد اولیه کووید-19 در آنها دیده شده، باید بین حیوانات وحشی فروخته شده و کشته شده در بازار غذاهای دریایی هونانبوده باشند که نشان دهنده انتقال احتمالی ویروس از حیوان به انسان است.
en-mt: Presumably, the intermediate animal hosts of the SARS-CoV-2 virus, which have seen many early cases of COVID-19, must have not been between wild animals sold and killed at the Hunan Seafood Market, indicating possible transmission of the virus from animal to human.

sourceString: Several recent studies based on metagenomic sequencing have suggested that a group of endangered small mammals known as pangolins (Manis javanica) could also harbour ancestral beta-CoVs related to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: مطالعات اخیر مبتنی بر توالی متاژنومی نشان می‌دهد که گروهی از پستانداران کوچک در معرض خطر شناخته‌شده به نام پانگولین (Manis javanica) نیز می‌توانند پناهگاه beta-CoVهای اجدادی در ارتباط با SARS-CoV-2 باشند.
en-mt: Recent studies based on metagenomic sequencing suggest that a group of endangered small mammals known as pangolins (Manis javanica) could also be harbors of ancestral beta-CoVs associated with SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: These novel pangolin CoV genomes share 85-92% nucleotide sequence homology with SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: این گونه ژنتیکی جدید ویروس CoV پانگولین حدود ۸۵ تا ۹۲ درصد شباهت توالی نوکلئوتید با ویروس SARS-CoV-2 دارد.
en-mt: This new genetic variant of the pangolin CoV virus has about 85 to 92 percent nucleotide sequence similarity with SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: However, they are equally closely related to RaTG13 with about 90% identity at the level of nucleotide sequence.
targetString: با این حال، این ویروسها با حدود ۹۰٪ شباهت توالی نوکلئوتید به همان اندازه با RaTG13 مرتبط هستند.
en-mt: However، these viruses are associated with about 90% nucleotide sequence similarity as well as RaTG13.

sourceString: They cluster into two sub-lineages of SARS-CoV-2-like viruses in the phylogenetic tree, one of which share a more similar receptor binding domain (RBD) with SARS-CoV-2, with 97.4% amino acid sequence identity.
targetString: این ویروسها به دو زیرتبار ویروس‌های شبه SARS-CoV-2 در درخت فیلوژنتیک خوشه‌بندی می‌شوند، که یکی از آنها دامنه اتصال گیرنده مشابهی با SARS-CoV-2 داشته و ۹۷.۴% یکسانی توالی اسید آمینه دارد.
en-mt: These viruses are clustered into two sub-families of SARS-CoV-2-like viruses in the phylogenetic tree, one of which has the same receptor binding domain as SARS-CoV-2 and has 97.4% of the same amino acid sequence.

sourceString: In stark contrast, the RBDs of SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 are more divergent, albeit a higher degree of sequence homology genome-wide.
targetString: در مقابل، RBDهای SARS-CoV-2 و RaTG13 تفاوت بیشتری دارند، البته با درجه بالاتری از شباهت توالی در سراسر ژنوم.
en-mt: In contrast, the RBDs of SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 differ further, albeit with a higher degree of genomic sequencing similarity.

sourceString: An earlier study on diseased pangolins also reported the detection of viral contigs from lung samples, which turn out to be similarly related to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: در یک مطالعه قبلی که روی پانگولینهای بیمار انجام گرفته، گزارش می شود که از نمونه‌های ریه، تکه‌‌های از دی ان ای ویروسی جدا شده که عیتا با SARS-CoV-2 مرتبط هستند.
en-mt: In a previous study of patient pangolins, lung samples were reported to have isolated fragments of viral DNA that are also associated with SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: This study adopted different assembly methods and manual curation to generate a partial genome sequence comprising about 86.3% of the full-length viral genome.
targetString: در این مطالعه از روش‌های مختلف بدست آوردن توالی‌ و اصلاح دستی برای ایجاد بخشی از توالی ژنوم که حدود ۸۶.۳% طول ژنوم ویروس را تشکیل می‌داد، استفاده شد.
en-mt: In this study, different sequencing methods and manual modification were used to create a part of the genome sequence, which made up about 86.3% of the length of the genome of the virus.

sourceString: We cannot exclude the possibility that pangolin is one of the intermediate animal hosts of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: نمی‌توانیم این احتمال را رد کنیم که پانگولین یکی از میزبان‌های واسط حیوانی SARS-CoV-2 است.
en-mt: We cannot rule out the possibility that Pangolin is one of the animal intermediate hosts of SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: However, currently there is no evidence in support of a direct pangolin origin of SARS-CoV-2 due to the sequence divergence between SARS-CoV-2 and pangolin SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs.
targetString: با این حال، در حال حاضر هیچ مدرکی که موید وجود منشأ SARS-CoV-2 در پانگولین باشد وجود ندارد چراکه بین توالی SARS-CoV-2 و beta-CoVهای مرتبط با SARS-CoV-2 پانگولین واگرایی وجود دارد.
en-mt: However, there is currently no evidence to support the origin of SARS-CoV-2 in pangolin because there is a divergence between the sequence of SARS-CoV-2 and the beta-CoV-related SARS-CoV-2 pangolins.

sourceString: In addition, the distance between SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 is even shorter than that between SARS-CoV-2 and pangolin SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs.
targetString: به علاوه فاصله بین SARS-CoV-2 و RaTG13 حتی کوتاه‌تر از فاصله بین SARS-CoV- و SARS-CoV-2 و beta-CoVهای مرتبط با SARS-CoV-2 پانگولین است.
en-mt: In addition, the distance between SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 is even shorter than the distance between SARS-CoV- and SARS-CoV-2 and pangolin SARS-CoV-2 beta-CoV-2.

sourceString: The evolutionary pathway of SARS-CoV-2 in bats, pangolins and other mammals remains to be established.
targetString: مسیر تکاملی SARS-CoV-2 در خفاش، پانگولین‌ و سایر پستانداران هنوز بدست نیامده است.
en-mt: The evolutionary pathway of SARS-CoV-2 in bats, pangolins and other mammals has yet to be discovered.

sourceString: Whereas the highest sequence homology has been found in the RBDs between SARS-CoV-2 and pangolin, SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs, SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 share the highest genome-wide sequence homology.
targetString: در حالی که بیشترین همسانی توالی در RBDها بین SARS-CoV-2 و پانگولین دیده شده است، اما beta-CoVهای مرتبط با beta-CoV، SARS-CoV-2 و RaTG13 بالاترین همسانی توالی ژنومی را دارند.
en-mt: While the highest sequence consistency in RBDs has been observed between SARS-CoV-2 and pangolin, beta-CoV-related beta-CoV, SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 have the highest genomic sequence similarity.

sourceString: It is highly speculative that the high degree of similarity between the RBDs of pangolin SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs and SARS-CoV-2 is driven by selectivity-mediated convergent evolution.
targetString: حدس زده می‌شود که درجه بالایی از شباهت که بین RBDهای beta-CoVهای مرتبط با SARS-CoV-2 پانگولین و SARS-CoV-2 وجود دارد، ناشی از تکامل همگرا با واسطه انتخابی باشد.
en-mt: It is speculated that the high degree of similarity between the beta-CoV-related RBDs associated with pangolin SARS-CoV-2 and SARS-CoV-2 is due to selective-mediated convergent evolution.

sourceString: A counter-proposal is in favour of a recombination between a pangolin SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoV and RaTG13 in the third wild animal species.
targetString: پیشنهاد متفاوت از آن، طرفدار ترکیب مجدد beta-CoVهای مرتبط با SARS-CoV-2 پانگولین و RaTG۱۳ در سومین گونه حیوان وحشی است.
en-mt: A different proposal favors the recombination of SARS-CoV-2 pangolin and RaTG13 beta-CoVs in the third wild animal species.

sourceString: As a driving force in evolution, recombination is widespread among beta-CoVs.
targetString: نوترکیبی به عنوان یک نیروی محرک در تکامل، بین beta-CoVها شایع است.
en-mt: Recombination as a driving force in evolution is common among beta-CoVs.

sourceString: The jury is still out on the immediate zoonotic origin of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: قضاوتها در خصوص منشا حیوانی SARS-CoV-2 تمام نشده است.
en-mt: Judgements on the animal origin of SARS-CoV-2 are not over.

sourceString: Besides the highly pathogenic HCoVs, the zoonotic origin of HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-NL63 and HCoV-HKU1 have also been studied.
targetString: در کنار HCoVهای بسیار بیماری‌زا، منشا حیوانی HCoV-229E، HCoV-OC43، HCoV-NL63 و HCoV-HKU1 همچنان تحت مطالعه است.
en-mt: Along with highly pathogenic HCoVs, the animal origins of HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-NL63 and HCoV-HKU1 are still being studied.

sourceString: Phylogenetic evidence indicated that both HCoV-NL63 and HCoV-229E might have originated from bat CoVs, while the parental viruses of HCoV-OC43 and HCoV-HKU1 have been found in rodents.
targetString: شواهد فیلوژنتیک نشان می‌دهد که هر دو HCoV - NL۶۳ و HCoV - ۲۲۹ ممکن است از CoVهای خفاشی مشتق شده‌باشند، در حالی که ویروس‌های والدین HCoV-OC43 و HCoV - HKU۱ در جوندگان یافت می‌شوند.
en-mt: Phylogenetic evidence suggests that both HCoV-NL63 and HCoV-229 may be derived from bat CoVs, while the parent viruses HCoV-OC43 and HCoV-HKU1 are found in rodents.

sourceString: It has been reported that a bat CoV termed ARCoV.2 (Appalachian Ridge CoV) detected in North American tricolored bat displayed close relationship with HCoV-NL63.
targetString: گزارش شده‌است که CoV خفاشی با نام .ARCoV2 (Appalachian Ridge CoV) که در خفاش سه‌رنگ آمریکای شمالی دیده شده رابطه نزدیکی با HCoV - NL۶۳ دارد.
en-mt: It has been reported that the CoV bat is known as CoV. ARCoV2 (Appalachian Ridge CoV), seen in the North American tricolor bat, is closely related to HCoV-NL63.

sourceString: On the other hand, HCoV-229E was genetically related to another bat CoV, termed Hipposideros/GhanaKwam/19/2008, which was detected in Ghana, while camelids have also been suspected as its intermediate host.
targetString: از سوی دیگر، HCoV - ۲۲۹ E به طور ژنتیکی مربوط به CoV خفاشی دیگری با نام Hipposideros / GhanaKwam / ۱۹ / ۲۰۰۸ است که در غنا کشف شد، در حالی که کاملیدها نیز به عنوان میزبان میانی این ویروس مظنون هستند.
en-mt: On the other hand, HCoV-229E is genetically related to another bat CoV named Hipposideros/GhanaKwam/19/2008 that was discovered in Ghana, while camelids are also suspected as the intermediate host of the virus.

sourceString: For clarity, the current knowledge on animal origins of known HCoVs is summarized in Figure ​1 and Table 2.
targetString: برای روشن شدن مطلب، دانسته‌‌های موجود در خصوص منشا حیوانی HCoVهای شناخته‌شده در شکل ۱ و جدول ۲ بصورت خلاصه آمده ‌است.
en-mt: For clarity, the existing knowledge of the animal origins of known HCoVs is summarized in Figure 1 and Table 2.

sourceString: Phylogenetic analysis has provided evidence for interspecies transmission events of HCoVs in the history.
targetString: آنالیز فیلوژنتیک، شواهدی برای انتقال بین‌گونه‌ای HCoVها در تاریخ ارائه کرده‌است.
en-mt: Phylogenetic analysis has provided evidence for interspecies transmission of HCoVs in history.

sourceString: When HCoV-OC43 crossed species to infect humans from domestic livestock around 1890, a pandemic of respiratory infection was recorded.
targetString: در سال ۱۸۹۰هنگامی که HCoV - OC۴۳ در بین گونه‌های جانوری مختلف انتقال پیدا کرد تا از طریق احشام، انسان‌ را آلوده کند، یک پاندمی عفونت تنفسی را رقم زد.
en-mt: In 1890, when HCoV-OC43 was transmitted among various animal species to infect humans through livestock, a pandemic triggered a respiratory infection.

sourceString: The interspecies transmission history of HCoV-229E is less clear.
targetString: تاریخچه انتقال بین گونه‌ای HCoV-229E خیلی مشخص نیست.
en-mt: The history of HCoV-229E interspecies transmission is not very clear.

sourceString: Bat alpha-CoVs closely related to HCoV-229E have been found.
targetString: alpha-CoVهای خفاشی که رابطه نزدیکی با HCoV-229E دارند، یافت شده است.
en-mt: Bat alpha-CoVs that are closely related to HCoV-229E have been found.

sourceString: Between them there is an alpaca alpha-CoV.
targetString: در بین آنها یک alpha-CoV آلپاکایی وجود دارد.
en-mt: Among them is an alpha-CoV.

sourceString: Several lines of evidence support the transmission of virus from bats to humans directly.
targetString: شواهد متعددی از انتقال مستقیم ویروس توسط خفاش‌ها به انسان‌ها حمایت می‌کند.
en-mt: Numerous evidence supports direct transmission of the virus by bats to humans.

sourceString: First, humans but not alpacas might have contact with bats in a shared ecological niche.
targetString: اول اینکه، انسان‌ها نه آلپاکاها ممکن است با خفاش‌ها در یک محیط اکولوژیکی مشترک ارتباط برقرار کنند.
en-mt: First, humans, not alpacas, may interact with bats in a common ecological environment.
