sourceString: North Korea claimed, as of Thursday, it was one of the few countries remaining free of coronavirus infections.
targetString: روز پنج شنبه کره شمالی ادعا کرد که این کشور یکی از معدود کشورهای عاری از ابتلا به ویروس کرونا است.
en-mt: On Thursday, North Korea claimed it was one of the few countries free of the coronavirus.

sourceString: By yesterday, the World Health Organization reported 1,051,635 confirmed cases, including 79,332 cases in the twenty four hours preceding 10 a.m. Central European Time (0800 UTC) on April 4.
targetString: سازمان بهداشت جهانی 1,051,635 مورد تأیید شده را تا دیروز گزارش کرد که 79,332 مورد از آنها مربوط به بیست و چهار ساعت قبل از ده صبح به وقت اروپای مرکزی (0800 UTC) روز 4 آوریل بودند.
en-mt: The World Health Organization reported 1,051,635 confirmed cases as of yesterday, of which 79,332 were from the twenty-four hours before 10 a.m. Central European Time (0800 UTC) on April 4.

sourceString: In the United States, over 244 thousand coronavirus cases were recorded, linking to at least 5,900 deaths.
targetString: در ایالات متحده، بیش از 244 هزار مورد ابتلا به کرونا ویروس ثبت شده که به حداقل 5,900 مورد مرگ و میر منجر شده است.
en-mt: In the United States, more than 244,000 cases of coronavirus have been recorded, leading to at least 5,900 deaths.

sourceString: CBS News reported, citing Johns Hopkins University data, there were over 1,000 US deaths on Wednesday caused by coronavirus infections.
targetString: CBS NEWS بر اساس داده‌های دانشگاه جانز هاپکینز گزارش داد که در روز چهارشنبه بیش از 1,000 مورد مرگ و میر در ایالات متحده به دلیل ابتلا به کرونا ویروس ثبت شده است.
en-mt: More than 1,000 deaths were recorded in the United States on Wednesday due to the coronavirus, CBS News reported, according to data from Johns Hopkins University.

sourceString: Around the world, countries announced stricter measures to inhibit the disease from spreading.
targetString: کشورهای مختلف در سراسر دنیا، اقدامات سختگیرانه‌تری را برای جلوگیری از شیوع این بیماری اتخاذ کرده‌اند.
en-mt: Countries around the world have taken tougher measures to prevent the spread of the disease.

sourceString: On Thursday, Sergei Sobyanin, the mayor of Moscow, extended the city lockdown to May 1.
targetString: Sergei Sobyanin، شهردار مسکو روز پنج شنبه، تعطیلی شهر را تا 1 می تمدید کرد.
en-mt: Moscow's Mayor Sergei Sobyanin extended the city's closure to May 1 on Thursday.

sourceString: Nationally, President Vladimir Putin declared Russians would continue to be paid without going to work until April 30.
targetString: رئیس جمهور ولادیمیر پوتین اعلام کرد که در سراسر کشور حقوق و دستمزد مردم روسیه بدون نیاز به اینکه سر کار بروند، تا 30 آوریل پرداخت خواهد شد.
en-mt: President Vladimir Putin announced that across the country the salaries of the Russian people would be paid by April 30 without having to go to work.

sourceString: The parliament of Portugal voted to extend the national state of emergency by 15 days; the vote passed with 215 votes in favor, ten abstentions, and one vote against.
targetString: پارلمان پرتغال برای تمدید وضعیت اضطراری ملی به مدت 15 روز دیگر رای‌گیری کرد؛ این قانون با 215 رأی موافق، ده رأی ممتنع و یک رأی مخالف تصویب شد.
en-mt: Portugal's parliament voted to extend the national emergency for another 15 days, with 215 votes in favor, ten abstentions and one against.

sourceString: Saudi Arabia extended curfews in the holy cities of Mecca and Medina to last the entire day; previously, the curfew was only in effect between 3 p.m. and 6 a.m.
targetString: عربستان سعودی محدودیت تردد را در شهرهای مقدس مکه و مدینه به تمام ساعات روز تعمیم داد؛ پیش از این، محدودیت تردد فقط بین ساعات 3 عصر تا 6 صبح اجرا می‌شد.
en-mt: Saudi Arabia extended traffic restrictions in the holy cities of Mecca and Medina to all hours of the day; previously, traffic restrictions were only imposed between 3 p.m. and 6 a.m.

sourceString: Thailand planned to implement a curfew between 10 p.m. and 4 a.m.
targetString: تایلند برای اجرای محدودیت تردد بین ساعات 10 شب تا 4 صبح برنامه‌ریزی کرده است.
en-mt: Thailand has planned to enforce a traffic limit between 10 p.m. and 4 a.m.

sourceString: The governor of Ohio, Mike DeWine, announced the state had extended its stay-at-home order until May 1.
targetString: Mike DeWine، فرماندار اوهایو اعلام کرد که این ایالت مقررات قرنطینه خانگی را تا 1 می تمدید کرده است.
en-mt: Ohio Governor Mike DeWine announced that the state has extended its house quarantine regulations until May 1.

sourceString: Stores in Australia lower toilet paper limits per transaction
targetString: فروشگاه‌های استرالیا سهمیه خرید دستمال توالت برای هر بار خرید را کاهش دادند
en-mt: Australian stores cut toilet paper quotas for each purchase

sourceString: On Sunday and Saturday evening, Australian store chains Woolworths and Coles lowered their purchase restrictions on toilet paper to two and one package per transaction in all stores on national level, respectively.
targetString: فروشگاه‌های زنجیره‌ای Woolworths و Coles در استرالیا، در عصر روزهای شنبه و یکشنبه، محدودیت خرید دستمال توالت را در تمام فروشگاه‌های سطح کشور به ترتیب به دو و یک بسته برای هر خرید کاهش دادند.
en-mt: Chain stores Woolworths and Coles in Australia, on Saturday and Sunday evenings, reduced the limit on toilet paper purchases at all stores nationwide to two and one package per purchase, respectively.

sourceString: ALDI also introduced a one-pack limit, on Monday.
targetString: فروشگاه ALDI نیز در روز دوشنبه محدودیت خرید یک بسته‌ای را اعلام کرد.
en-mt: The ALDI store also announced a one-pack purchase limit on Monday.

sourceString: These limitations were posted as messages on the checkouts, and on the chains' Facebook pages.
targetString: این محدودیت‌ها به شکل پیام‌هایی بر روی صندوق‌ها و در صفحه فیسبوک این فروشگاه‌های زنجیره‌ای اعلام شده است.
en-mt: These restrictions are announced in the form of messages on the inboxes and on the chain's Facebook page.

sourceString: Buyers were reportedly stocking up due to fears of COVID-19 in case people need to self-isolate.
targetString: بر طبق گزارش‌ها، خریداران از ترس نیاز به قرنطینه شخصی به دلیل شیوع کووید-19 اقدام به خرید و ذخیره کردن می‌کنند.
en-mt: Shoppers are reportedly buying and stockpiling for fear of needing personal quarantine due to the COVID-19 outbreak.

sourceString: On Wednesday, Woolworths also limited toilet paper purchases for home delivery to one pack per order.
targetString: همچنین در روز چهارشنبه، Woolworths خرید دستمال توالت برای تحویل خانگی را به یک بسته به ازای هر سفارش محدود کرد.
en-mt: Also on Wednesday, Woolworths limited buying toilet paper for home delivery to one parcel per order.

sourceString: These changes followed the previous four-pack per transaction restriction introduced by Woolworths and Coles on March 4 and 5 respectively.
targetString: این تغییرات در ادامه محدودیت چهار بسته‌ای قبلی به ازای هر خرید که به ترتیب در تاریخ‌های 4 و 5 مارس توسط Woolworths و Coles اعلام شده بود، اعمال شد.
en-mt: The changes followed a previous four-pack per purchase limit announced by Woolworths and Coles on March 4 and 5 respectively.

sourceString: Coles, in its March 8 media release, reported that with the four-pack restriction in place, "many stores are still selling out within an hour of delivery", and called the demand "unprecedented", while ALDI, in a Facebook post on Tuesday, called it "unexpected".
targetString: فروشگاه Coles در بیانیه مطبوعاتی 8 مارس خود اعلام کرد که با وجود محدودیت خرید چهار بسته‌ای، "موجودی بسیاری از فروشگاه‌ها ظرف مدت یک ساعت تمام می‌شود" و این میزان تقاضا را "بی‌سابقه" خواند، فروشگاه ALDI نیز روز سه‌شنبه در صفحه فیسبوک خود، آن را "غیرمنتظره" توصیف کرد.
en-mt: Coles Stores said in its March 8 press release that despite a four-pack purchase restriction, "many store inventories run out within an hour," calling the demand "unprecedented," the ALDI store also described it as "unexpected" on its Facebook page on Tuesday.

sourceString: Sales went up in a "sharp increase" last week, according to a Woolworths spokesperson.
targetString: بر اساس سخنان سخنگوی Woolworths، میزان فروش در هفته گذشته "افزایش شدیدی" را تجربه کرد.
en-mt: Sales experienced a "sharp increase" last week, according to a Woolworths spokesman.

sourceString: Costco's store in Canberra also limited the allowed amount to two packs last week.
targetString: فروشگاه Costco در کانبرا نیز، هفته گذشته میزان خرید مجاز را به دو بسته محدود کرد.
en-mt: Costco's store in Canberra also limited the purchase limit to two packages last week.

sourceString: To further alleviate the shortage, Coles ordered bigger packages from suppliers and increased delivery frequency, Woolworths ordered extra stock, while ALDI made stocks for a planned Wednesday special available early.
targetString: برای کاهش این کمبود، Coles بسته‌های بزرگتری به تأمین کنندگان سفارش داده است و دفعات تحویل کالا به فروشگاه‌ها را افزایش داده است، Woolworths موجودی بیشتری سفارش داده است . ALDI موجودی مربوط به یکی از طرح‌های فروش ویژه چهارشنبه را زودتر در دسترس قرار داده است.
en-mt: To alleviate this shortage, Coles has ordered larger packages to suppliers and increased the frequency of deliveries to stores, Woolworths has ordered more inventory. ALDI has made inventory related to one of Wednesday's special sale plans available earlier.

sourceString: Russell Zimmerman, executive director of the Australian Retailers Association, said that retailers try to raise stock, but local council restrictions on the timing of truck-deliveries make it hard.
targetString: Russell Zimmerman، مدیر اجرایی انجمن خرده‌فروشان استرالیا اعلام کرد که خرده‌فروشان سعی می‌کنند موجودی خود را افزایش دهند، اما محدودیت‌های شورای محلی در زمینه زمانبندی کامیون‌های تحویل کالا، این کار را دشوار کرده است.
en-mt: Russell Zimmerman, chief executive of the Australian Retailers Association, said retailers were trying to increase inventories, but local council restrictions on the timing of delivery trucks made it difficult.

sourceString: He expects rising production costs, as suppliers try to meet demand, and fewer specials.
targetString: او گفت انتظار دارد هزینه‌های تولید افزایش یابد زیرا تأمین کنندگان تلاش می‌کنند به تقاضا پاسخ دهند و فروش‌های ویژه کمتر شود.
en-mt: He said he expects production costs to rise as suppliers struggle to meet demand and less special sales.

sourceString: On Tuesday, ALDI announced that following the early release of stock, some stores can't run the Wednesday special.
targetString: روز سه‌شنبه، فروشگاه ALDI اعلام کرد که برخی فروشگاه‌ها به دلیل عرضه زودتر موجودی، قادر به برگزاری فروش ویژه چهارشنبه نیستند.
en-mt: On Tuesday, the ALDI store said some stores were unable to hold Wednesday's special sale due to earlier inventory offerings.

sourceString: In a News.com.au report, Dr Gary Mortimer, retail expert from Queensland University of Technology, said the stores fill the stock every night.
targetString: دکتر Gary Mortimer، کارشناس خرده‌فروشی از دانشگاه فناوری کوئینزلند در گزارشی در News.com.au گفت که فروشگاه‌ها هر شب موجودی انبار خود را پر می‌کنند.
en-mt: In a report in News.com.au, retail expert Dr Gary Mortimer from Queensland University of Technology said stores were filling their warehouse inventory every night.

sourceString: He remarked toilet paper is a bulky item, leading to low quantity of stocks in numbers, and, when sold out, leaves vast shelf spaces empty, hardening the feeling of a shortage.
targetString: او افزود که حجیم بودن دستمال توالت منجر به این می‌شود که موجودی انبار فروشگاه‌ها از نظر تعداد کم باشد و هنگامی که این محصول تمام می‌شود، باعث خالی شدن فضای زیادی در قفسه‌ها می‌شود و احساس کمبود را القا می‌کند.
en-mt: He added that the bulkiness of toilet paper leads to store inventories being low in numbers, and when the product runs out, it empties a lot of space on shelves and instills a sense of scarcity.

sourceString: Coles and Woolworths have a view [that] if there was plenty of stuff on the shelf, if product like toilet rolls and sanitiser could be [bought] and are there in quantities, you would probably minimise the panic said Russell Zimmerman per ABC News.
targetString: Russell Zimmerman در ABC News گفت که Coles و Woolworths بر این باورند که اگر محصولات زیادی در قفسه وجود داشته باشد، در صورتی که محصولاتی مانند دستمال توالت و ضد عفونی کننده در تعداد بالا موجود باشد و امکان خرید آنها وجود داشته باشد، احتمالاً ترس و وحشت شما به حداقل خواهد رسید.
en-mt: Russell Zimmerman at ABC News said Coles and Woolworths believe that if there are too many products on the shelf, if products such as toilet paper and disinfectants are available in high numbers and can be purchased, your fears will likely be minimized.

sourceString: Recycled toilet paper producer Who Gives a Crap said on last Wednesday they'd run out of stock.
targetString: شرکت Who Gives a Crap، تولید کننده دستمال توالت بازیافتی چهارشنبه گذشته اعلام کرد که موجودی آنها تمام شده است.
en-mt: Who Gives a Crap, the manufacturer of recycled toilet paper, said last Wednesday that they were running out of stock.

sourceString: Kimberly-Clark, which makes Kleenex Toilet Tissue, and Solaris Paper which makes Sorbent, emphasized they were working 24/7 to maintain the supply, according to the News.com.au report.
targetString: بر اساس گزارش News.com.au، شرکت Kimberly-Clark که دستمال توالت Kleenex تولید می‌کند و شرکت Solaris Paper که دستمال توالت Sorbent تولید می‌کند، تأکید کردند که به صورت 24/7 فعالیت می‌کنند تا بتوانند پاسخگوی تقاضای موجود باشند.
en-mt: According to News.com.au, Kimberly-Clark, which produces Kleenex toilet paper, and Solaris Paper, which produces sorbent toilet paper, emphasized that they operate 24/7 to meet demand.

sourceString: Domain.com, a real estate site, reported some property sellers offering free toilet paper to the first bidder on auctions in Melbourne, when fewer auctions were held because of buyers having time off on the long weekend of Labour Day.
targetString: Domain.com یکی از سایت‌های فعال در زمینه املاک گزارش داد که هنگامی که به دلیل تعطیلی خریداران در تعطیلات طولانی آخر هفته روز کارگر، مزایده‌های کمتری برگزار می‌شد، برخی فروشندگان املاک به اولین پیشنهاد دهندگان مزایده‌ها در ملبورن، دستمال توالت رایگان اهدا می‌کردند.
en-mt: Domain.com When fewer auctions were held due to buyers shutting down over the long Labor Day weekend, some property sellers were donating free toilet paper to the first bidders of auctions in Melbourne, one property site reported.

sourceString: The Thursday edition of NT News, a daily printed in Darwin, included an eight-page insert meant to be cut up and used as toilet paper.
targetString: نسخه روز پنج‌شنبه NT News که یکی از روزنامه‌های Darwin است، دارای یک ویژه نامه هشت برگی بود تا برش داده شود و به عنوان دستمال توالت مورد استفاده قرار گیرد.
en-mt: Thursday's edition of NT News, one of Darwin's newspapers, had an eight-leaf special issue to be cut and used as toilet paper.

sourceString: The stores were originally reluctant to impose restrictions, according to a report from ABC Australia on March 3 in which they said they had no plans to introduce restrictions on the purchases.
targetString: بر اساس گزارش ABC Australia در 3 مارس، این فروشگاه‌ها در اصل تمایلی به اعمال محدودیت نداشتند و اعلام کردند که هیچ برنامه‌ای برای اعمال محدودیت برای خرید ندارند.
en-mt: The stores were originally reluctant to impose restrictions and announced they had no plans to impose restrictions on purchases, according to ABC Australia on March 3.

sourceString: Russell Zimmerman added that other products are also in high demand, including masks, sanitiser, dried goods, handwash and flour.
targetString: Russell Zimmerman افزود که برای کالاهای دیگر نیز تقاضای زیادی وجود دارد، از جمله ماسک، ضد عفونی کننده، کالاهای خشک، مایع و صابون دستشویی و آرد.
en-mt: Russell Zimmerman added that there is a huge demand for other goods, including masks, disinfectants, dry goods, liquid and handwashing soap and flour.

sourceString: Similarly, outside of Australia, on Sunday evening online British supermarket Ocado was observed limiting purchases of Andres toilet paper to two 12-roll packs.
targetString: خارج از استرالیا نیز به طور مشابه، سوپرمارکت آنلاین  انگلیسی Ocado، عصر یکشنبه شاهد اعمال محدودیت خرید دستمال توالت Andres به میزان دو بسته 12 رولی بود.
en-mt: Outside Australia, too, English online supermarket Ocado, saw Andres on Sunday evening impose a two-pack limit on 12 rolls.

sourceString: World Health Organization declares COVID-19 pandemic
targetString: سازمان بهداشت جهانی، کووید-19 را پاندمی اعلام کرد
en-mt: World Health Organization declares COVID-19 pandemic

sourceString: On Wednesday, the World Health Organization (WHO) declared the ongoing outbreak of COVID-19 — the disease caused by coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 — to be a pandemic.
targetString: روز چهارشنبه، سازمان جهانی بهداشت (WHO) شیوع بیماری کووید-19 - که توسط کرونا ویروس SARS-CoV-2 ایجاد می‌شود - را پاندمی اعلام کرد.
en-mt: On Wednesday, the World Health Organization (WHO) declared the outbreak of COVID-19 - caused by the coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 - a pandemic.

sourceString: Although the word "pandemic" only refers to how widely a disease has spread, not how dangerous specific cases are, the WHO noted the need to drive governments to action:
targetString: اگر چه کلمه "پاندمی" تنها به گستردگی شیوع یک بیماری اشاره دارد، نه میزان خطرناک بودن آن، با این حال WHO به لزوم سوق دادن دولت‌ها به اقدامات مقابله‌ای تأکید کرد:
en-mt: Although the word "pandemic" refers only to the extent of a disease, not how dangerous it is, the WHO stressed the need to push governments to take countermeasures:

sourceString: All countries can still change the course of this pandemic.
targetString: تمام کشورها هنوز هم می‌توانند مدت این پاندمی را تغییر دهند.
en-mt: All countries can still change the duration of the pandemic.

sourceString: If countries detect, test, treat, isolate, trace and mobilize their people in the response, said Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, the Director-General of the WHO.
targetString: Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus، مدیرکل WHO گفت در صورتی که کشورها مردم خود را مورد تشخیص، آزمایش، درمان، قرنطینه و ردیابی قرار داده و آنها را آماده کنند.
en-mt: WHO Director General Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus said that if countries diagnose, test, treat, quarantine and trace their people and prepare them.

sourceString: We are deeply concerned both by the alarming levels of spread and severity and by the alarming levels of inaction.
targetString: ما عمیقاً نگران هستیم، هم از سطح هشداردهنده شیوع بیماری و شدت آن و هم از سطح هشداردهنده عدم اقدام مناسب.
en-mt: We are deeply concerned, both at the alarming level of the outbreak and its severity, and of the alarming level of lack of appropriate action.

sourceString: According to Dr. Tom Frieden, formerly the director of the United States' Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, the pandemic is "unprecedented."
targetString: بر اساس گفته‌های دکتر Tom Frieden، رئیس سابق مراکز کنترل و پیشگیری از بیماری ایالات متحده، این پاندمی "بی‌سابقه" است.
en-mt: According to Dr. Tom Frieden, former head of the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, the pandemic is "unprecedented."

sourceString: He said, in remarks published by CNN in February, "other than influenza, no other respiratory virus has been tracked from emergence to continuous global spread."
targetString: او در اظهاراتی که در فوریه توسط CNN منتشر شد، گفت: "غیر از آنفولانزا، هیچ ویروس تنفسی دیگری، از پیدایش تا شیوع جهانی مداوم ردگیری نشده است.
en-mt: In a statement published by CNN in February, he said: "Other than the flu, no other respiratory virus has been traced from the genesis to the ongoing global outbreak.

sourceString: Ghebreyesus expressed a similar view, saying "we have never before seen a pandemic sparked by a coronavirus."
targetString: Ghebreyesus نیز در اظهاراتی مشابه گفت: "ما قبل از این، هرگز پاندمی را ندیده بودیم که توسط یک کرونا ویروس ایجاد شده باشد."
en-mt: Ghebreyesus said in a similar statement: "We had never seen a pandemic caused by a coronavirus before."

sourceString: He continued, "and we have never before seen a pandemic that can be controlled at the same time."
targetString: او ادامه داد "و قبل از این هرگز پاندمی را ندیده بودیم که در عین حال، قابل کنترل باشد."
en-mt: "And we've never seen a pandemic before that is manageable."

sourceString: The new status as a pandemic follows the WHO's decision in January to declare the outbreak a public health emergency of international concern.
targetString: وضعیت جدید به عنوان پاندمی پس از تصمیم WHO در ژانویه مبنی بر اعلام شیوع  این بیماری به عنوان وضعیت اضطراری بهداشت عمومی با نگرانی بین‌المللی اعلام شد.
en-mt: The new situation came as a pandemic following the WHO's decision in January to declare the outbreak a public health emergency of international concern.

sourceString: The United States' National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Disease's director, Dr. Anthony Fauci, said of the outbreak, "bottom line, it's going to get worse."
targetString: دکتر Anthony Fauci، مدیر مؤسسه ملی آلرژی و بیماری‌های عفونی ایالات متحده در مورد شیوع این بیماری گفت: "وضعیت خط مقدم، در حال بدتر شدن است."
en-mt: Dr. Anthony Fauci, director of the U.S. National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases, said of the outbreak, "The frontline situation is getting worse."

sourceString: As of Thursday, Associated Press reported there were at least 126,000 cases of COVID-19 worldwide, resulting in over 4,600 deaths.
targetString: Associated Press گزارش داد تا روز پنج‌شنبه، حداقل 126,000 مورد ابتلا به کووید-19 در سراسر دنیا وجود داشته که منجر به بیش از 4,600 مرگ شده است.
en-mt: As of Thursday, there have been at least 126,000 cases of COVID-19 worldwide, resulting in more than 4,600 deaths, the Associated Press reported.

sourceString: The 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic is an ongoing pandemic of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: پاندمی کرونا ویروس 20-2019 یک پاندمی در حال پیشرفت از بیماری کرونا ویروس 2019 (کووید-19) است که بر اثر سندروم حاد تنفسی کرونا ویروس 2 (SARS-CoV-2) ایجاد می‌شود.
en-mt: The 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic is an ongoing pandemic of the 2019 coronavirus disease (COVID-19) caused by Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

sourceString: The outbreak was identified in Wuhan, China, in December 2019, declared to be a Public Health Emergency of International Concern on 30 January 2020, and recognized as a pandemic on 11 March 2020.
targetString: این شیوع در دسامبر 2019 در ووهان چین شناسایی شد و در 30 ژانویه 2020 به عنوان وضعیت اضطراری بهداشت عمومی با نگرانی بین‌المللی اعلام شد و در 11 مارس 2020 به عنوان پاندمی شناخته شد.
en-mt: The outbreak was identified in Wuhan, China in December 2019 and declared a public health emergency with international concern on January 30, 2020, and declared a pandemic on March 11, 2020.

sourceString: As of 10 April 2020, approximately 1.61 million cases of COVID-19 have been reported in 210 countries and territories, resulting in approximately 97,000 deaths.
targetString: تا 10 آوریل 2020، حدود 1.61 میلیون مورد از کووید-19 در 210 کشور و قلمرو گزارش شده است که منجر به حدود 97,000 مورد مرگ شده است.
en-mt: As of April 10, 2020, about 1.61 million cases of COVID-19 have been reported in 210 countries and territories, resulting in an estimated 97,000 deaths.

sourceString: About 364,000 people have recovered.
targetString: حدود 364,000 نفر بهبود پیدا کرده‌اند.
en-mt: About 364,000 people have recovered.

sourceString: The case fatality rate has been estimated to be 4% in China, while globally ranging from 13.04% in Algeria to .08% in New Zealand.
targetString: نرخ مرگ و میر در چین حدود 4% تخمین زده شده در حالی که در سطح جهانی از 0.08% در نیوزیلند تا 13.04% در الجزایر متغیر بوده است.
en-mt: The death rate in China is estimated at 4% while globally it ranges from 0.08% in New Zealand to 13.04% in Algeria.

sourceString: Common symptoms include fever, cough and shortness of breath.
targetString: علایم شایع شامل تب، سرفه و تنگی نفس است.
en-mt: Common symptoms include fever, cough and shortness of breath.

sourceString: Complications may include pneumonia and acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: عوارض آن می‌تواند شامل ذات‌الریه و سندروم دیسترس تنفسی حاد باشد.
en-mt: Complications can include pneumonia and acute respiratory distress syndrome.

sourceString: The time from exposure to onset of symptoms is typically around five days, but may range from two to fourteen days.
targetString: فاصله زمانی از ورود ویروس به بدن تا شروع علایم معمولاً حدود پنج روز است اما می‌تواند بین دو تا چهارده روز متغیر باشد.
en-mt: The time from the virus to the onset of symptoms is usually about five days, but can range from two to fourteen days.

sourceString: There is no known vaccine or specific antiviral treatment.
targetString: هیچ واکسن شناخته شده یا درمان خاصی برای آن وجود ندارد.
en-mt: There is no known vaccine or specific treatment.

sourceString: Primary treatment is symptomatic and supportive therapy.Recommended preventive measures include hand washing, covering one's mouth when coughing, maintaining distance from other people, and monitoring and self-isolation for people who suspect they are infected.
targetString: درمان اولیه، درمان علایم و درمان حمایتی است. اقدامات پیشگیرانه توصیه شده شامل شستن دست‌ها، پوشاندن دهان در هنگام سرفه، فاصله گرفتن از سایر افراد و نظارت و قرنطینه شخصی برای افرادی است که مشکوک به مبتلا شدن هستند.
en-mt: Early treatment is symptom therapy and supportive therapy. Recommended preventive measures include washing hands, covering the mouth when coughing, distancing from other people, and personal monitoring and quarantine for people suspected of contracting.

sourceString: Authorities worldwide have responded by implementing travel restrictions, quarantines, curfews, workplace hazard controls, and facility closures.
targetString: مقامات کشورهای مختلف جهان با اعمال محدودیت سفر، قرنطینه، حکومت نظامی، کنترل خطر در محل کار و تعطیل کردن اماکن مختلف به این ویروس واکنش نشان داده‌اند.
en-mt: Authorities around the world have reacted to the virus by imposing travel restrictions, quarantine, curfews, workplace hazard control and closing various places.

sourceString: The pandemic has led to severe global socioeconomic disruption, the postponement or cancellation of sporting, religious, political and cultural events, and widespread shortages of supplies exacerbated by panic buying.
targetString: این پاندمی منجر به اختلال‌های اقتصادی-اجتماعی شدید، تعویق یا لغو رویدادهای ورزشی، مذهبی، سیاسی و فرهنگی و کمبود گسترده منابع شده است که با خرید عصبی تشدید می‌شود.
en-mt: The pandemic has led to severe socio-economic disruptions, the postponement or cancellation of sports, religious, political and cultural events, and a widespread lack of resources, exacerbated by panic shopping.

sourceString: Schools and universities have closed either on a nationwide or local basis in 193 countries, affecting approximately 99.4 percent  of the world's student population.
targetString: مدارس و دانشگاه‌ها در 193 کشور یا در سطح ملی و یا به صورت محلی تعطیل شده‌اند که این امر 99.4 درصد از دانش‌آموزان و دانشجویان دنیا را تحت تأثیر قرار داده است.
en-mt: Schools and universities in 193 countries have closed nationally or locally, affecting 99.4% of the world's students and students.

sourceString: Misinformation about the virus has spread online, and there have been incidents of xenophobia and discrimination against Chinese people, other people of East and Southeast Asian descent and appearance, and others from areas with significant virus cases.
targetString: اطلاعات غلط در مورد این ویروس به صورت آنلاین گسترش پیدا کرده و مواردی از بیگانه‌هراسی و تبعیض علیه مردم چین و سایر افرادی که دارای نژاد و ظاهر شرق و جنوب شرق آسیا هستند و همچنین افراد دیگر از نواحی دارای شیوع گسترده ویروس، روی داده است.
en-mt: Misinformation about the virus has spread online, and there have been cases of xenophobia and discrimination against people in China and other people of East and Southeast Asian descent and appearance, as well as people from areas with widespread outbreaks.

sourceString: Due to reduced travel and closures of heavy industry, there has been a decrease in air pollution and carbon emissions.
targetString: به دلیل محدودیت سفر و تعطیلی صنایع سنگین، آلودگی هوا و میزان انتشار کربن کاهش یافته است.
en-mt: Due to travel restrictions and heavy industry closures, air pollution and carbon emissions have fallen.

sourceString: Health authorities in Wuhan, China (the capital of Hubei province) reported a cluster of pneumonia cases of unknown cause on 31 December 2019, and an investigation was launched in early January 2020.
targetString: مقامات بهداشتی در ووهان، چین (پایتخت استان هوبی) گروهی از موارد ذات‌الریه با علت نامعلوم را در 31 دسامبر 2019 گزارش دادند و در اوایل ژانویه 2020، تحقیقات در این زمینه آغاز شد.
en-mt: Health authorities in Wuhan, China (capital of Hubei Province) reported a group of cases of pneumonia with unknown cause on December 31, 2019, and an investigation was launched in early January 2020.

sourceString: The cases mostly had links to the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market and so the virus is thought to have a zoonotic origin.
targetString: این موارد عمدتاً ارتباطاتی با بازار عمده فروشی غذاهای دریایی هوانا داشتند و به همین دلیل اینگونه تصور می‌شود که این ویروس منشأ حیوانی داشته باشد.
en-mt: These cases were largely linked to the Hwana Seafood Wholesale Market, which is why the virus is thought to be of animal origin.

sourceString: The virus that caused the outbreak is known as SARS-CoV-2, a newly discovered virus closely related to bat coronaviruses, pangolin coronaviruses, and SARS-CoV.The earliest known person with symptoms was later discovered to have fallen ill on 1 December 2019, and that person did not have visible connections with the later wet market cluster.
targetString: ویروسی که موجب شیوع این بیماری شده است، با عنوان SARS-CoV-2 شناخته می‌شود، ویروسی که جدیداً کشف شده و با کرونا ویروس خفاش، کرونا ویروس پانگولین و SARS-CoV ارتباط نزدیکی دارد. بعداً مشخص شد که اولین فرد شناخته شده دارای علایم، در 1 دسامبر 2019 مریض شده است و این فرد ارتباط مشهودی با گروه بعدی مربوط به بازار غذاهای دریایی نداشته است.
en-mt: The virus that causes the outbreak is known as SARS-CoV-2, a newly discovered virus closely associated with bat coronavirus, pangolin coronavirus and SARS-CoV. It was later revealed that the first known person with symptoms fell ill on December 1, 2019, and that this person had no visible connection to the next group of seafood markets.

sourceString: Of the early cluster of cases reported in December 2019, two-thirds were found to have a link with the market.
targetString: مشخص شد که از میان موارد اولیه‌ای که در دسامبر 2019 گزارش شد، دو سوم آنها ارتباطی با این بازار داشته‌اند.
en-mt: Of the initial cases reported in December 2019, two-thirds were found to have something to do with the market.

sourceString: On 13 March 2020, an unverified report from the South China Morning Post suggested that a case traced back to 17 November 2019, in a 55-year-old from Hubei province, may have been the first.On 26 February 2020, the WHO reported that, as new cases reportedly declined in China but suddenly increased in Italy, Iran, and South Korea, the number of new cases outside China had exceeded the number of new cases within China for the first time.
targetString: در 13 مارس 2020، یک گزارش تأیید نشده از روزنامه South China Morning Post ادعا کرد که یک مورد ابتلا در 17 نوامبر 2019 ردگیری شده است، مرد 55 ساله‌ای اهل استان هوبی که می‌تواند اولین مورد ابتلا باشد. در 26 فوریه 2020، WHO گزارش داد که با وجود کاهش موارد ابتلا در چین بر طبق گزارش‌ها، در ایتالیا، ایران و کره جنوبی افزایش ناگهانی موارد ابتلا وجود داشته و برای اولین بار تعداد موارد جدید خارج از چین از تعداد موارد جدید در داخل چین پیشی گرفته است.
en-mt: On March 13, 2020, an unconfirmed report from the South China Morning Post claimed that one case had been traced on November 17, 2019, a 55-year-old man from Hubei province who could be the first case. On February 26, 2020, the WHO reported that despite declining cases in China, there was reportedly a sudden increase in cases in Italy, Iran and South Korea, surpassing the number of new cases outside China for the first time.

sourceString: There may be substantial underreporting of cases, particularly among those with milder symptoms.
targetString: ممکن است تعداد موارد ابتلا، به میزان قابل توجهی کمتر از واقعیت گزارش داده شود، به خصوص در بین افراد دارای علایم خفیف‌تر هستند.
en-mt: The number of cases may be significantly lower than the actual report, especially among people with milder symptoms.

sourceString: By 26 February, relatively few cases had been reported among youths, with those 19 and under making up 2.4% of cases worldwide.The United Kingdom's chief scientific adviser, Patrick Vallance, estimated that 60% of the British population would need to become infected before effective herd immunity could be achieved.
targetString: تا 26 فوریه، تعداد نسبتاً اندکی از موارد ابتلا در بین جوانان گزارش شده بود و افراد 19 ساله و کمتر تنها 2.4% از موارد ابتلا را در سراسر دنیا تشکیل می‌دادند. Patrick Vallance مشاور ارشد علمی انگلستان تخمین زد که باید حدود 60% از جمعیت بریتانیا مبتلا شوند تا امکان دستیابی به ایمنی جمعی به طور مؤثر فراهم شود.
en-mt: As of February 26, relatively few cases were reported among young people, with those aged 19 and under accounting for only 2.4% of cases worldwide. Patrick Vallance, the UK's chief scientific advisor, estimated that around 60% of the UK population would need to be infected to achieve collective safety effectively.

sourceString: Cases refers to the number of people who have been tested for COVID-19, and whose test has been confirmed positive according to official protocols.
targetString: منظور از موارد، تعداد افرادی است که برای کووید-19 آزمایش داده‌اند و آزمایش آنها بر اساس پروتکل‌های رسمی مثبت اعلام شده است.
en-mt: Cases are the number of people who have tested for COVID-19 and have tested positive according to official protocols.

sourceString: As of 23 March, no country had tested more than 3% of its population, and many countries have had official policies not to test those with only mild symptoms, such as Italy, the Netherlands, Spain, and Switzerland.
targetString: تا 23 مارس، هیچ کشوری بیش از 3% از جمعیت خود را مورد آزمایش قرار نداده است و بسیاری از کشورها از قبیل ایتالیا، هلند، اسپانیا و سوئیس، سیاست رسمی اتخاذ کرده‌اند مبنی بر اینکه از افرادی که تنها دارای علایم خفیف هستند، آزمایش نگیرند.
en-mt: As of March 23, no country has tested more than 3% of its population, and many countries such as Italy, the Netherlands, Spain and Switzerland have adopted an official policy not to test people with only mild symptoms.

sourceString: A study published on 16 March found that in China, up to 23 January, an estimated 86% of COVID-19 infections had not been detected, and that these undocumented infections were the infection source for 79% of documented cases.
targetString: پژوهشی که در 16 مارس منتشر شد، نشان داد که تا 23 ژانویه، حدود 86% از موارد ابتلا به کووید-19 شناسایی نشده است و این موارد ثبت نشده، منبع ابتلای 79% از موارد ثبت‌شده بوده‌اند.
en-mt: A study published March 16 found that as of January 23, about 86% of COVID-19 cases had not been identified, and these undocumented cases were the source of 79% of recorded cases.

sourceString: A statistical analysis published 30 March estimated that numbers of infections in Italy were considerably greater than the reported cases.
targetString: یک تحلیل آماری که در 30 مارس منتشر شد برآورد کرد که تعداد موارد ابتلا در ایتالیا، به میزان قابل توجهی بیش از موارد گزارش شده است.
en-mt: A statistical analysis published on March 30 estimated that the number of cases in Italy was significantly higher than those reported.

sourceString: The initial estimates of the basic reproduction number (R0) for COVID-19 were 1.4 to 2.4.
targetString: تخمین‌های اولیه از عدد سرایت پایه (R0) برای کووید-19 بین 1.4 تا 2.4 بوده است.
en-mt: Initial estimates of baseline contagion numbers (R0) for COVID-19 ranged from 1.4 to 2.4.

sourceString: A study published by the US Center for Disease Control and Prevention has concluded that it may be 5.7.
targetString: پژوهشی که توسط مرکز پیشگیری و کنترل بیماری ایالات متحده منتشر شد، نتیجه گیری کرده که این عدد می‌تواند 5.7 باشد.
en-mt: A study published by the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention concluded that the number could be 5.7.

sourceString: Most people with COVID-19 recover.
targetString: اغلب افراد مبتلا به کووید-19 بهبود پیدا می‌کنند.
en-mt: Most people with COVID-19 recover.

sourceString: For those who do not, the time from development of symptoms to death has been between 6 and 41 days, with the most common being 14 days.
targetString: برای آن دسته از افراد که بهبود پیدا نمی‌کنند، فاصله زمانی شروع علایم تا مرگ بین 6 تا 41 روز بوده است و رایج‌ترین مدت، 14 روز بوده است.
en-mt: For those who do not recover, the interval between onset of symptoms and death is between 6 and 41 days, with the most common duration being 14 days.

sourceString: As of 10 April 2020, approximately 97,000 deaths had been attributed to COVID-19.
targetString: تا تاریخ 10 آوریل 2020، تقریباً 97,000 مرگ به کووید-19 نسبت داده شده است.
en-mt: As of April 10, 2020, approximately 97,000 deaths have been attributed to COVID-19.

sourceString: In China, as of 5 February about 80% of deaths were in those over 60, and 75% had pre-existing health conditions including cardiovascular diseases and diabetes.Official tallies of deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic generally refer to dead people who tested positive for COVID according to official protocols.
targetString: در چین، تا 5 فوریه حدود 80% مرگ‌و‌میرها در افراد بالای 60 سال بوده است و 70% از آنها به بیماری‌های زمینه‌ای از جمله بیماری‌های قلبی عروقی و دیابت مبتلا بوده‌اند. آمارهای رسمی از تعداد مرگ‌و‌میرهای ناشی از پاندمی کووید-19 به طور کلی به کشته‌شدگانی اشاره دارد که آزمایش آنها برای کووید، بر اساس پروتکل‌های رسمی مثبت بوده است.
en-mt: In China, as of February 5, about 80% of deaths were in people over the age of 60, and 70% of them were affected by underlying diseases, including cardiovascular disease and diabetes. Official figures on the number of deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic generally point to those who tested positive for COVID-19 based on official protocols.

sourceString: The number of true fatalities from COVID-19 may be much higher, as it may not include people who die without testing - e.g. at home, in nursing homes, etc.
targetString: تعداد واقعی مرگ‌و‌میرهای ناشی از کووید-19 می‌تواند بسیار بیشتر باشد، زیرا این آمار ممکن است شامل افرادی که بدون آزمایش -به عنوان مثال در خانه، در مراکز پرستاری و غیره فوت کرده‌اند، نباشد.
en-mt: The actual number of deaths from COVID-19 could be much higher, as these figures may not include people who died without testing – for example at home, in nursing centers, etc.

sourceString: Partial data from Italy found that the number of excess deaths during the pandemic exceeded the official COVID death tally by a factor of 4-5x.
targetString: اطلاعات ناقصی از ایتالیا نشان داد که تعداد کشته‌های بدون آزمایش در طول این پاندمی، حدود 5-4 برابر بیش از آمار رسمی مرگ‌و‌میر کووید است.
en-mt: Incomplete data from Italy showed that the number of untested deaths during the pandemic was about 4-5 times higher than the official death toll.

sourceString: A spokeswoman for the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) acknowledged "We know that [the stated death toll] is an underestimation", a statement corroborated by anecdotal reports of undercounting in the U.S. Such underestimation often occurs in pandemics, such as the 2009 H1N1 swine flu epidemic.The first confirmed death was in Wuhan on 9 January 2020.
targetString: سخنگوی مراکز کنترل و پیشگیری از بیماری ایالات متحده (CDC) اظهار کرد "ما می‌دانیم که [آمار مرگ‌و‌میر اعلام شده] کمتر از میزان واقعی است"، این جمله با گزارش‌های غیررسمی مبنی بر کمتر جلوه دادن آمار در ایالات متحده مطابقت دارد. چنین اقداماتی اغلب در پاندمی‌ها رخ می‌دهد، از جمله در همه‌گیری آنفولانزای خوکی H1N1 در سال 2009. اولین مورد مرگ تأیید شده در تاریخ 9 ژانویه 2020 در ووهان رخ داد.
en-mt: A spokesperson for the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) said "we know that [the reported death toll] is lower than the actual rate," in line with unofficial reports that the U.S. has underestimated the numbers. Such actions often occur in pandemics, including in the 2009 H1N1 swine flu pandemic. The first confirmed death occurred on January 9, 2020 in Wuhan.

sourceString: The first death outside mainland China occurred on 1 February in the Philippines, and the first death outside Asia was in France on 14 February.
targetString: اولین مورد مرگ در خارج از سرزمین اصلی چین در 1 فوریه در فیلیپین و اولین مورد مرگ در خارج از آسیا در 14 فوریه در فرانسه رخ داد.
en-mt: The first death outside mainland China occurred on February 1 in the Philippines and the first outside Asia on February 14 in France.

sourceString: By 28 February, outside mainland China, more than a dozen deaths each were recorded in Iran, South Korea, and Italy.
targetString: تا 28 فوریه، در خارج از سرزمین اصلی چین، بیش از ده‌ها مرگ در ایران، کره جنوبی و ایتالیا ثبت شد.
en-mt: By February 28, outside mainland China, more than a dozen deaths had been recorded in Iran, South Korea and Italy.

sourceString: By 13 March, more than forty countries and territories had reported deaths, on every continent except Antarctica.Several measures are commonly used to quantify mortality.
targetString: تا 13 مارس، در بیش از چهل کشور و قلمرو حکومتی در تمام قاره‌ها به جز قطب جنوب مرگ‌و‌میر گزارش شد. معمولاً مقیاس‌های اندازه‌گیری مختلفی برای سنجش میزان مرگ‌و‌میر استفاده می‌شود.
en-mt: By March 13, more than forty countries and sovereign territories had reported deaths on all continents except Antarctica. Usually different measurement scales are used to measure mortality rates.

sourceString: These numbers vary by region and over time, and are influenced by the volume of testing, healthcare system quality, treatment options, time since initial outbreak, and population characteristics such as age, sex, and overall health.The death-to-case ratio reflects the number of deaths divided by the number of diagnosed cases within a given time interval.
targetString: این اعداد بر اساس منطقه و در طول زمان تغییر می‌کنند و از میزان آزمایشات، کیفیت سیستم بهداشتی، گزینه‌های درمانی، زمان سپری شده از شیوع اولیه و ویژگی‌های جمعیتی مانند سن، جنسیت و وضعیت کلی سلامت تأثیر می‌پذیرند. نرخ مرگ‌و‌میر با تقسیم تعداد مرگ‌ها بر کل موارد تشخیص داده شده در یک بازه زمانی به دست می‌آید.
en-mt: These numbers vary by region and over time, and are affected by the amount of testing, quality of the health system, treatment options, time elapsed from the initial outbreak, and demographic characteristics such as age, gender and overall health status. The mortality rate is calculated by dividing the number of deaths by the total diagnosed cases in a timeframe.

sourceString: Based on Johns Hopkins University statistics, the global death-to-case ratio is 6.0% (97,039/1,617,204) as of 10 April 2020.
targetString: بر اساس آمار دانشگاه جانز هاپکینز، نرخ مرگ‌و‌میر جهانی تا 10 آوریل 2020، برابر با 6.0% (97,039/1,617,204) است.
en-mt: According to Johns Hopkins University, the global mortality rate is 6.0% (97,039/1,617,204) as of April 10, 2020.

sourceString: The number varies by region.
targetString: این عدد در هر منطقه متفاوت است.
en-mt: This number is different in each region.

sourceString: In China, estimates for the death-to-case ratio decreased from 17.3% (for those with symptom onset 1–10 January 2020) to 0.7% (for those with symptom onset after 1 February 2020).Other measures include the case fatality rate (CFR), which reflects the percent of diagnosed people who die from a disease, and the infection fatality rate (IFR), which reflects the percent of infected (diagnosed and undiagnosed) who die from a disease.
targetString: در چین، تخمین نرخ مرگ‌و‌میر از 17.3% (برای افرادی که شروع علایم آنها از 10-1 ژانویه 2020 بود) تا 0.7% (برای کسانی که شروع علایم آنها پس از 1 فوریه 2020 بود) کاهش یافت.مقیاس‌های اندازه‌گیری دیگر شامل نرخ تلفات موردی (CFR) که درصد افراد مبتلای شناسایی شده که در اثر یک بیماری می‌میرند را نشان می‌دهد و نرخ تلفات بیماری (IFR) که درصد افراد مبتلا (شناسایی شده و نشده) که در اثر یک بیماری می‌میرند را نشان می‌دهد، می‌شود.
en-mt: In China, estimates of mortality declined from 17.3% (for those whose onset of symptoms was from 10-10 January 2020) to 0.7% (for those whose onset of symptoms was after February 1, 2020). Other measurements include the case death rate (CFR), which represents the percentage of people diagnosed with a disease, and the disease death rate (IFR), which is the percentage of people diagnosed (diagnosed and undiagnosed). Dying from a disease, it appears.

sourceString: These statistics are not timebound and follow a specific population from infection through case resolution.
targetString: این آمارها دارای محدودیت زمانی نیستند و یک جمعیت خاص از ابتلا تا حل پرونده دنبال می‌کنند.
en-mt: These statistics do not have a time limit and follow a specific population from catching up to solving cases.

sourceString: A number of academics have attempted to calculate these numbers for specific populations.
targetString: تعدادی از دانشگاهیان تلاش کرده‌اند تا این اعداد را برای جمعیت‌های خاص محاسبه کنند.
en-mt: A number of academics have struggled to calculate these numbers for specific populations.

sourceString: The University of Oxford's Centre for Evidence-Based Medicine estimates that the infection fatality rate for the pandemic as a whole is between 0.1% and 0.39%.
targetString: مرکز پزشکی مبتنی بر شواهد دانشگاه آکسفورد تخمین می‌زند که نرخ تلفات بیماری برای این پاندمی به طور کلی بین 0.1% تا 0.39% است.
en-mt: Oxford University's Centre for Evidence-Based Medicine estimates that the overall mortality rate for the pandemic ranges from 0.1% to 0.39%.

sourceString: The upper estimate of this range is consistent with the results from the first random testing for COVID-19 in Germany, and a statistical study analysing the impact of testing on CFR estimates.
targetString: تخمین حداکثر این محدوده با نتایج به دست آمده از اولین آزمایش تصادفی کووید-19 در آلمان و همچنین مطالعه آماری که تأثیر آزمایش بر تخمین CFR را تحلیل می‌کند، سازگاری دارد.
en-mt: The maximum estimate of this range is consistent with the results obtained from the first randomized trial of COVID-19 in Germany, as well as a statistical study that analyses the effect of the experiment on CFR estimates.

sourceString: The WHO asserts that the pandemic can be controlled.
targetString: WHO تأکید می‌کند که این پاندمی قابل کنترل است.
en-mt: The WHO emphasizes that the pandemic is manageable.

sourceString: The peak and ultimate duration of the outbreak are uncertain and may differ by location.
targetString: در مورد پیک و مدت نهایی این شیوع، نمی‌توان به طور قطعی اظهار نظر کرد و ممکن است بر اساس محل، متفاوت باشد.
en-mt: As for the peak and final duration of this outbreak, it cannot be definitively stated and may vary by location.

sourceString: Maciej Boni of Penn State University stated, "Left unchecked, infectious outbreaks typically plateau and then start to decline when the disease runs out of available hosts.
targetString: Maciej Boni از دانشگاه ایالتی Penn اظهار کرد: "بیماری‌های شایع عفونی در صورتی که اقدامی برای کنترل آنها نشود، معمولاً به ثبات می‌رسند و هنگامی که بیماری از میزبان‌های در دسترس خارج می‌شود، شروع به کاهش می‌کنند.
en-mt: Maciej Boni of Penn State University commented: "Common infectious diseases usually stabilize if they are not taken into account, and begin to decline when the disease is withdrawn from available hosts.

sourceString: But it's almost impossible to make any sensible projection right now about when that will be".
targetString: اما در حال حاضر، ارائه هرگونه پیش‌بینی معقول در مورد اینکه چه زمانی این اتفاق خواهد افتاد، غیرممکن است.
en-mt: But for now, it's impossible to make any reasonable predictions about when this will happen.

sourceString: The Chinese government's senior medical adviser Zhong Nanshan argued that "it could be over by June" if all countries can be mobilized to follow the WHO's advice on measures to stop the spread of the virus.
targetString: Zhong Nanshan، مشاور ارشد پزشکی دولت چین اینگونه استدلال کرد که اگر تمام کشورها بسیج شوند تا توصیه‌های سازمان جهانی بهداشت در زمینه اقدامات مقابله‌ای برای شیوع این ویروس را انجام دهند، "این بیماری می‌تواند تا ژوئن تمام شود".
en-mt: Zhong Nanshan, the Chinese government's chief medical adviser, argued that "the disease could be over by June" if all countries were mobilized to follow the World Health Organization's recommendations on tackling the spread of the virus.

sourceString: On 17 March, Adam Kucharski of the London School of Hygiene & Tropical Medicine stated that SARS-CoV-2 "is going to be circulating, potentially for a year or two".
targetString: Adam Kucharski از دانشکده بهداشت و پزشکی گرمسیری لندن در تاریخ 17 مارس اعلام کرد که SARS-CoV-2 "احتمالاً به مدت یک یا دو سال در گردش خواهد بود".
en-mt: Adam Kucharski of the London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine announced on March 17 that SARS-CoV-2 "is likely to be in circulation for a year or two."

sourceString: According to the Imperial College study led by Neil Ferguson, physical distancing and other measures will be required "until a vaccine becomes available (potentially 18 months or more)".
targetString: بر اساس پژوهش انجام شده به رهبری Neil Ferguson در کالج سلطنتی، فاصله‌گذاری فیزیکی و سایر اقدامات "تا زمانی که یک واکسن ساخته شود (احتمالاً 18 ماه یا بیشتر طول بکشد)" ضروری خواهد بود.
en-mt: According to research led by Neil Ferguson at the Royal College, physical distancing and other measures will be necessary "until a vaccine is developed (possibly 18 months or longer)."

sourceString: William Schaffner of Vanderbilt University stated, "I think it's unlikely that this coronavirus—because it's so readily transmissible—will disappear completely" and it "might turn into a seasonal disease, making a comeback every year".
targetString: William Schaffner از دانشگاه Vanderbilt اعلام کرد "من فکر می‌کنم احتمال اینکه این کرونا ویروس به طور کامل ناپدید شود، کم است - چون به راحتی قابل انتقال است" و "ممکن است به یک بیماری فصلی تبدیل شود که هر سال بازگشت می‌کند".
en-mt: William Schaffner of Vanderbilt University said, "I think the likelihood that the coronavirus will disappear completely is low — because it's easily transmissible" and "may develop into a seasonal disease that recurs every year."

sourceString: The virulence of the comeback would depend on herd immunity and the extent of mutation.
targetString: شدت این بازگشت به مصونیت جمعی و شدت جهش بستگی خواهد داشت.
en-mt: The severity of this return will depend on collective immunity and the severity of the mutation.

sourceString: Symptoms of COVID-19 can be relatively non-specific and infected people may be asymptomatic.
targetString: علایم کووید-19 می‌تواند نسبتاً غیر اختصاصی باشد و افراد مبتلا ممکن است بدون علایم باشند.
en-mt: Symptoms of COVID-19 can be relatively non-specific, and people with COVID-19 may be asymptomatic.

sourceString: The two most common symptoms are fever (88%) and dry cough (68%).
targetString: دو مورد از شایع‌ترین علایم عبارتند از تب (88%) و سرفه خشک (68%).
en-mt: Two of the most common symptoms are fever (88%) and dry cough (68%).

sourceString: Less common symptoms include fatigue, respiratory sputum production (phlegm), loss of the sense of smell, shortness of breath, muscle and joint pain, sore throat, headache, chills, vomiting, hemoptysis, diarrhea, or cyanosis.The WHO states that approximately one person in six becomes seriously ill and has difficulty breathing.
targetString: علایمی که شیوع کمتری دارند عبارتند از خستگی، تولید خلط سینه، از دست دادن حس بویایی، تنگی نفس، درد عضلات و مفاصل، گلو درد، سر درد، لرز، استفراغ، خون بالا آوردن، اسهال و سیانوز. سازمان جهانی بهداشت اعلام کرده که از حدوداً از هر شش نفر، یک نفر به شدت بیمار می‌شود و در تنفس مشکل پیدا می‌کند.
en-mt: Symptoms that are less common include fatigue, sputum production, loss of smell, shortness of breath, sore throat, headache, chills, vomiting, vomiting, diarrhea and cyanosis. According to the World Health Organization, about one in six people will become seriously ill and have difficulty breathing.

sourceString: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) lists emergency symptoms as difficulty breathing, persistent chest pain or pressure, sudden confusion, difficulty waking, and bluish face or lips; immediate medical attention is advised if these symptoms are present.Further development of the disease can lead to severe pneumonia, acute respiratory distress syndrome, sepsis, septic shock and death.
targetString: مرکز پیشگیری و کنترل بیماری ایالات متحده (CDC) لیست علایم اضطراری را منتشر کرده است: مشکل در تنفس، احساس درد یا فشار مداوم در قفسه سینه، پریشانی ناگهانی، مشکل در بیدار شدن، کبود شدن صورت و لب‌ها؛ در صورت بروز این علایم، توصیه می‌شود فوراً رسیدگی پزشکی انجام شود. پیشرفت بیشتر این بیماری می‌تواند منجر به ذات‌الریه شدید، سندروم دیسترس حاد تنفسی، سپسیس، شوک سپتیک و حتی مرگ شود.
en-mt: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) has released a list of emergency symptoms: difficulty breathing, persistent pain or pressure in the chest, sudden distress, difficulty waking up, bruising of the face and lips; if these symptoms occur, medical attention is recommended immediately. Further progression of the disease can lead to severe pneumonia, acute respiratory distress syndrome, sepsis, septic shock and even death.

sourceString: Some of those infected may be asymptomatic, with no clinical symptoms but with test results that confirm infection, so researchers have issued advice that those with close contact to confirmed infected people should be closely monitored and examined to rule out infection.
targetString: ممکن است برخی از افراد مبتلا فاقد علایم باشند، هیچ علایم بالینی نداشته باشند اما نتیجه آزمایش، ابتلای آنها به بیماری را تأیید کند، بنابراین محققان توصیه کرده‌اند که افرادی که ارتباط نزدیک با افراد مبتلا داشته‌اند، باید به دقت تحت نظارت باشند و مورد آزمایش قرار بگیرند تا از آلودگی آنها جلوگیری شود.
en-mt: Some people may be asymptomatic, have no clinical symptoms, but the test results confirm that they have the disease, so researchers have recommended that people who have close contact with those affected should be closely monitored and tested to prevent infection.

sourceString: Chinese estimates of the asymptomatic ratio range from few to 44%.
targetString: برآوردهای انجام شده توسط چین از نرخ افراد فاقد علایم از مقادیر بسیار کم تا 44% متغیر بوده است.
en-mt: China's estimates of rates of asymptomatic people ranged from very low to 44%.

sourceString: The usual incubation period (the time between infection and symptom onset) ranges from one to 14 days; it is most commonly five days.As an example of uncertainty, the estimate of the fraction of people with COVID-19 who lost their sense of smell was initially 30% and later fell to 15%.
targetString: دوره نهفتگی معمول (زمان بین ابتلای فرد تا ظهور علایم) از یک تا 14 روز متغیر است؛ در رایج‌ترین حالت، این دوره پنج روز است. به عنوان نمونه‌ای از عدم اطمینان، آمار بخشی از افراد مبتلا به کووید-19 که حس بویایی خود را از دست می‌دهند، در ابتدا 30% بود اما بعداً به 15% کاهش یافت.
en-mt: The usual incubation period (the time between a person's illness and the appearance of symptoms) ranges from one to fourteen days; in the most common case, it is five days. As an example of uncertainty, the proportion of people with COVID-19 who lose their sense of smell was initially 30% but later decreased to 15%.

sourceString: Some details about how the disease is spread are still being determined.
targetString: برخی جزئیات مربوط به نحوه شیوع این بیماری، هنوز در حال مشخص شدن است.
en-mt: Some details about how the disease is spreading are still being determined.

sourceString: The disease is believed to be primarily spread during close contact and by small droplets produced during coughing, sneezing, or talking; with close contact being within 1 to 2 metres (3 to 6 feet).
targetString: اینگونه تصور می‌شود که این بیماری عمدتاً از طریق ارتباط نزدیک و بوسیله ذرات کوچک تولید شده بر اثر سرفه، عطسه یا صحبت کردن سرایت می‌کند؛ و ارتباط نزدیک به معنای فاصله بین 1 تا 2 متر (3 تا 6 فوت) است.
en-mt: The disease is thought to spread mainly through close contact and by small particles produced by coughing, sneezing or talking, and close contact means a distance of 1 to 2 meters (3 to 6 feet).

sourceString: Studies have found that an uncovered coughing can lead to droplets travelling up to 4.5 metres (15 feet) to 8.2 metres (27 feet).
targetString: پژوهش‌ها نشان داده‌اند که سرفه کردن بدون پوشش می‌تواند ذرات کوچک را بین 4.5 متر (15 فوت) تا 8.2 متر (27 فوت) پخش کنند.
en-mt: Research has shown that uncoated coughing can spread small particles between 4.5 meters (15 feet) to 8.2 meters (27 feet).

sourceString: Some have proposed that the virus may also be transmitted by small droplets that stay for more prolonged periods in the air, that may be generated during speech.Respiratory droplets may also be produced during breathing out, including when talking, though the virus is not generally airborne.
targetString: برخی پژوهش‌ها این موضوع را مطرح کرده‌اند که این ویروس می‌تواند توسط ذرات کوچکی که توسط صحبت کردن تولید می‌شود و برای مدت‌های طولانی‌تری در هوا می‌ماند نیز منتقل شود. اگر چه این ویروس عموماً هوابرد نیست، اما ذرات ریز تنفسی می‌توانند بوسیله تنفس از جمله حرف زدن تولید شوند.
en-mt: Some research has suggested that the virus can also be transmitted by small particles produced by speech that remain in the air for longer periods. Although the virus is not generally airborne, fine respiratory particles can be produced by breathing, including speech.

sourceString: The droplets can land in the mouths or noses of people who are nearby or possibly be inhaled into the lungs.
targetString: این ذرات ریز می‌توانند در دهان یا بینی افراد مجاور فرود بیایند یا از طریق تنفس، به ریه آنها منتقل شوند.
en-mt: These tiny particles can land in the mouths or noses of nearby people, or pass through breathing into their lungs.

sourceString: Some medical procedures such as intubation and cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) may cause respiratory secretions to be aerosolized and thus result in airborne spread.
targetString: برخی اعمال پزشکی از قبیل لوله‌گذاری تنفسی و احیای قلبی ریوی (CPR) می‌تواند منجر به اسپری شدن ترشحات تنفسی در هوا و در نتیجه شیوع هوابرد بیماری شود.
en-mt: Some medical procedures such as respiratory intubation and cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) can lead to spraying of respiratory secretions into the air and therefore the airborne outbreak of disease.

sourceString: It may also spread when one touches a contaminated surface, including skin, and then touches their eyes, nose, or mouth.
targetString: این بیماری همچنین هنگامی که فردی، یک سطح آلوده از جمله پوست را لمس می‌کند و سپس به چشم‌ها، بینی یا دهان خود دست می‌زند، منتقل می‌شود.
en-mt: The disease is also transmitted when a person touches an infected surface, including the skin, and then touches their eyes, nose or mouth.

sourceString: While there are concerns it may spread by faeces, this risk is believed to be low.
targetString: با اینکه نگرانی‌هایی در مورد احتمال انتقال بیماری از طریق مدفوع وجود دارد، اما اینگونه تصور می‌شود که این خطر، کم باشد.
en-mt: While there are concerns about the possibility of fecal transmission, the risk is thought to be low.

sourceString: The Government of China denied the possibility of faecal-oral transmission of SARS-CoV-2.The virus is most contagious during the first three days after onset of symptoms, although spread may be possible before symptoms appear and in later stages of the disease.
targetString: دولت چین، احتمال انتقال مدفوعی-دهانی SARS-CoV-2 را رد کرد.اگر چه امکان انتقال بیماری قبل از ظهور علایم و مراحل بعدی بیماری نیز وجود دارد، اما بیشترین میزان سرایت این ویروس در سه روز اول ظهور علایم است.
en-mt: The Chinese government ruled out the possibility of fecal-oral transmission of SARS-CoV-2, although it is possible to transmit the disease before symptoms and later stages of the disease, the highest spread is in the first three days of symptoms.

sourceString: People have tested positive for the disease up to three days before onset of symptoms suggesting transmission is possible before developing significant symptoms.
targetString: افرادی که نتیجه آزمایش آنها برای این بیماری تا سه روز قبل از ظهور علایم مثبت بوده است، نشان می‌دهند که انتقال بیماری قبل از بروز علایم قابل توجه، امکانپذیر است.
en-mt: People who tested positive for the disease up to three days before the onset of symptoms show that transmission is possible before significant symptoms appear.

sourceString: Only few reports of laboratory-confirmed asymptomatic cases exist, but asymptomatic transmission has been identified by some countries during contact tracing investigations.
targetString: گزارش‌های اندکی از موارد فاقد علایم که توسط آزمایشگاه تأیید شده باشند، وجود دارد اما انتقال بدون علایم در طول تحقیقات ردیابی ارتباطات، توسط برخی کشورها شناسایی شده است.
en-mt: There are few reports of asymptomatic cases that have been confirmed by the lab, but asymptomatic transmission has been identified by some countries during communications tracking research.

sourceString: The European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) states that while it is not entirely clear how easily the disease spreads, one person generally infects two to three others.The virus survives for hours to days on surfaces.
targetString: مرکز کنترل و پیشگیری از بیماری اروپا (ECDC) اعلام کرد که با اینکه نحوه شیوع سریع این بیماری به طور کامل مشخص نیست، معمولاً یک فرد مبتلا می‌تواند دو یا سه فرد دیگر را مبتلا کند. این ویروس بر روی سطوح مختلف، از ساعت‌ها تا روزها زنده می‌ماند.
en-mt: The European Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (ECDC) said that while it is not entirely clear how quickly the disease spreads, usually one infected person can infect two or three other people. The virus survives on various surfaces, from hours to days.

sourceString: Specifically, the virus was found to be detectable for up to three days on plastic (polypropylene) and 304 stainless steel, for one day on cardboard, and for up to four hours on copper.
targetString: به طور خاص، مشخص شده است که این ویروس تا سه روز بر روی سطوح پلاستیکی (پلی پروپیلن) و استیل ضد زنگ 304، تا یک روز بر روی مقوا و تا حداکثر چهار ساعت بر روی مس زنده می‌ماند.
en-mt: In particular, it has been found that the virus survives for up to three days on plastic (polypropylene) and stainless steel 304 surfaces, up to one day on cardboard and up to four hours on copper.

sourceString: This, however, varies based on the humidity and temperature.Pets and other animals have tested positive for COVID-19.
targetString: با این حال، این مقادیر بسته به رطوبت و دما می‌تواند تغییر کند. تا کنون مواردی از مثبت بودن نتیجه آزمایش حیوانات خانگی و سایر حیوانات برای کووید-19 اتفاق افتاده است.
en-mt: However, these values can vary depending on humidity and temperature. So far, there have been cases of positive testing of pets and other animals for COVID-19.

sourceString: There is no evidence animals can pass the virus on to humans, though British authorities advise washing one's hands after contact with animals, like after contact with other surfaces infected people could have touched.
targetString: هیچ مدرکی از اینکه حیوانات بتوانند ویروس را به انسان منتقل کنند، وجود ندارد، با این حال مقامات انگلیسی توصیه می‌کنند افراد پس از تماس با حیوانات، همانند حالتی که با سایر سطوحی که ممکن است افراد آلوده آنها را لمس کرده باشند، تماس دارند، دستان خود را بشویند.
en-mt: There is no evidence that animals can transmit the virus to humans, however British authorities recommend that people wash their hands after contact with animals, as if they come into contact with other surfaces that infected people may have touched.

sourceString: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is a novel virus, first isolated from three people with pneumonia connected to the cluster of acute respiratory illness cases in Wuhan.
targetString: سندروم حاد تنفسی کرونا ویروس 2 (SARS-CoV-2) یک ویروس جدید است که اولین بار از سه فرد مبتلا به ذات‌الریه که با گروهی از افراد دارای بیماری تنفسی حاد در ووهان در تماس بودند، شناسایی شد.
en-mt: Acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is a novel virus that was first identified from three people with pneumonia who came into contact with a group of people with acute respiratory illness in Wuhan.

sourceString: All features of the novel SARS-CoV-2 virus occur in related coronaviruses in nature.Outside the human body, the virus is killed by household soap, which dissolves its protective envelope.SARS-CoV-2 is closely related to the original SARS-CoV.
targetString: تمام ویژگی‌های ویروس SARS-CoV-2 جدید، در کرونا ویروس‌های مرتبط در طبیعت اتفاق می‌افتد. در خارج از بدن انسان، این ویروس توسط صابون خانگی که پوشش محافظ آن را از بین می‌برد، کشته می‌شود. SARS-CoV-2 ارتباط نزدیکی با SARS-CoV اصلی دارد.
en-mt: All the features of the novel SARS-CoV-2 virus occur in corona related viruses in nature. Outside the human body, the virus is killed by homemade soap that destroys its protective coating. SARS-CoV-2 is closely related to the original SARS-CoV.

sourceString: It is thought to have a zoonotic origin.
targetString: اینگونه تصور می‌شود که این ویروس منشأ حیوانی داشته باشد.
en-mt: The virus is thought to be of animal origin.

sourceString: Genetic analysis has revealed that the coronavirus genetically clusters with the genus Betacoronavirus, in subgenus Sarbecovirus (lineage B) together with two bat-derived strains.
targetString: تجزیه و تحلیل ژنتیکی نشان داده که کرونا ویروس از نظر ژنتیکی از گونه بتاکرونا ویروس، زیرگونه ساربکو ویروس (نسل B) همراه با دو ژن مشتق شده از خفاش است.
en-mt: Genetic analysis has shown that the coronavirus is genetically derived from the beta-coronavirus species, the subtype Sarbeco virus (generation B), along with two genes derived from bats.

sourceString: It is 96% identical at the whole genome level to other bat coronavirus samples (BatCov RaTG13).
targetString: این ویروس در سطح ژنوم کلی به میزان 96 با سایر نمونه‌های کرونا ویروس خفاش (BatCov RaTG13) مطابقت دارد.
en-mt: The virus corresponds to other bat coronavirus samples (BatCov RaTG13) at the level of the overall genome.

sourceString: In February 2020, Chinese researchers found that there is only one amino acid difference in certain parts of the genome sequences between the viruses from pangolins and those from humans.
targetString: در فوریه سال 2020، محققان چینی دریافتند که بین ویروس‌های پانگولین‌ها و انسان‌ها، تنها یک آمینواسید در بخش‌های خاصی از توالی ژنوم آنها تفاوت وجود دارد.
en-mt: In February 2020, Chinese researchers found that between pangolin viruses and humans, there was only one amino acid in specific parts of the genome sequence.

sourceString: Whole-genome comparison to date has found at most 92% of genetic material shared between pangolin coronavirus and SARS-CoV-2, which is insufficient to prove pangolins to be the intermediate host.
targetString: مقایسه ژنوم کامل تا به امروز به این نتیجه رسیده است که حداکثر 92% از مواد ژنتیکی بین کرونا ویروس پانگولین و SARS-CoV-2 مشترک است، که این عدد برای اثبات اینکه پانگولین‌ها میزبان واسط هستند، کافی نیست.
en-mt: A comparison of the complete genome to date has found that up to 92% of genetic material is shared between pangolin coronavirus and SARS-CoV-2, which is not enough to prove that pangolins are intermediate hosts.

sourceString: Infection by the virus can be provisionally diagnosed on the basis of symptoms, though confirmation is ultimately by reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) of infected secretions or CT imaging.
targetString: آلوده شدن توسط ویروس، به طور موقت می‌تواند از طریق علایم تشخیص داده شود، با این حال تأیید نهایی از طریق واکنش زنجیره‌ای پلیمراز رونویسی معکوس (rRT-PCR) ترشحات آلوده یا تصویربرداری CT انجام می‌شود.
en-mt: Infection by the virus can be detected temporarily through symptoms, however the final confirmation is done through reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) of contaminated secretions or CT imaging.

sourceString: A study comparing PCR to CT in Wuhan has suggested that CT is significantly more sensitive than PCR, though less specific, with many of its imaging features overlapping with other pneumonias and disease processes.
targetString: پژوهشی که PCR را با CT در ووهان مقایسه می‌کند، پیشنهاد داده است که CT به میزان قابل توجهی حساس‌تر از PCR است و در عین حال کمتر اختصاصی است چون بسیاری از ویژگی‌های تصویربرداری CT با سایر بیماری‌های التهابی ریه و فرایندهای بیماری همپوشانی دارد.
en-mt: Research comparing PCR to CT in Wuhan has suggested that CT is significantly more sensitive than PCR and at the same time less specific, because many of CT's imaging features overlap with other inflammatory lung diseases and disease processes.

sourceString: As of March 2020, the American College of Radiology recommends that "CT should not be used to screen for or as a first-line test to diagnose COVID-19".
targetString: از مارس 2020، کالج رادیولوژی آمریکا توصیه کرد که " CT نباید به عنوان غربالگری یا آزمایش اولیه برای تشخیص کووید-19 به کار برده شود."
en-mt: As of March 2020, the American College of Radiology recommended that "CT should not be used as a screening or primary test for the diagnosis of COVID-19."

sourceString: The WHO has published several RNA testing protocols for SARS-CoV-2, with the first issued on 17 January.
targetString: سازمان بهداشت جهانی چندین پروتکل آزمایش RNA برای SARS-CoV-2 منتشر کرده است که اولین آنها در 17 ژانویه منتشر شد.
en-mt: The World Health Organization has published several RNA testing protocols for SARS-CoV-2, the first of which was published on January 17.

sourceString: The test uses real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR).
targetString: این آزمایش از واکنش زنجیره‌ای پلیمراز رونویسی معکوس (rRT-PCR) لحظه‌ای استفاده می‌کند.
en-mt: This test uses the reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) of the moment.

sourceString: The test can be done on respiratory or blood samples.
targetString: این آزمایش بر روی نمونه‌های تنفسی و خونی قابل انجام است.
en-mt: This test can be performed on respiratory and blood samples.

sourceString: Results are generally available within a few hours to days.
targetString: نتایج این آزمایش معمولاً بین چند ساعت تا چند روز مشخص می‌شوند.
en-mt: The results of this test are usually determined within a few hours to a few days.

sourceString: Generally this test is carried out on a nasopharyngeal swab though a throat swab may also be used.A number of laboratories and companies are developing serological tests, which detect antibodies.
targetString: معمولاً این آزمایش با یک سواب نازوفارنکس انجام می‌شود، با این حال، از سواب گلو نیز می‌توان استفاده کرد. تعدادی از آزمایشگاه‌ها و شرکت‌ها در حال کار بر روی آزمایش‌های سرولوژیکی هستند که آنتی‌بادی‌ها را تشخیص می‌دهد.
en-mt: Usually, this test is done with a nasopharyngeal swab, however, a throat swab can also be used. A number of laboratories and companies are working on serological tests that detect antibodies.

sourceString: As of 6 April 2020, none of these has been proved sufficiently accurate to be approved for widespread use.
targetString: تا تاریخ 6 آوریل 2020، هیچ یک از این روش‌ها به اندازه کافی دقیق نبوده‌اند تا برای استفاده گسترده تأیید شوند.
en-mt: As of April 6, 2020, none of these methods have been accurate enough to be approved for widespread use.

sourceString: In the US a serological test developed by Cellex has been approved for emergency use by certified laboratories only.
targetString: در ایالات متحده، یک آزمایش سرولوژیک که توسط Cellex ابداع شده برای استفاده اضطراری تنها توسط برخی آزمایشگاه‌های معتبر تأیید شده است.
en-mt: In the United States, a serological test developed by Cellex has been approved for emergency use only by some accredited laboratories.

sourceString: Characteristic imaging features on radiographs and computed tomography (CT) of people who are symptomatic include asymmetric peripheral ground glass opacities and absent pleural effusions.
targetString: ویژگی‌های مشخصه تصویربرداری در رادیوگرافی و توموگرافی کامپیوتری (CT) افرادی که دارای علایم هستند شامل نماهای گراند گلاس پیرامونی نامتقارن و نبود تراوش جنبی می‌شود.
en-mt: Characteristic features of imaging in radiography and computed tomography (CT) of patients with symptoms include asymmetric peripheral grand glass views and no lateral leakage.

sourceString: The Italian Radiological Society is compiling an international online database of imaging findings for confirmed cases.
targetString: انجمن رادیولوژی ایتالیا در حال گردآوری یک پایگاه داده آنلاین بین‌المللی از یافته‌های تصویربرداری موارد تأیید شده مبتلا به بیماری است.
en-mt: The Italian Society of Radiology is compiling an international online database of imaging findings of confirmed cases of the disease.

sourceString: Due to overlap with other infections such as adenovirus, imaging without confirmation by PCR is of limited specificity in identifying COVID-19.
targetString: تصویربرداری بدون تأیید توسط PCR، به دلیل همپوشانی با سایر عفونت‌ها از قبیل آدنوویروس، به صورت اختصاصی برای شناسایی کووید-19 قابل استفاده نیست.
en-mt: Imaging without PCR verification cannot be used specifically to detect COVID-19 due to overlap with other infections, such as adenovirus.

sourceString: A large study in China compared chest CT results to PCR and demonstrated that though imaging is less specific for the infection, it is faster and more sensitive, suggesting its consideration as a screening tool in epidemic areas.
targetString: یک پژوهش بزرگ در چین، نتایج CT قفسه سینه را با PCR مقایسه کرد و نشان داد که اگرچه تصویربرداری کمتر به صورت اختصاصی برای تشخیص این بیماری قابل استفاده است، اما سریعتر و حساس‌تر است و پیشنهاد داد که از آن به عنوان یک ابزار غربالگری در نواحی دارای همه‌گیری استفاده شود.
en-mt: A large study in China compared the results of chest CT to PCR and found that although imaging is less specific to the diagnosis, it is faster and more sensitive, and suggested it be used as a screening tool in epidemic areas.

sourceString: Artificial intelligence-based convolutional neural networks have been developed to detect imaging features of the virus with both radiographs and CT.
targetString: شبکه‌های عصبی پیچشی مبتنی بر هوش مصنوعی، توسعه یافته‌اند تا ویژگی‌های تصویربرداری این ویروس را هم توسط رادیوگرافی و هم توسط CT تشخیص دهند.
en-mt: Artificial Intelligence-based Torsional Neural Networks have been developed to detect the imaging properties of the virus by both radiography and CT.

sourceString: Strategies for preventing transmission of the disease include maintaining overall good personal hygiene, washing hands, avoiding touching the eyes, nose, or mouth with unwashed hands, and coughing or sneezing into a tissue and putting the tissue directly into a waste container.
targetString: برخی روش‌ها برای جلوگیری از انتقال این بیماری عبارتند از رعایت مناسب بهداشت شخصی، شستشوی دست‌ها، دست نزدن به چشم‌ها، بینی یا دهان با دست نشسته و گرفتن دستمال در هنگام سرفه یا عطسه و انداختن مستقیم دستمال در سطل زباله.
en-mt: Some ways to prevent transmission of the disease include proper personal hygiene, hand washing, not touching the eyes, nose or mouth with a washed hand, and holding a handkerchief when coughing or sneezing, and dropping the handkerchief directly into the trash.

sourceString: Those who may already have the infection have been advised to wear a surgical mask in public.
targetString: به کسانی که از قبل مبتلا به این بیماری هستند، توصیه می‌شود در محیط‌های عمومی، ماسک جراحی بزنند.
en-mt: Those who already have the disease are advised to wear surgical masks in public settings.

sourceString: Physical distancing measures are also recommended to prevent transmission.Many governments have restricted or advised against all non-essential travel to and from countries and areas affected by the outbreak.
targetString: رعایت اقدمات مربوط به فاصله‌گذاری فیزیکی نیز برای جلوگیری از انتقال این بیماری توصیه می‌شود. بسیاری از دولت‌ها مسافرت‌های غیرضروری را به کشورها یا مناطقی که این بیماری در آنجا شایع است، ممنوع کرده یا توصیه کرده‌اند انجام نشود.
en-mt: Physical distancing is also recommended to prevent transmission of this disease. Many governments have prohibited or recommended non-essential travel to countries or regions where the disease is common.

sourceString: However, the virus has reached the stage of community spread in large parts of the world.
targetString: با این حال، این ویروس در بسیاری از بخش‌های جهان به مرحله شیوع در سطح جامعه رسیده است.
en-mt: However, the virus has reached a community-wide epidemic in many parts of the world.

sourceString: This means that the virus is spreading within communities, and some community members don't know where or how they were infected.Health care providers taking care of someone who may be infected are recommended to use standard precautions, contact precautions, and eye protection.Contact tracing is an important method for health authorities to determine the source of an infection and to prevent further transmission.
targetString: این موضوع به این معناست که این ویروس در حال گسترش درون جوامع است و برخی افراد نمی‌دانند که از کجا یا چگونه آلوده شده‌اند. به افرادی که برای مبتلایان احتمالی، مراقبت‌های بهداشتی ارائه می‌دهند، توصیه می‌شود اقدامات احتیاطی استاندارد، اقدامات احتیاطی مربوط به تماس را رعایت کنند و از محافظ چشم استفاده کنند. ردگیری تماس‌ها یکی از شیوه‌های مهم برای مقامات بهداشتی است تا بتوانند منبع آلودگی را تشخیص دهند و از انتقال بیشتر آن جلوگیری کنند.
en-mt: This means that the virus is spreading within communities, and some people don't know where or how they were infected. People who provide health care for possible sufferers are advised to follow standard precautions, contact precautions, and wear eye protection. Tracking calls is an important way for health authorities to identify the source of the infection and prevent further transmission.

sourceString: The use of location data from mobile phones by governments for this purpose has prompted privacy concerns, with Amnesty International and over 100 other organizations issuing a statement calling for limits on this kind of surveillance.
targetString: استفاده از اطلاعات موقعیت مکانی تلفن همراه توسط دولت‌ها برای این هدف، موجب نگرانی‌هایی در زمینه حریم خصوصی شده است و سازمان عفو بین‌الملل و بیش از 100 سازمان دیگر، بیانیه‌ای برای محدود کردن این نوع از نظارت صادر کرده‌اند.
en-mt: The use of mobile phone location information by governments for this purpose has raised privacy concerns, and Amnesty International and more than 100 other organisations have issued a statement to limit this type of surveillance.

sourceString: Various mobile apps have been implemented or proposed for voluntary use, and as of April 7, 2020, over a dozen expert groups were working on privacy-friendly solutions, such as using Bluetooth to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: برنامه‌های مختلفی برای تلفن همراه ایجاد یا پیشنهاد شده تا به صورت داوطلبانه مورد استفاده قرار گیرد و تا 7 آوریل 2020، بیش از ده‌ها گروه کارشناس در حال تلاش برای راه‌حل هایی هستند که نقض کننده حریم خصوصی نباشد مانند استفاده از بلوتوث برای ثبت میزان نزدیک شدن کاربر به سایر تلفن‌های همراه.
en-mt: Various mobile apps have been created or proposed to be used voluntarily, and as of April 7, 2020, more than a dozen expert groups are working on solutions that do not violate privacy, such as using Bluetooth to record how close a user is to other mobile phones.

sourceString: Users then receive a message if they've been in close contact with someone who has tested positive for COVID-19.Misconceptions are circulating about how to prevent infection; for example, rinsing the nose and gargling with mouthwash are not effective.
