en-mt: The Hong Kong Hospitals Administration report noted a 20% to 30% reduction in lung capacity in some people recovering from the disease and the presence of signs of organ damage on lung scans.

sourceString: This may also lead to post-intensive care syndrome following recovery.
targetString: این وضعیت ممکن است به سندروم پس-مراقبت ویژه پس از بهبود منجر شود.
en-mt: This condition may lead to post-intensive care syndrome after recovery.

sourceString: As of March 2020, it was unknown if past infection provides effective and long-term immunity in people who recover from the disease.
targetString: تا مارس 2020، مشخص نبود که آیا سابقه ابتلا سبب مصونیت موثر و بلند مدت در افراد بهبودیافته از این بیماری می‌شود یا خیر.
en-mt: As of March 2020, it was unclear whether the history of the infection would lead to effective, long-term immunity in people recovering from the disease.

sourceString: Immunity is seen as likely, based on the behaviour of other coronaviruses, but cases in which recovery from COVID-19 have been followed by positive tests for coronavirus at a later date have been reported.
targetString: بروز مصونیت، بر اساس رفتار دیگر کروناویروس‌ها، متحمل است ولی در برخی موارد نتیجه آزمایش ابتلا به کروناویروس در افراد بهبودیافته از کووید-19 نیز مثبت بوده است.
en-mt: The incidence of immunity is tolerant based on the behavior of other coronaviruses, but in some cases the coronavirus test has also been positive in people recovering from COVID-19.

sourceString: These cases are believed to be worsening of a lingering infection rather than re-infection.
targetString: این باور وجود دارد که این موارد ناشی از وخامت عفونت نهفته و نه ابتلای دوباره به عفونت است.
en-mt: It is believed that these cases are caused by the deterioration of the latent infection rather than the recurrence of the infection.

sourceString: The virus is thought to be natural and have an animal origin, through spillover infection.
targetString: تصور بر این است که این ویروس طبیعی و دارای منشاء حیوانی، از طریق عفونت سرریز است.
en-mt: The virus is thought to be natural and of animal origin, through an overflow infection.

sourceString: The actual origin is unknown, but by December 2019 the spread of infection was almost entirely driven by human-to-human transmission.
targetString: منشاء واقعی نامشخص است، ولی تا دسامبر 2019 شیوع این عفونت تقریباً به صورت کامل مبتنی بر انتقال انسان-به-انسان بود.
en-mt: The true origin is unclear, but by December 2019 the outbreak was almost entirely based on human-to-human transmission.

sourceString: A study of the first 41 cases of confirmed COVID-19, published in January 2020 in The Lancet, revealed the earliest date of onset of symptoms as 1 December 2019.
targetString: با بررسی 41 مورد نخست کووید-19 تاییدشده، که در ژانویه 2020 در مجله The Lancet منتشر شد، نخستین مورد از بروز نشانه‌های آن به 1 دسامبر 2019 بازمی‌گردد.
en-mt: With a review of the first 41 confirmed cases of COVID-19, published in the journal The Lancet in January 2020, the first cases of COVID-19 occurred on December 1, 2019.

sourceString: Official publications from the WHO reported the earliest onset of symptoms as 8 December 2019.
targetString: نشریات رسمی WHO تاریخ نخستین موارد ظهور نشانه‌ها را 8 دسامبر 2019 اعلام کرده‌اند.
en-mt: Official WHO publications have announced the date of the first occurrence of signs on 8 December 2019.

sourceString: Several measures are commonly used to quantify mortality.
targetString: برای سنجش آمار مرگ‌ومیر، معمولاً از معیارهای مختلفی استفاده می‌شود.
en-mt: To measure mortality statistics, different criteria are usually used.

sourceString: These numbers vary by region and over time and are influenced by the volume of testing, healthcare system quality, treatment options, time since initial outbreak and population characteristics such as age, sex and overall health.
targetString: این ارقام بر حسب منطقه و با گذشت زمان تغییر می‌کند و از حجم آزمایش‌ها، کیفیت نظام سلامت، گزینه‌های درمان، زمان سپری‌شده از شیوع اولیه و ویژگی‌های جمعیتی مانند سن، جنسیت و سلامت کلی تاثیر می‌پذیرد.
en-mt: These figures vary by region and over time, and are affected by the volume of tests, the quality of the health system, treatment options, time elapsed from the initial outbreak and demographic characteristics such as age, gender and overall health.

sourceString: In late 2019, WHO assigned the emergency ICD-10 disease codes U07.1 for deaths from lab-confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infection and U07.2 for deaths from clinically or epidemiologically diagnosed COVID-19 without lab-confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infection.The death-to-case ratio reflects the number of deaths divided by the number of diagnosed cases within a given time interval.
targetString: در اواخر 2019، WHO کدهای بیماری ICD-10 اضطراری U07.1 را برای مرگ ناشی از عفونت SARS-CoV-2 تاییدشده در آزمایشگاه و U07.2 را برای مرگ ناشی از کووید-19 مشمول تشخیص بالینی یا همه‌گیرشناختی بدون عفونت SARS-CoV-2 تاییدشده در آزمایشگاه اختصاص داد. نرخ تلفات با تقسیم تعداد موارد مرگ بر تعداد موارد تشخیص‌داده‌شده در بازه زمانی معین به دست می‌آید.
en-mt: In late 2019, WHO assigned the ICD-10 Emergency Disease Codes U07.1 for deaths from laboratory-approved SARS-CoV-2 infection and U07.2 for deaths from COVID-19 subject to clinical or epidemiological diagnosis without laboratory-approved SARS-CoV-2 infection. The death rate is calculated by dividing the number of deaths by the number of cases diagnosed within a given time frame.

sourceString: Based on Johns Hopkins University statistics, the global death-to-case ratio is 6.9% (153,822/2,240,191) as of 17 April 2020.
targetString: بر اساس آمار دانشگاه جان هاپکینز، تا 17 آوریل 2020 نرخ جهانی تلفات 6.9% (153,822/2,240,191) بوده است.
en-mt: According to Johns Hopkins University, as of April 17, 2020, the global casualty rate was 6.9% (153,822/2,240,191).

sourceString: The number varies by region.Other measures include the case fatality rate (CFR), which reflects the percent of diagnosed individuals who die from a disease, and the infection fatality rate (IFR), which reflects the percent of infected individuals (diagnosed and undiagnosed) who die from a disease.
targetString: این رقم در هر منطقه فرق می‌کند. از دیگر مقیاس های سنجش می‌توان به نرخ مرگ‌ومیر موردی (CFR) اشاره کرد که درصد افراد تشخیص‌داده‌شده که بر اثر بیماری می‌میرند را مشخص می‌کند. نرخ مرگ‌ومیر عفونی (IFR) معیار دیگری است که درصد افراد آلوده (تشخیص‌داده‌شده و نشده) که بر اثر بیماری می‌میرند را مشخص می‌کند.
en-mt: This number varies in each region. Other measures include the case mortality rate (CFR), which determines the percentage of people diagnosed who die from the disease. Infectious mortality rates (IFR) are another measure that determines the percentage of infected people (diagnosed and undiagnosed) who die from the disease.

sourceString: These statistics are not time bound and follow a specific population from infection through case resolution.
targetString: این آمار محدود به زمان نیست و جمعیت خاصی را از مرحله عفونت تا بسته شدن پرونده دنبال می‌کند.
en-mt: These statistics are not limited to time and follow a specific population from the infection stage to the closing of the case.

sourceString: While not all infected people develop antibodies, the presence of antibodies may provide information about how many people have been infected.
targetString: هرچند همه افراد آلوده لزوماً پادتن تولید نمی‌کنند، وجود پادتن ممکن است اطلاعاتی درباره تعداد افراد آلوده ارائه کند.
en-mt: Although not everyone infected produces antibodies necessarily, the presence of antibodies may provide information about how many people are infected.

sourceString: In the epicentre of the outbreak in Italy, Castiglione d'Adda, a small village of 4600, 80 (1.7%) are already dead.
targetString: در روستای کوچک 4600 نفره Castiglione d'Adda، کانون شیوع ویروس در ایتالیا، 80 تن (1.7%) جان سپرده‌اند.
en-mt: In the small village of Castiglione d'Adda, the epicenter of the virus outbreak in Italy, 80 people (1.7%) have died.

sourceString: In Gangelt, the disease was spread by Carnival festivals, and spread to younger people, causing a relatively lower mortality, and not all COVID-19 deaths may have been formally classified as such.
targetString: در Gangelt، این بیماری بر اثر جشنواره‌های Carnival شیوع یافت. آلوده شدن جوانان باعث شد که نرخ مرگ‌ومیر نسبتاً پایین‌تر باشد. البته برخی موارد مرگ ناشی از کووید-19 رسماً در دسته مرگ بر اثر این ویروس جای نگرفته‌اند.
en-mt: In Gangelt, the disease was caused by carnival festivals. Infection of young people led to relatively lower mortality rates. However, some deaths from COVID-19 are not officially included in the category of deaths from the virus.

sourceString: Furthermore, the German health system has not been overwhelmed.
targetString: در ضمن، نظام سلامت آلمان کارآمدی خود را حفظ کرده است.
en-mt: Meanwhile, the German health system has maintained its effectiveness.

sourceString: In the Netherlands, about 3% may have antibodies, as assessed from blood donors.
targetString: در هلند، حدود 3% افراد، بر اساس ارزیابی اهداکنندگان خون، ممکن است پادتن تولید کرده باشند.
en-mt: In the Netherlands, about 3% of people may have produced antibodies, based on blood donor assessments.

sourceString: 69 (0.004% of the population) have been confirmed to have died from COVID-19.
targetString: 69 مورد (0.004% جمعیت) مرگ تاییدشده بر اثر کووید-19 ثبت شده است.
en-mt: There have been 69 confirmed deaths from COVID-19 (0.004% of the population).

sourceString: The impact of the pandemic and its mortality rate are different for men and women.
targetString: اثر این پاندمی و نرخ تلفات آن در بین زنان و مردان متفاوت است.
en-mt: The effect of the pandemic and its casualty rates vary between men and women.

sourceString: Mortality is higher in men in studies conducted in China and Italy.
targetString: در مطالعات انجام‌گرفته در چین و ایتالیا، نرخ مرگ‌ومیر در مردان بالاتر اعلام شده است.
en-mt: In studies in China and Italy, mortality rates have been higher in men.

sourceString: The highest risk for men is in their 50s, with the gap between men and women closing only at 90.
targetString: بالاترین احتمال ابتلا در مردان در سنین بالاتر از 50 است. این شکاف بین زنان و مردان در 90 سالگی از بین می‌رود.
en-mt: The highest risk is in men over the age of 50. This gap between men and women closes in their 90s.

sourceString: In China, the death rate was 2.8 percent for men and 1.7 percent for women.
targetString: در چین، نرخ مرگ 2.8 درصد برای مردان و 1.7 درصد برای زنان بود.
en-mt: In China, the death rate was 2.8 percent for men and 1.7 percent for women.

sourceString: The exact reasons for this sex-difference is not known, but genetic and behavioural factors could be a reason.
targetString: دلایل این تفاوت جنسی مشخص نیست ولی عوامل ژنتیکی و رفتاری ممکن است بر آن تاثیرگذار باشد.
en-mt: The reasons for this sex difference are not known, but genetic and behavioral factors may influence it.

sourceString: Sex-based immunological differences, lesser prevalence of smoking in women and men developing co-morbid conditions such as hypertension at a younger age than women could have contributed to the higher mortality in men.
targetString: تفاوت‌های ایمنی‌شناختی مبتنی بر جنسیت، شیوع کمتر مصرف سیگار در بین زنان، و ابتلای بیشتر مردان به بیماری‌های همایند از قبیل پرفشاری خون، در سنین پایین تر نسبت به زنان ممکن است در بالا رفتن نرخ تلفات در مردان نقش داشته باشد.
en-mt: Gender-based immunological differences, a lower prevalence of smoking among women, and greater incidence of co-morbidities such as hypertension may play a role in men's higher mortality rates at a younger age than women.

sourceString: In Europe, 57% of the infected individuals were men and 72% of those died with COVID-19 were men.
targetString: در اروپا، 57% افراد آلوده مرد و 72% آنهایی که بر اثر کووید-19 جان باخته‌اند، مرد بوده‌اند.
en-mt: In Europe, 57% of infected people were men and 72% of those who died from COVID-19 were men.

sourceString: As of April 2020, the US government is not tracking sex-related data of COVID-19 infections.
targetString: تا آوریل 2020، دولت ایالات متحده اقدامی برای رهگیری داده‌های مرتبط به جنسیت در زمینه عفونت کووید-19 انجام نداده است.
en-mt: As of April 2020, the U.S. government has not taken steps to intercept gender-related data on COVID-19 infection.

sourceString: Research has shown that viral illnesses like Ebola, HIV, influenza and SARS affect men and women differently.
targetString: تحقیقات نشان داده است که بیماری‌های ویروسی مانند ابولا، HIV، آنفولانزا و سارس تاثیر متفاوتی بر مردان و زنان می‌گذارد.
en-mt: Research has shown that viral diseases such as Ebola, HIV, the flu and SARS have a different impact on men and women.

sourceString: A higher percentage of health workers, particularly nurses, are women, and they have a higher chance of being exposed to the virus.
targetString: درصد بالاتری از کادر درمانی، به‌ویژه پرستاران، مونث هستند و احتمال قرار گرفتن آنها در معرض ویروس بالاتر است.
en-mt: A higher percentage of medical staff, especially nurses, are female, and they are more likely to be exposed to the virus.

sourceString: The World Health Organization announced on 11 February 2020 that the official name of the disease would be "COVID-19".
targetString: سازمان بهداشت جهانی در 11 فوریه 2020 اعلام کرد که «کووید-19» به عنوان نام رسمی این بیماری انتخاب شده است.
en-mt: The World Health Organization announced on 11 February 2020 that COVID-19 had been named as the official name for the disease.

sourceString: WHO chief Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus explained that CO stands for corona, VI for virus, D for disease, and 19 for when the outbreak was first identified: 31 December 2019.
targetString: Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus، رئیس WHO، اعلام کرد که CO سرنام کرونا، VI مربوط به ویروس، D مخفف بیماری و 19 مربوط به زمان نخستین مرتبه شناسایی آن است: 31 دسامبر 2019.
en-mt: WHO President Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus announced that CO stands for coronavirus, VI related to the virus, D stands for disease, and 19 for the first time it was detected: December 31, 2019.

sourceString: The name had been chosen to avoid references to a specific geographical location (e.g. China), animal species or group of people, in line with international recommendations for naming aimed at preventing stigmatisation.The virus that causes COVID-19 is named severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: این نام برای جلوگیری از ارجاع به مکان‌های جغرافیایی خاص (مانند چین)، گونه‌های حیوانی یا گروه افراد، بر اساس پیشنهادهای بین‌المللی نامگذاری و با هدف پیشگیری از برچسب‌زنی انتخاب شده است. ویروس عامل کووید-19، کروناویروس 2 سندروم تنفسی حاد شدید (SARS-CoV-2) نام دارد.
en-mt: The name was chosen to avoid references to specific geographic locations (such as China), animal species or groups of people, based on international recommendations and aimed at preventing labelling. The virus causing COVID-19 is called severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

sourceString: The WHO additionally uses "the COVID-19 virus" and "the virus responsible for COVID-19" in public communications.
targetString: WHO همچنین از عنوان «ویروس کووید-19» و «ویروس عامل کووید-19» در ارتباطات رسمی استفاده می‌کند.
en-mt: The WHO also uses the terms "COVID-19" and "Covid-19 virus" in official communications.

sourceString: Both the disease and virus are commonly referred to as "coronavirus".
targetString: این بیماری و ویروس عامل آن مشترکاً «کروناویروس» نام دارند.
en-mt: The disease and the virus that causes it are jointly called "coronavirus".

sourceString: During the initial outbreak in Wuhan, China, the virus and disease were commonly referred to as "coronavirus" and "Wuhan coronavirus".
targetString: در مراحل اولیه شیوع بیماری در ووهان، چین، نام «کروناویروس» و «کروناویروس ووهان» مشترکاً به ویروس و بیماری داده می‌شد.
en-mt: In the early stages of the outbreak in Wuhan, China, the names "coronavirus" and "Wuhan coronavirus" were coined to the virus and the disease.

sourceString: In January 2020, WHO recommended 2019-nCov and 2019-nCoV acute respiratory disease as interim names for the virus and disease in accordance with 2015 guidance against using locations in disease and virus names.
targetString: در ژانویه 2020، سازمان بهداشت جهانی 2019-nCov و بیماری تنفسی حاد 2019-nCoV را به عنوان نامهای موقت این بیماری در نظر گرفت. این نامها بر اساس دستورالعمل 2015 درباره پرهیز از گنجاندن نام مکان‌ها برای نامگذاری ویروس و بیماری انتخاب شدند.
en-mt: In January 2020، the World Health Organization designated 2019-nCov and acute respiratory disease 2019-nCoV as temporary names for the disease. The names were chosen in accordance with the 2015 Guidelines on Avoiding Inclusion of Place Names for Virus and Disease.

sourceString: The official names COVID-19 and SARS-CoV-2 were issued on 11 February 2020.
targetString: نام های رسمی کووید-19 و SARS-CoV-2 در 11 فوریه 2020 منتشر شد.
en-mt: The official names COVID-19 and SARS-CoV-2 were released on February 11, 2020.

sourceString: Due to capacity limitations in the standard supply chains, some digital manufacturers are printing healthcare material such as nasal swabs and ventilator parts.
targetString: به دلیل محدویت‌های ظرفیت در زنجیره‌های تامین استاندارد، برخی تولیدکنندگان دیجیتال اقدام به تولید اقلام بهداشتی مانند سواب بینی و قطعات دستگاه هوارسان می‌کنند.
en-mt: Due to capacity constraints in standard supply chains, some digital manufacturers produce hygiene items such as nasal swabs and air conditioner parts.

sourceString: In one example, when an Italian hospital urgently required a ventilator valve, and the supplier was unable to deliver in the timescale required, a local startup reverse-engineered and printed the required 100 valves overnight.
targetString: مثلاً، در یک مورد، یک بیمارستان ایتالیایی به سوپاپ دستگاه هوارسان نیاز مبرم داشت و تامین‌کننده نمی‌توانست آن را به‌موقع تامین کند. در نتیجه یک استارت‌آپ محلی اقدام به مهندسی معکوس و تولید شبانه 100 سوپاپ مورد نیاز کرد.
en-mt: For example, in one case, an Italian hospital needed an air conditioner valve and the supplier couldn't supply it on time. As a result, a local startup reverse-engineered and produced 100 valves overnight.

sourceString: After the initial outbreak of COVID-19, conspiracy theories, misinformation and disinformation emerged regarding the origin, scale, prevention, treatment and other aspects of the disease and rapidly spread online.
targetString: پس از مراحل اولیه شیوع کووید-19، نظریه‌های توطئه، اطلاعات نادرست و اطلاعات ناقص درباره منشاء، مقیاس، پیشگیری، درمان و دیگر جنبه‌های بیماری شکل گرفت و به سرعت در فضای آنلاین منتشر شد.
en-mt: After the early stages of the COVID-19 outbreak, conspiracy theories, misinformation and incomplete information about the origin, scale, prevention, treatment, and other aspects of the disease developed and quickly spread online.

sourceString: Humans appear to be capable of spreading the virus to some other animals.
targetString: ظاهراً این ویروس از انسان‌ها به برخی حیوانات منتقل می‌شود.
en-mt: The virus is transmitted from humans to some animals.

sourceString: The study failed to find evidence of viral replication in pigs, ducks, and chickens.
targetString: مطالعات مربوط به یافتن شواهد تکثیر ویروس در خوک، اردک و مرغ نتیجه‌ای نداشته است.
en-mt: Studies have found no evidence of virus replication in pigs, ducks and chickens.

sourceString: No medications or vaccine is approved to treat the disease.
targetString: هیچ دارو یا واکسنی برای درمان این بیماری تایید نشده است.
en-mt: No drugs or vaccines have been approved to treat the disease.

sourceString: International research on vaccines and medicines in COVID-19 are underway by government organisations, academic groups and industry researchers.
targetString: پژوهش‌های بین‌المللی درباره واکسن و داروهای کووید-19 در بین سازمان‌های دولتی، گروه‌های علمی و پژوهشگران صنعتی در جریان است.
en-mt: International research on COVID-19 vaccines and drugs is underway among government agencies, scientific groups and industry researchers.

sourceString: In March, the World Health Organization initiated the "SOLIDARITY Trial" to assess treatment effects of four existing antiviral compounds with the most promise of efficacy.
targetString: در ماه مارس، سازمان بهداشت جهانی «کارآزمایی وحدت» را برای ارزیابی تاثیر درمانی چهار ترکیب موجود ضدویروس که بیشترین امیدبخشی را دارند، اجرا کرد.
en-mt: In March, the World Health Organization conducted a "unity trial" to assess the therapeutic effectiveness of the four existing antiviral compounds that are most promising.

sourceString: There is no available vaccine, but various agencies are actively developing vaccine candidates.
targetString: هنوز واکسنی وجود ندارد ولی نهادهای مختلف فعالانه در حال بررسی واکسن‌های پیشنهادی هستند.
en-mt: There is no vaccine yet, but various agencies are actively considering the proposed vaccines.

sourceString: Previous work on SARS-CoV is being utilised because SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 both use the ACE2 receptor to enter human cells.
targetString: از نتایج بررسی‌های قبلی مربوط به SARS-CoV استفاده می‌شود زیرا SARS-CoV و SARS-CoV-2 هر دو از گیرنده ACE2 برای ورود به سلول‌های انسانی استفاده می‌کنند.
en-mt: The results of previous SARS-CoV studies have been used because SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 both use the ACE2 receptor to enter human cells.

sourceString: There are three vaccination strategies being investigated.
targetString: سه راهبرد واکسیناسیون در دست تحقیق است.
en-mt: Three vaccination strategies are under investigation.

sourceString: First, researchers aim to build a whole virus vaccine.
targetString: نخست، پژوهشگران در پی ساخت واکسن ویروس کامل هستند.
en-mt: First, researchers are looking to develop a complete virus vaccine.

sourceString: The use of such a virus, be it inactive or dead, aims to elicit a prompt immune response of the human body to a new infection with COVID-19.
targetString: استفاده از ویروس، غیرفعال یا مرده، با هدف پیشگیری از بروز واکنش ایمنی در بدن انسان در مقابل عفونت جدید کووید-19 صورت می‌گیرد.
en-mt: The use of the virus, inactive or dead, is aimed at preventing an immune response in the human body against a new COVID-19 infection.

sourceString: A second strategy, subunit vaccines, aims to create a vaccine that sensitises the immune system to certain subunits of the virus.
targetString: راهبرد دوم، واکسن‌های واحد فرعی، با هدف ساخت واکسنی که بتواند سیستم ایمنی را در مقابل برخی واحدهای فرعی ویروس حساس کند، دنبال می‌شود.
en-mt: The second strategy, subunit vaccines, aims to develop a vaccine that can make the immune system sensitive to certain virus subunits.

sourceString: In the case of SARS-CoV-2, such research focuses on the S-spike protein that helps the virus intrude the ACE2 enzyme receptor.
targetString: در مورد SARS-CoV-2، این پژوهش مبتنی بر پروتئین اسپایک S است که به ویروس در ورود به گیرنده آنزیمی ACE2 کمک می‌کند.
en-mt: In the case of SARS-CoV-2, the research is based on the Spike S protein, which helps the virus enter the ACE2 enzyme receptor.

sourceString: A third strategy is that of the nucleic acid vaccines (DNA or RNA vaccines, a novel technique for creating a vaccination).
targetString: راهبرد سوم به واکسن‌های اسید نوکلئیک (واکسن‌های DNA یا RNA، روش جدید تهیه واکسن) مربوط می‌شود.
en-mt: The third strategy concerns nucleic acid vaccines (DNA or RNA vaccines, a new method of vaccine preparation).

sourceString: Experimental vaccines from any of these strategies would have to be tested for safety and efficacy.On 16 March 2020, the first clinical trial of a vaccine started with four volunteers in Seattle.
targetString: واکسن‌های آزمایشی هریک از این راهبردها باید از نظر ایمنی و اثربخشی بررسی شود. در 16 مارس 2020، نخستین کارآزمایی بالینی واکسن با حضور چهار داوطلب در سیاتل آغاز شد.
en-mt: Experimental vaccines for each of these strategies should be evaluated in terms of safety and effectiveness. On March 16, 2020, the first clinical trial of the vaccine with four volunteers began in Seattle.

sourceString: The vaccine contains a harmless genetic code copied from the virus that causes the disease.Antibody dependent enhancement has been suggested as a potential challenge for vaccine development for SARS-COV-2, but this is controversial.
targetString: این واکسن حاوی کد ژنتیکی بی‌ضرری است که از ویروس عامل بیماری کپی شده است. توسعه مبتنی بر پادتن به عنوان چالش بالقوه توسعه واکسن برای SARS-COV-2 مطرح شده است ولی در این زمینه جای بحث وجود دارد.
en-mt: The vaccine contains harmless genetic code copied from the virus causing the disease. Antibody-based development has been raised as a potential challenge for developing a vaccine for SARS-COV-2, but there is debate in this regard.

sourceString: There are more than 300 active clinical trials underway as of April 2020.
targetString: تا آوریل 2020، بیش از 300 کارآزمایی بالینی فعال در جریان بوده است.
en-mt: As of April 2020, more than 300 active clinical trials have been underway.

sourceString: Seven trials were evaluating already approved treatments for malaria, including four studies on hydroxychloroquine or chloroquine.
targetString: هفت کارآزمایی بالینی درمان‌هایی را که قبلاً برای درمان مالاریا تایید شده بودند، ارزیابی کردند که از آنها می‌توان به چهار طرح پژوهشی درباره هیدروکسی‌کلروکین یا کلروکین اشاره کرد.
en-mt: Seven clinical trials evaluated previously approved treatments for malaria, including four research studies on hydroxychloroquine or chloroquine.

sourceString: Repurposed antiviral drugs make up most of the Chinese research, with nine phase III trials on remdesivir across several countries due to report by the end of April.
targetString: داروهای ضدویروس مشمول تغییر کاربرد سوژه بیشتر پژوهش‌های چینی هستند که قرار است نتیجه نُه کارآزمایی فاز III درباره remdesivir در چندین کشور تا پایان آوریل اعلام شود.
en-mt: Antiviral drugs subject to reuse are the subject of most Chinese research, with the results of nine Phase III trials of remdesivir in several countries by the end of April.

sourceString: A dynamic review of clinical development for COVID-19 vaccine and drug candidates was in place, as of April 2020.Several existing antiviral medications are being evaluated for treatment of COVID-19, including remdesivir, chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine, lopinavir/ritonavir and lopinavir/ritonavir combined with interferon beta.
targetString: تا آوریل 2020، بررسی دینامیک توسعه بالینی واکسن کووید-19 و داروهای پیشنهادی در جریان بوده است.چندین داروی ضدویروس موجود برای درمان کووید-19 در دست بررسی است که از آنها می‌توان به remdesivir، کلروکین و هیدروکسی‌کلروکین، lopinavir/ritonavir و lopinavir/ritonavir با ترکیب اینترفرون بتا اشاره کرد.
en-mt: As of April 2020, a dynamic review of the clinical development of the COVID-19 vaccine and proposed drugs has been underway.Several existing antiviral drugs for the treatment of COVID-19 are under investigation, including remdesivir, chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine, lopinavir/ritonavir and lopinavir/ritonavir combined with interferon beta.

sourceString: There is tentative evidence for efficacy by remdesivir, as of March 2020.
targetString: تا مارس 2020 شواهد غیرقطعی درباره اثربخشی remdesivir وجود داشت.
en-mt: As of March 2020, there was inconclusive evidence on the effectiveness of remdesivir.

sourceString: Clinical improvement was observed in patients treated with compassionate-use remdesivir.
targetString: بهبود بالینی در بیمارانی که با مصرف بدون مجوز remdesivir تحت درمان قرار گرفته بودند، مشاهده شد.
en-mt: Clinical improvement was observed in patients treated with unlicensed use of remdesivir.

sourceString: Phase III clinical trials are being conducted in the US, China and Italy.Chloroquine, previously used to treat malaria, was studied in China in February 2020, with preliminary results.
targetString: کارآزمایی‌های بالینی فاز III در ایالات متحده، چین و ایتالیا در جریان است. کلروکین، که قبلاً برای درمان مالاریا به کار می‌رفت، در فوریه 2020 در چین بررسی شد و نتایج مقدماتی آن منتشر شد.
en-mt: Phase III clinical trials are underway in the United States, China and Italy. Chloroquine, previously used to treat malaria, was reviewed in China in February 2020 and preliminary results were published.

sourceString: However, there are calls for peer review of the research.
targetString: البته، از جامعه پژوهشگران برای نقد این نتایج دعوت شده است.
en-mt: Of course, the community of researchers has been invited to criticize these results.

sourceString: Korean and Chinese Health Authorities recommend the use of chloroquine.
targetString: نهادهای بهداشتی کره و چین استفاده از کلروکین را پیشنهاد کرده‌اند.
en-mt: Health bodies in Korea and China have proposed the use of chloroquine.

sourceString: However, the Wuhan Institute of Virology, while recommending a daily dose of one gram, notes that twice that dose is highly dangerous and could be lethal.
targetString: هرچند، موسسه ویروس‌شناسی ووهان، در حالی که مصرف روزانه یک گرم را پیشنهاد کرده است، اعلام کرده است که مصرف دوز دو برابر بسیار خطرناک است و ممکن است مرگبار باشد.
en-mt: However, the Wuhan Institute of Virology, while recommending a daily intake of 1 gram, has stated that double doses are extremely dangerous and may be fatal.

sourceString: On 28 March 2020, the FDA issued an emergency use authorisation for hydroxychloroquine and chloroquine at the discretion of physicians treating people with COVID-19.The Chinese 7th edition guidelines also include interferon, ribavirin or umifenovir for use against COVID-19.
targetString: در 28 مارس 2020، FDA مجوز مصرف اضطراری هیدروکسی کلروکین و کلروکین، با صلاحدید پزشکان معالج افراد مبتلا به کووید-19 را صادر کرد.در دستورالعمل ویراست 7 چین، نام اینترفرون، ریباویرین یا اومی‌فنوویر برای درمان کووید-19 مطرح شده است.
en-mt: On March 28, 2020, the FDA authorized emergency use of hydroxychloroquine and chloroquine, at the discretion of physicians treating people with COVID-19.China's Edition 7 directive mentions interferon, ribavirin or omifenovir for the treatment of COVID-19.

sourceString: Preliminary data indicate that high doses of ribavirin are necessary to inhibit SARS-CoV-2 in vitro.
targetString: داده‌های مقدماتی نشان می‌دهد که مصرف ریباویرین با دوز بالا برای جلوگیری از تکثیر SARS-CoV-2 در محیط آزمایشگاه ضروری است.
en-mt: Preliminary data suggest that taking high-dose ribavirin is essential to prevent SARS-CoV-2 replication in vitro setting.

sourceString: Nitazoxanide has been recommended for further in vivo study after demonstrating low concentration inhibition of SARS-CoV-2.Studies have demonstrated that initial spike protein priming by transmembrane protease serine 2 (TMPRSS2) is essential for entry of SARS-CoV-2 via interaction with the ACE2 receptor.
targetString: نیتازوکسانید، پس از آن که تاثیر غلظت پایین آن در بازدارندگی از تکثیر SARS-CoV-2 ثابت شد، برای تحقیقات در بدن انسان پیشنهاد شده است.تحقیقات نشان داده است که آماده‌سازی پروتئین اسپایک اولیه با سرین پروتئاز غشای ترانس 2 (TMPRSS2) برای ورود SARS-CoV-2 از طریق تعامل با گیرنده ACE2 ضروری است.
en-mt: Nitazoxanide, after its low concentration effect on the inhibition of SARS-CoV-2 proliferation has been proven, has been proposed for research in the human body.Research has shown that the preparation of the primary spike protein with transmembrane serine protease 2 (TMPRSSS2) is essential for SARS-CoV-2 entry through interaction with the ACE2 receptor.

sourceString: The studies of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine with or without azithromycin have major limitations that have prevented the medical community from embracing these therapies without further study.Oseltamivir does not inhibit SARS-CoV-2 in vitro and has no known role in COVID-19 treatment.
targetString: مطالعه کلروکین و هیدروکسی‌کلروکین با/بدون آزیترومایسین محدودیت‌های عمده‌ای دارد که جامعه پزشکی را از پذیرش بدون بررسی این درمان‌ها باز داشته است. اوسلتامیویر در محیط آزمایشگاه مانع تکثیر SARS-CoV-2 نمی‌شود و نقش آن در درمان کووید-19 ثابت نشده است.
en-mt: The study of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine with/without azithromycin has major limitations that have prevented the medical community from accepting these treatments without reviewing them. Oseltamivir does not inhibit the proliferation of SARS-CoV-2 in a laboratory setting, and its role in the treatment of COVID-19 has not been proven.

sourceString: Cytokine storm can be a complication in the later stages of severe COVID-19.
targetString: طوفان سیتوکین ممکن است از عوارض مراحل بعدی کووید-19 شدید باشد.
en-mt: Cytokine storms may be a complication of the later stages of severe COVID-19.

sourceString: There is evidence that hydroxychloroquine may have anti-cytokine storm properties.Tocilizumab has been included in treatment guidelines by China's National Health Commission after a small study was completed.
targetString: شواهد نشان می‌دهد که هیدروکسی کلروکین دارای خواص ضد طوفان سیتوکین است. «کمیسیون ملی بهداشت» چین توکیلیزوماب را پس از بررسی مختصر در دستورالعمل درمان گنجانده است.
en-mt: Evidence suggests that hydroxychloroquine has cytokine anti-storm properties. China's National Health Commission has included tokilizumab in the treatment guidelines after a brief review.

sourceString: It is undergoing a phase 2 non randomised test at the national level in Italy after showing positive results in people with severe disease.
targetString: پس از این که مصرف این دارو در افراد مبتلا به بیماری شدید نتایج مثبتی بر جا گذاشت، در ایتالیا تحت آزمایش غیرتصادفی فاز 2 در سطح ملی قرار گرفت.
en-mt: After positive results were given in people with severe illness, it was nationally tested in Italy.

sourceString: Combined with a serum ferritin blood test to identify cytokine storms, it is meant to counter such developments, which are thought to be the cause of death in some affected people.
targetString: با ترکیب آزمایش خون سروم فریتین برای شناسایی طوفان سیتوکین، برای مقابله با این توسعه به کار می‌رود که علت مرگ برخی افراد مبتلا اعلام شده است.
en-mt: By combining serum ferritin blood tests to detect cytokine storms, it is used to counter this development, which has been the cause of death for some affected individuals.

sourceString: The interleukin-6 receptor antagonist was approved by the FDA based on retrospective case studies for treatment of steroid refractory cytokine release syndrome induced by a different cause, CAR T cell therapy, in 2017.
targetString: FDA آنتاگونیست گیرنده اینترلوکین-6 را بر اساس مطالعات موارد گذشته برای درمان سندروم مقاوم آزادسازی سیتوکین که با علت دیگری، سلول درمانی CAR T، ایجاد می‌شود، در 2017 تایید کرد.
en-mt: The FDA approved the interleukin-6 receptor antagonist based on past case studies to treat the resistant cytokine release syndrome that is caused by another cause, CAR T cell therapy, in 2017.

sourceString: To date, there is no randomised, controlled evidence that tocilizumab is an efficacious treatment for CRS.
targetString: تا امروز، شواهد تصادفی و کنترل‌شده‌ای مبنی بر اثربخشی توکیلیزوماب برای درمان CRS ارائه نشده است.
en-mt: To date, there is no randomized, controlled evidence that toquilizumab is effective for treating CRS.

sourceString: Transferring purified and concentrated antibodies produced by the immune systems of those who have recovered from COVID-19 to people who need them is being investigated as a non-vaccine method of passive immunisation.
targetString: انتقال پادتن‌های خالص و غلیظ تولیدشده در سیستم ایمنی افراد بهبودیافته از کووید-19 به افراد نیازمند آن به عنوان روش غیرواکسنی با مصون‌سازی غیرفعال، در دست بررسی است.
en-mt: Transmission of pure and concentrated antibodies produced in the immune system of people recovering from COVID-19 to those in need of it as a non-vaccine with passive immunization is under investigation.

sourceString: This strategy was tried for SARS with inconclusive results.
targetString: این راهبرد برای سارس امتحان شد و نتایج آن قطعی نبود.
en-mt: This strategy was tested for SARS and its results were not conclusive.

sourceString: Viral neutralisation is the anticipated mechanism of action by which passive antibody therapy can mediate defence against SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: خنثی‌سازی ویروسی سازوکار احتمالی این عمل است که بر اساس آن پادتن-درمانی غیرفعال زمینه دفاع در برابر SARS-CoV-2 را فراهم می‌کند.
en-mt: Viral neutralization is a possible mechanism for this action, according to which passive antibody therapy provides the basis for defense against SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Other mechanisms however, such as antibody-dependent cellular cytotoxicity and/or phagocytosis, may be possible.
targetString: البته، سازوکارهای دیگر، مانند سیتوتوکسی‌سیتی سلولی وابسته به پادتن و/یا فاگوسیتوز، ممکن است موثر باشد.
en-mt: Of course, other mechanisms, such as antibody-dependent cytotoxicity and/or phagocytosis, may be effective.

sourceString: Other forms of passive antibody therapy, for example, using manufactured monoclonal antibodies, are in development.
targetString: دیگر انواع پادتن درمانی غیرفعال، مثلاً استفاده از پادتن‌های مونوکلونال مصنوعی، در دست بررسی است.
en-mt: Other types of passive antibody therapy, such as the use of synthetic monoclonal antibodies, are under investigation.

sourceString: Production of convalescent serum, which consists of the liquid portion of the blood from recovered patients and contains antibodies specific to this virus, could be increased for quicker deployment.
targetString: تولید سروم نقاهتی، که شامل بخش مایع خون گرفته‌شده از افراد بهبودیافته است و پادتن‌های خاص این ویروس را در خود دارد، ممکن است برای توسعه سریع‌تر افزایش یابد.
en-mt: Production of convalescent serum, which includes the liquid portion of blood taken from recovered individuals and contains specific antibodies to the virus, may be increased for faster development.

sourceString: Coronavirus diseases, a group of closely related syndromes
targetString: بیماری‌های ناشی از کروناویروس، گروهی از سندروم‌های دارای ارتباط نزدیک
en-mt: Diseases caused by coronavirus, a group of closely related syndromes

sourceString: Li Wenliang, a doctor at Central Hospital of Wuhan, who later contracted and died of COVID-19 after raising awareness of the spread of the virus.
targetString: Li Wenliang، از پزشکان بیمارستان مرکزی ووهان، که بعداً بر اثر ابتلا به کووید-19 و پس از اطلاع‌رسانی عمومی درباره شیوع این ویروس، درگذشت.
en-mt: Li Wenliang, a physician at Wuhan Central Hospital, later died of COVID-19 after public informing about the outbreak.
